24a5(phal chen): gnas thams cad rnam par bsgom pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams las rnam par 'das pa dang / thams cad mkhye na pa'i gnas la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gnas yongs su zin
24a6(phal chen): pa dang / bla na med pa'i gnas kyi mthar phyin pa dang / bde ba'i gnas la brtson pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas la shin tu gnas pa dang / bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gnas dang mi 'bral zhing sangs
24a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag la gnas par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'jig rten gyi thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar sems pa/ sems can thos
24a8(phal chen): cad yongs su bsngo bas yongs su skyab pa/ gnas kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la de ltar yongasu bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa'i rgya brten
24a9(phal chen): gyis sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems kyis ye shes kyi rten chen po la spyod pa dang / dge
24b1(phal chen): kha'i bshes gnyen gyi rten la spyod pa dang / bla ma'i rten pa spyod pa dang / legs par spyad pa'i rten la spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po'i rten la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rten la spyod pa dang / sar+b+ba
24b2(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi/ pha rol du phyin pa drug gi rten la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi sems shin tu yangs pa'i rten la spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rten la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas
24b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi rten sa spyod par gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyab rten gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad yon tan thams
24b4(phal chen): cad rnam par dag par gyur pa dang / shin tu dag par 'gyur pa dang / ye shes rnam par dag par gyur pa dang / lo ma rnam par 'gyur pa dang / chos rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / rje bsam pa
24b5(phal chen): rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / mos pa rnam par dag da par 'gyur ba dang / smon lam rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i yon tan dang / ye shes rnam pa
24b6(phal chen): dag par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/ til mar gyi mar me 'am/ mar gyi mar me 'am/ rin po che'i mar ma
24b7(phal chen): 'am/ nor bu'i mar me 'tsho/ ro'i mar me 'am/ mar mi chen po'am/ a ka ru'i mar me 'am/ tsan dan gyi mer me 'am/ spos thams cad kyi mar me 'am/ kha dog mtha' yas par snang ba'i mar/ 
24b8(phal chen): me'am/ rnam pa de lta bu'i mar me dag de yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad la bde ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad brgyu
24b9(phal chen): ba'i phyir 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ba ste/ mar me'i sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la snang ba mtha' yas par gyur cig
25a1(phal chen): sems can thams cad shin tu 'phra ba dmigs par bya ba'i phyir snang ba shin tu gsal zhing dang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems med pa'i khams yongs su shes shing snang ba
25a2(phal chen): rab rib med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'od 'gyed pa'i lus su mngon par 'byung zhing snang ba mtha' yas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi 'od chos thams cad la phyir
25a3(phal chen): mI ldog pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'od kun tu snang ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byed pa dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas kyi 'od rab tu thob par gyur
25a4(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad 'od gcig gis rgyas par byed cing thogs pa med pa'i snang ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
25a5(phal chen): zhing du 'od gzer rab tu 'gyed cing snang ba dpag tu med par gyur sems can thams cad ye shes kyi skar mdas 'gro ba/ ste thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan zhing 'od snang ba'i skar
25a6(phal chen): mda'i rgyal po lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad zhing kun tu 'od 'gyed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung zhing / kha dog mtha' yas par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma
25a7(phal chen): me'i sbyin pa rab tu gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / sems can thams cad la bde ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs
25a8(phal chen): su bzung bas yongs su 'dzin to// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bzung bas yang dag par 'dzin to// sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bskal pas mgo bshad byed do// 
25a9(phal chen): sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa bas snying brtse ba sbyin pas yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bskal pa sbyin par byed do// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas
25b1(phal chen): rab tu bzung bas rab tu 'dzin te/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa basbyin pas yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas dmigs par byed do// sems can thams cad dge
25b2(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba'i nyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par byed do// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba shes pas rnam par 'byed par byed de/ de ltar de mar mo'i sbyin pas bsdus po'i dge ba'i rtsa bas de ci nas kyang
25b3(phal chen): sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rab tu dgod para'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba thogs pa med par 'gro bas de ltar de ltar yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
25b4(phal chen): po nad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtse ba 'dis sems can thams cad dmigs pa kun las shin tu langs par gyur cig
25b5(phal chen): sems can de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu thob cing lus nad na med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i nAd thams cad sos par gyur te sprin lta bur gyur cigs
25b6(phal chen): sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i phyir mi ldog par pa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa'i tshul gyis sman a ga ta lta bu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i dug gi ga
25b7(phal chen): zhing 'byin cing sangs rgyas kyi snyan du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing nye bar 'grod pa'i ngang tshul can du gyur cig/ sems can
25b8(phal chen): thams cad shin tu mi mkhrugs pa'i chos dang ldan zhing sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad gso' ba la zhugs shing sman gyi stong pa lta bur gyur cig/ sems
25b9(phal chen): can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba rab tu thob cing nad thams cad byang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsam pa ji lta bu bzhin du sman gyi sbyor ba la brtson pas/ 'gro ba
26a1(phal chen): thams cad kyi sman la mkhas par gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad sangs rgyas shin tu gso// 
26a2(phal chen): ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// shin tu bde zhing dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsdu'o// sems can thams cad shin tu rgyas pa rnam par dag pas bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsdu'o// sems can thams
26a3(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas snyun mi mnga' ba lta bu rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi nad kyi zung rngu las thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad
26a4(phal chen): kyi lus nyams pa med cing brtan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad rdo rje'i ri khor yug lta bur gzhom du mi choms pa dang / stobs dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 
26a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi stobs thams cad kyis brtan cing / bsam pa shin tu mthong ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongasasu bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi bde
26a6(phal chen): ba'i rnam par zil gyis mi non pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi lus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis brtan
26a7(phal chen): pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snod sna tshogs dang bre dang lnga bres sbyin pa byed pa 'di lta ste/ gser gyi snod dang / gser gyi bre dang / lA bre
26a8(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste dngul gyi snod dang / dngul gyi bre dang lnga khre rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste bye dUr+ya'i snod dang / bai dur+ya'i bri dang
26a9(phal chen): lnga bre rin po che rnam par tha dad pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste shel gyi snod dang / nal gyi bre dang / lde bre rin po che'i brgyan rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su bkong ba dang / 'di lta ste mu sa
26b1(phal chen): rags pa'i stod dang / mu sa ra gal pa'i bre dang / lnga bre mu tig dbang pos yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di sta a rba kur ba'i snod dang / a pra kAr pa'i b+he dang / snga bre rin po ni bye nu ru dang / nang bu ri
26b2(phal chen): po che 'od zer snang bas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste rin po che shi la'i snod dang / rin po che shi la'i bre dang / skra bre kha zlas zhim po'i mchog sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste tsan
26b3(phal chen): gyi snod dang / tsan dan gyi bre dang / lha bre lha rdzas lnga bu'i kaMs phrugs kyis yongasu bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste rdo rje'i snod dang / rdo rje'i bre dang / snga bri spos rin po cha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs
26b4(phal chen): su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste snod sna tshogs dang / dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshogs kyis bkang ba dang / bre dang lnga bre tu mtshogs brtsegs par bya ba tshad med pa/ nor gyi dbyigs dang / dngul dang / gser
26b5(phal chen): phyis yongs su bkang ba de dag yongs su bkang ba de dag yon dan gyi gnas bsam gyis mi khyab par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'bul lam
26b6(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen du dkon par sems bskyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog thams cad la 'bul lam/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa shin tu bstan pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i dge
26b7(phal chen): 'dun la 'bul lam/ 'phags pa'i skye bo la shin tu mos pa'i sems kyis gang zag gi rnam pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la dbul lam/ bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba'i sems
26b8(phal chen): kyis pa dang ma dag la sbyin pa byed dam/ de dag de dag tu yon tan gyi tshogs bstsags pa dang / gdams ngag dang bslab pa dang / 'phags pa'i bstan pa la gnas par brtson pas/ slob dben da
26b9(phal chen): bla ma dang sbyin pa'i gnas sa dbus lam/ sems can thams cad la zhe sdang ba'i mig gis byams pa yongs su bsgoms shing gtong ba'i sems kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / dkur thu rje
27a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gcig tu nges par zhugs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa thams cad rtsom zhing tshogs chen po grangs med pas 'gro ba thams
27a2(phal chen): cad yongs su mi btang zhing mi spong ba'i sems la shin tu gnas te/ sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad la mngon par ma chags pa dang / yon tan gyi gnas thams cad rab tu bzung ba'i sems la rab tu gnas pa
27a3(phal chen): bkren pa dang 'phongs pa'i slong ba rnams la snod sna tshogs dang / bre dang lnga bre yo byad kyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su bkang ba de dag sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar
27a4(phal chen): yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad dran nga pa'i dbang po na mkha'i dbyings sngar yangs pa dang ldan te/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skad thams cad bzung
27a5(phal chen): ba dang / blang ba dang yid la bya ba'i dran pa rmongs pa byed cing snodatshad med pa'i snying pa can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo rgyun chad med pa'i chos can du gyur te/ 
27a6(phal chen): snod bzang po rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'dzin pa'i chos can du gyur te/ bla na med pa'i
27a7(phal chen): snod rin po che lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub g.yer med pa la mos pas yang dag par bzung zhing sangs rgyas kyi
27a8(phal chen): chos yangs pa'i snod du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rgya che zhing mthu che ba la yang dag par gzhol bas/ rin po che'i snod rnam pa mchog thams cad dang ldan pa shin tu brgyan
27a9(phal chen): pa lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' dang dpung med pa la mos pa rnam par dag cing yon tan thams cad kyi snod dang / 'byung gnas su gyur cig/ sems can thos
27b1(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med par thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la rab tu gzhag pa'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i snod shes kyi mthar gtugs te/ thams/ 
27b2(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems can thams cad kyi khams thams cad ma sus par thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la rab tu gzhag pa'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha
27b3(phal chen): bskum par byang chub sems dpa'i snod du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag gis chos bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig
27b4(phal chen): yon tan mchog thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi snod du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor la skar pa la gsol ba 'debs pa dang / chos yongs
27b5(phal chen): su 'dri ba la smra ba'i snod du 'gro ba'i skyes bus gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i gang bar byed pa/ shong pa
27b6(phal chen): snod du gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ci nas kyang sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa
27b7(phal chen): snod du gyur cig pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shing rta sna chog pa dang / shing rta tu ma dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis shing rta tshad med pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub
27b8(phal chen): sems dpa' gcig tu rgyud pa dang / bla ma ston pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge 'dun dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sbyin pa'i gnas sna tshogs slong zhing len pa dang / phyogs
27b9(phal chen): gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i gang zag sna tshogs dang / phongs pa dang / bkren pa spong ba dgan du med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sgra zhes te/ 'ongs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i yid ches pas skabs
28a1(phal chen): 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang sbyin pa'i sgra thos te 'ongs pa 'am/ gser gyi shing rta byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / sems kyis bos shing bsta bas/ 
28a2(phal chen): pa de dag la sbyin pa de dag la sbyin zhing gtong ba 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i shing rta brgyan gyis shin tu mdzes par byas pa'i sbyin pa 'am/ gser gyi shing rdal dril bu'i dra ba rab tu 'khor ba'i brgyan rin
28a3(phal chen): po che'i sbrad du'i lda ldi bkye ba'i sbyin pa 'am/ bye dur+ya ri shidri rta la rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas brgyan cing klubs pa sbyin pa 'am/ gser gyi shing rta la rin po che'i dra ba dang / brgyan
28a4(phal chen): thams cad phun sum tshogs pas brgyan cing glang po cang shes pa la bcas pa sbyin pa 'am/ tsan dan gyi shing rta la rin po che'o pad ma sna tshogs kyis kun tu smras te/ rin po che'i sad
28a5(phal chen): ge'i khris brgyan pa/ na chung brgya phrag stong zhon pa/ rgyan thams cad dang rin po che sna tshogs thams cadakyi gdugs phun sum tshogs pa skyes bu cing shes brgya stong du mas
28a6(phal chen): drang ba sbyin pa 'am/ shel gyi shing rta la rin po che du mas kha dog rnam par mdzes par byas shing / na chung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pas yongs su gang ba/ rin po che'i bla res g.yog
28a7(phal chen): par byed po/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs kyis phyogs bzhinas brgyan pa sbyin pa 'am/ a s+tha gar pa'i shing rta la rin po che sna tshogs tu mas shin tu mdzes par byas te/ spos sna tshogs dri zhim
28a8(phal chen): pos gdugs pa/ smos kyi dam pa thams cad kyis byug pas rab tu byugs po/ me tog gi rgyan thams cad kyis chal par bkram pa/ bu mo brgya phrag stong gis rin po che'i srad du thogs te/ 
28a9(phal chen): 'phrul pa med par drang ba sbyin pa 'am/ dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis shing rta la ras dang gos sna tshogs kyis bla res bris te/ rin po che'i dra bas yog par khyobs pa/ spos zhim po yid du 'ong ba rnam par
28b1(phal chen): dag pa mi 'thun pa med pa tsher na dga' ba/ shin tu 'bul ba/ mtshams kyis lha'i bus drang ba/ rin po che'i 'khor lo rin po che thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan cing / mdzes par byas pa'i sbyin pa 'am/ chen po
28b2(phal chen): rje thams cad tshogs pa'i 'od 'byung ba'i shing rta la khaM dog rnam pa sna tshogs su snang bar rin po che rnam pa du ma'i brgyan bgyis brgyan pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bsa'i bla res bris pa/ rin po che sna tshog
28b3(phal chen): kyi phreng ba mtha' yas kun nas sbyangs pa/ bu dang bu mo bskyon pa/ spos sna tshogs kyi phye mas mtha' 'khor shin tu sbyangs pa/ sbyin pa bye ba ni de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la shin tu
28b4(phal chen): 'bul ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la yon tshad med pa 'bul bar dad cing sbyin pa'i gnas dam pa la shin tu mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams
28b5(phal chen): cad sbyin pa'i gnas mtha' yas pas rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas pa rab tu brten par gyur cig/ sems can thos cid gtong ba rgya chen po yongs su grub pas sangs rgyas thams cad la
28b6(phal chen): yongs su gtong bar mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med par rab tu tho ba cing / nyan thos drang rang sangs rgyas kyi smon lam dang bral te
28b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis myong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mtha' yas pa'i ye shes la shin tu mos shing sangs rgyas la yon gsal pa zad mi shes par
28b8(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal pos rnam par dag cing ye shes kyi mchogs rab tu rten par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad du 'gro ba ste
28b9(phal chen): gang du dga' bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes pa'i 'byung gnas la rab tu 'khod pa grub pa'i phyir/ ye shes chen po la rab tu rten par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa
29a1(phal chen): nyid kyi zhing las rnam par skye ba'i chos can du gyur te/ bsod nams kyi zhing du dam par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la
29a2(phal chen): mos shing sangs rgyas thams cad la mi dga' ba med pa'i sems su gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad dal ba med par zhugs te/ sangs rgyas
29a3(phal chen): kyi zhing yongs su 'grub pa lhun gyis grub 'grubs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi skye ba thams cad kyi drung tu phyin pas byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas na mkha'i dbyings thams
29a4(phal chen): cad du shin tu rnam par phye ba'i lus la rab tu zhugs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gnas dpe' med pa'i lus rab tu thob pas ngal zhing tub pa med par 'jig rten gyi khams thams
29a5(phal chen): cad tu 'gro bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i yid kyis 'gro ba dang ldan zhing sus kyi mgyogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems
29a6(phal chen): can thams cad sems skad cig gis bsrem pa dang / khams khyab par byed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yang dag par smon pa'i snang ba dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi
29a7(phal chen): byin gyi brlabs dang / khyu mchog gi mthu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'gro ba la bde bar 'gro
29a8(phal chen): bas rab tu brtson par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i ye shes thams cad ma lus par mthar thug par 'gro ba thob pas shin tu myur bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi
29a9(phal chen): dbyings thams cad tha mi dad par 'jug pa la/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad du 'gro ba'i pha rol du phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i thams cad
29b1(phal chen): khyen pa ye shes kyi sbyang dus dang chub shes te/ byung chubasamapa dang kun tu bzung za spyod nu ga khang du dud pa'i tharos du phyid pa thob pas 'dong bar gyur cig// sems can rnams cang na
29b2(phal chen): nyid thams cad kyi rjes su ming zhing / ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba 'dra bar bya ba'i legs kyi nus thob par b+hu raM cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dngu' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs
29b3(phal chen): rnams mngon par gyur pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan sas 'ongs pa'i mchod pa rtanas shing rdung bus padage ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin du shegs
29b4(phal chen): pa'i theg pa bsgribs pa med par 'byung ba'i mthar phyin par yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyenas shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
29b5(phal chen): de dag sems can thams cad la 'di yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtse ba 'dis sems can thams cad bya ba'i drin mi gtong ba'i phyir// dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi gtong ba'i sems
29b6(phal chen): stor ba med par gyur cig/ sems can thams ca bskal pa mnyam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzinapaphyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bshes gnyen dang don 'thun
29b7(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gtong ba dang / yongs su gtong ba thams cad kyis dge ba'i ga shes gnyen sa/ phan 'dogs pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bram
29b8(phal chen): rim gro cher brtson par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang nye bar byas te/ spyad pa bsgrub pa'i phyir bsam pa de dge ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can
30a1(phal chen): thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'thun pa'i bsnyen bkur la nan tan byed pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems
30a2(phal chen): 'khrul pa med cing nyams pa med pa dang / 'dres pa med cing rnyog pa med pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la grol ba'i bsam pa can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yo byad
30a3(phal chen): 'dod pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la lus yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byams pa dang ldan zhing 'khon med par rim gro byed pa'i phyir/ da
30a4(phal chen): 'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung zhing rab tu brtan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kun tu 'thun par yang dag par nyan pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang
30a5(phal chen): 'thun par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad smon lam gcig pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la byung ba dang / stobs kyi mthar thug pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
30a6(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang las kyi rnam par sbyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan zhing gcig par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ting 'dzin tha dad thams cad kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes mngon
30a7(phal chen): par shes pas shes rab bzang pos chos kyi brtson 'grus la shin tu byung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad bzung ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'i mtha' gtugs par khong du chud par
30a8(phal chen): rig pa'i pha rol du phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i theg pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar gtugs te/ theg pa chen pos mngon par
30a9(phal chen): spyod cing yang dag par gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bde ba'i phyogs las phyir mi ldog pa'i yid dang ldan zhing 'gro ba thams cad shes pa'i ye shes 'dzin par gyur cig/ sems
30b1(phal chen): can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la ji ltar thos pa bzhin du rmongs pa med par chos thams cad la rab tu gzhol zhing / ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ semapa
30b2(phal chen): can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis chos thasad la 'byung ba'i mthar thug ste/ sangs rgyas thas cad yongasu bzung ba'i yi dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyams pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul
30b3(phal chen): gyi rkang par byer med par rab tu thob pas/ mgyogs pa dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / theg pa chen pos 'dul ba/ 
30b4(phal chen): rab tu zhugs pas 'gro zhing 'ong ba'i phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi shing rtas 'gro ba'i mthar thug par gti mug med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsgribs/ 
30b5(phal chen): pa med pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul shes shing / chags pa med pa'i shing rta bzhon pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
30b6(phal chen): po dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shing rta 'bul ba dang / yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ga sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
30b7(phal chen): cad la tshul gyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ bsnyen cing bkur ba yongs su bsgrubs pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa thams cad
30b8(phal chen): las shin tu bslabs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyis shin tu rtogs pa'i bsam pa can/ yon tan gyis rnam par dag pa'i yid dang ldan pa// 'thun par yongs su gtong ba'i bsam pa can/ 
31a1(phal chen): dge 'dun rin po che shin tu dkon pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tshogs rin po che la shin tu mos pa'i bsam pa can/ bstan pa rab tu bzung ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa can/ shin tu bstan bI
31a2(phal chen): bsam pa can/ rimi 'gro byed pa dang ldan pa// mchod spyan chen po'i mchod bya ni shin tu byas/ bstan pa'i yon tan chen po brjod pa sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yon tan tha mi dad pas 'od gsal zhing rnyog pa med par dag pa de/ de bzhi
31a3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i dge 'dun mchog la shing 'bul ba'i tshe/ dge 'dun dkon mchog la shing rta phul bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongasu bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas
31a4(phal chen): kyi bstan pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i yang dag par brin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i skye 'ched las cho ga gzhan me dad par shin tu grub pas sems nang tu gzhol bar gyur cig/ sems can
31a5(phal chen): thams cad sangs rgyas kying chos gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa'i yang dag par bzung bas 'phags par rig par gyur cig/ sems can tham sa cad 'jig rten kun shes pas yid ches par bya bas grangs su bgrang
31a6(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings mi gnyis pa'i rang bzhin shes pa khong du chud pas chags pa med pa'i dbyings la yang dag par gzhon par gyur cig/ sengs can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
31a7(phal chen): kyi spyod pa yul gyis skad dag par 'byung bas cang shes kyis kun nas bskor bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nye bar nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la spyod par 'gyur cig/ ses
31a8(phal chen): can thams cad 'phags pa'i dge 'dun so so'i skye bo med pa'i sas bla na med pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog rab tu brjod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes la shin tu brtson pa'i chos ca/ 
31b1(phal chen): tu gyur te/ 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad kyis gos pa med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing tshogs kyi rgyal po dam pa'i gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes
31b2(phal chen): kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la 'khas pas/ legs par bcas pa'i ye shes kyis gzhol ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyun brjod pa'i yang rjod du med pa shin tu 'gro ba'i 'gro/ 
31b3(phal chen): la mkhas pas/ sems can skad cig gi rdzu 'phrul rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gi khams thams cad tu thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing na mkha'i lta bu'i lus kyi shing rnga sgrub par gyur/ 
31b4(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad na mkha'i dbyings dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par khyab par byed pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa
31b5(phal chen): mchog thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgya/ shes kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par gang ga tu dga' bar 'gro ba'i rgyu dang ldan pas lus yang dag pa'i khyad par rjes su rdzortogs par rab tu thob bar gyu/ 
31b6(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus yang dag par bsngon pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi 'khor mtha' yas pa la ma khas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jigs rten gi khams
31b7(phal chen): thams cad du lus 'phos pa'i med par 'gro ba yang dag par bston pa'i phyir rdul 'phrul gyi chen po'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mig g.yor lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyis
31b8(phal chen): 'gro ba'i mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la ni gnas pa'i lus rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dus la ji ltar bab par sems can yongs su smin par
32a1(phal chen): byed cing 'dul ba'i mi gtong ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung bar yang dag par bston par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bskad gcig gcig gis chos kyi
32a2(phal chen): dbyings thams cad la chags pa med cing bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul gyis// skad cig cig phyogs thams cad tu 'gro ba'i 'ardzu 'phral la mngon par mkhas par gyur cig ces de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
32a3(phal chen): chen po dge 'dun la shing rta 'dul zhing yongs su gtong bas/ yang dag par gzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de ltar sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta la gnas pa rnams par dag par 'gyur/ 
32a4(phal chen): ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang chos kyi dbyangs thams cad shes pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ yongs su bsngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
32a5(phal chen): sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes nye bar bzhag pa'i sems dang nga ldan pa/ rim 'gro can zhe sa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid chen po yon tan rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho'i tshul la 'khas pa yon tan dang ye shes kyi
32a6(phal chen): 'byung gnas kyi rigs ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la rnam par sems pa/ mthu chen por skyes pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong tu yongs su bsgom pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod/ 
32a7(phal chen): pa dus su brjod pa med pa thams cad du spyod pa rnams par sbyangs pa la zhugs pa/ bdud kyi bcings pa thams cad las sems rab tu grol ba/ bdud kyi ma'i sde dang / bdud thams cad kyi shes pa'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa'i
32a8(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa/ gzhal tu med pa'i chos la mkhas pas snang bar gyur pa de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/ shing rta yongs su brtang bas yang dag par gzung ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste// 
32b1(phal chen): sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i sbyin pa'i yongasu smin par grub pas sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam par yid chen par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gcig tu spyod cing mi gnyis pa'i dag par spyod pas 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' bar gyur
32b2(phal chen): tsacig/ sems can thams cad 'gyur ba thams cad bsod nams kyis/ yang dag par sgru ba la rtson pas sbyin pa rnams par dag par byed pa'i mchog tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med pa'i 'bras bu rab tu
32b3(phal chen): bas ye shes kyi mu stegs la byung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog gis rnams par dag par bsgrubs pa med pa'i rtogs par khong du chud pas gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ 
32b4(phal chen): byed pa med par khong tu chud pas/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la rnam par spyod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi zhing basbyin pa'i gnas 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar byas pas bsod nams tshad med pa shin tu bas
32b5(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i theg pa// mchog gi 'bras bu yongs su stobs pas sbyin pa'i gnas yon tan zad mi shes par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi phung po mi zad/ 
32b6(phal chen): bas thams cad mkhyen pa'i mthar thug par gyur cig/ sbyina'i gnas don yod pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ma thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshig dang yig 'dzin cing sdig pa'i chos
32b7(phal chen): rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sgra don yod pa/ ye shes kyi rnam par rig pas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi thams cad mnyan pa la mos shing brtson par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thas
32b8(phal chen): cad las thos pa rjes su bsgrags pa'i chos can tu gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad thos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad zhags pa thub pa dgu bcu rtsa drug gi lta ba lta ba las/ rnam par 'das
32b9(phal chen): te bstan pa las gnas par bya ba la mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog rnam par spel bar byed cing / 'phags pa'i mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'phags/ 
33a1(phal chen): apa mthong ba zhing 'grogs pa'i sems bde ba dang ldan cing ye shes kyi spyod pa'i gang zag la mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi lta ba rjes su thob par las byung ba'i thob pa don yod par gyur
33a2(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad bstan pa'i rab tu bzung ba'i dang yangs su bsrung ba la bzhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ye shes kyi khams rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas bstan pa gsal pa
33a3(phal chen): gyur pa'i snang ba rab tu thogs pas chos thams cad thob pa shin tu 'dzin bra la zhugs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i 'dzod kyis dga' ba'i spyod cing gtong ba shin tu byed pa dang / mchod sbyin shin du byas pas// 
33a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la yon tan ji lta ba bzhin tu brtogs pa bya ngan sum tshogs par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi dang rang sangs rgyas la shin tu 'bul ba'i tshe/ dge bI// 
33a5(phal chen): rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa mchog dam pa phul rab tu thob cing ci nas kyang mi 'jig pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa rab tu 'thob
33a6(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i gnas dang len pa sna tshogs phyogs gzhan dang gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i gang zag dang / slong ba dang 'phongs pa dang bkren
33a7(phal chen): pa mang po tshad med pa byang chub sems dpa'i sgra thos te 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / sems skyed pas mos pa shing bstabs pa/ thams cad gtong bas shin tu re ba'i can de dag 'ongs pa mthong nas/ slong / 
33a8(phal chen): kha la rarimi 'gro bya bas mi ngoms pa'i sems kyis slong ba 'ongs rnams la bzod par gsol ba'i sems bskyed de/ 'di ltar bdag nyid phyogs de dag tu khyed kyi drung du song ste/ rim 'gro bya ba zhig nang 'di ltar khyed 'dir phyin
33a9(phal chen): teshani tu ngal bar gyur to zhes spyi bos btud te bzod pa gsol bas/ slong ba thams cad bzod par byas rim 'gror byas/ ngal ba stis nas ci 'dod pa sbyin pa de dag gis shin tu rim 'gro byed de/ 'di ltar nor bu'i shing rta
33b1(phal chen): bu'i gling na ni nung bzang po rini de ces yongs su gang ba dang / 'di lnga sde gser gi shing rta yul gyi na chung rin po che'i shin tu rnam ngar dag pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lnga sde d+ye dUr+ya'i shing rta chung ma'i 'khor klu dang rol mo cung
33b2(phal chen): zhing dkrol ba dang ldan pas yongs su grang ba dang / 'di lta ste dngul gyi shing rta shan tu 'dzes pa bud med gzhon nu lha'i bu mo lta bus yongs su gang ba dang / 'di lta ste tsan dan gyi shing rta rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs
33b3(phal chen): rjed pa'i rgyun gyis rgyan pa'i shing rta bud med cang shes rin po che brgyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa tshul lA mas khas pas yongs su gang ba dang / 'di lta ste tsan dan gyi shing rta byang chub sems dpa' gzhon par 'ongs pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 
33b4(phal chen): shel gyi shing rta bud med bzang mo bzhin bzang ba/ cha byang stug gu shin tu brgyan pa gzugs 'dzes pa/ ldan pa sdug cing mi mthun pa med pas yongs su gang ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ a swa gar ba'i shing rta dbang skur bas ma
33b5(phal chen): su gang ba dang / 'di lta ste/ spos dam pa'i shing rta bu dang bu ma yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i tshogs thams cad kyis rgyan pa'i shing rnga nang gi gshes gnyen dbyer med byed pas yongs su
33b6(phal chen): bkang ba dang / de rnams pa 'di lta bu'i shi rta grangs pa rnams sna tshogs slongs mo thams cad la sbyin pa yongs su gtong bas spong 'dod pa'i byas pas dngos po rab tu thob pas yidi la bsam pa shin shin rdzos
34a1(phal chen): can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tu 'gro brtson pas kun tu 'gro ba dri ma med par shing rdal gzhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams na
34a2(phal chen): kyi chos la dga' bas mos shing yang dag par gro ba la rtson pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa'i shing rta rjes su 'thun pas la rab tu gnas par gyur cig/ sems thams cad nga byang chub sems dpa'i byung ba'i lam bcu
34a3(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i shing rda la gzhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad tshul dang ldan pa'i yul
34a4(phal chen): dang gnas pa dang ldan pa dang / skyes bu dam pa la rten pa thob/ bas sngon byas pa'i bsod nams shin tu bstsags pa dang / yang dag par smon lam la shin tu brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par
34a5(phal chen): spyod pa rnams par dag par yongs su rdzogs par phun sum tsho/ gas pas 'khor lo bzhi pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems/ can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas ma lus pa'i stobs dang ye she
34a6(phal chen): la brtson pas/ phyogs thams cad chos dbyings su chos kyi snang ba gtong ba la bslabs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi shing rtas 'byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi shing rta la zhon par
34a7(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad du legs par dang bde ba'i yang dag par bsnyon pas bsod nams thams cad dang dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa dang / chos bsam gis mi khyab pa'i shing rta la 'khas par gyur cig/ sems
34a8(phal chen): can thams cad 'byung bar dri mas rab tu byung ste/ sbyin pa gtong bas 'byung ba'i shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med de'i ma lus pas tshul khrims rnam par dag/ 
34a9(phal chen): pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems 'khrug pa med par gnas pas/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa 'khrug pa med cing bzod
34b1(phal chen): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'byung ba'i shing rtas snying po byang chub tu 'gro bar spyod pa'i go cha dgos pas rtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ye shes kyi shing rje dang ldan
34b2(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad shin tu 'gyogs pa'i shing rtas snying po byang chub tu byung ste/ bsam gtan gi pha rol du phyin pa'i ga rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi shing rtal/ 
34b3(phal chen): shin tu gzhon zhing / sangs rgyas kyi yul la sprul pas sangs rgyas par byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos yongs su gtong ba la 'jigs pa/ 
34b4(phal chen): med pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don gyi sbyin pa gtong ba'i phyir chos kyi rgyal po'i shing rta la gzhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin gi phyogs thams cad rab tu 'jug pa rmongs
34b5(phal chen): ba med pa'i phyir smon lam la mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta/ dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad theg pa chen po la ma nor dpas 'jig rten gi khams thams cad tu skye ba'i zhing lus yang dag
34b6(phal chen): par bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos lhag kyi shi nga rda la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i smon lam skye ba med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed dri
34b7(phal chen): byar/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin po che'i shing rtul zhon par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i gnas dang / len pa dang slong ba sna tshogs la shing rta dga' ba dang / rab tu
34b8(phal chen): dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / spros pa'i yid kyis rnam par rtog pas byin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i dge ba'i da ba de dag sems can thams cad 'khyen pa'i theg bzhon pa shin tu bsgrubs pas ye shes dang sem
34b9(phal chen): kyi rnams pa mtha' yas pa/ yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// shin tu brgyas pa chen po'i mdor/ sangs rgyas pal po che zhes bya ba/ bam po sum bcu drug pa'od
35a1(phal chen): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glang po cang shes yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa/ lo drug bcu lon pa/ mche ba drug dang da ldan pa kha dog pad mo lta bu/ mdog ni
35a2(phal chen): bar dag pa/ dkar zhing bri ma med pa/ gser gyi rgyal mtshan can gser gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ gser gyi dra bas lus kun nas yog pa/ sA rin po che sna tshogs kyi tha bas rgyan drug bcug pa/ gser ltar
35a3(phal chen): lha na bstags pa/ dpag rgyad stong gis khyod tu ngal ba med bur 'gro zhing sbyin bzhing stong pa 'am/ rta cang shes gom pa blo mdog bde bar 'dor zhing 'degs pa dang / bya ltar 'gyogs pa dang ldan pa/ rdog ma ldang
35a4(phal chen): lar 'khrol ba/ nam tsong dang ldan pa rmig par ldan pa/ mig pa'i dbyings mtho' zhing skyon med pa/ gser gyi zil bu'i brangs rgyan pa/ rin po che'i sna tshogs kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang zla ba'i dang ldan
35a5(phal chen): pa/ glo kun nas rgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdong rgyan gyis rnam par rgyan pa/ gzhon na bde ba/ lus la byas pa/ shi na tu 'gyogs pa/ phyogs bzhir yid ltar 'gyogs pa'i shugs
35a6(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas lta bu'i lhab lhub thams cad dang ldan pa/ de lta bu'i bla ma'i skye bo dang / bla mar bya ba dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang / pa dang ma dang / 'phongs pa dang / bkren pa dang / sdong ba dang / len pa
35a7(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad la sbyin zhing / yongs su gtong ba dang / sems yangs pas spyon pa dang / sems la chags pa med pas gtong ba dang / rjes su 'gyod pa med pa'i yad 'gu bar byed pa dang / snying rje ches pos yongs
35a8(phal chen): su rgyas pa'i bsam nan po ba'i chen po rab tu gdong dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad rang tu btsun pa dang / byang chub sems dnga'i rigs su sbyis pa'i bsam pa yongs su myong ba'i ma/ dge ba'i
35a9(phal chen): bde dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rkyen gyis byung ste/ cang shes kyi theg la rab tu gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thos
35b1(phal chen): cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi theg pas byung ste/ theg pa bzong po'i bzhon pa la mngon par zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgrub pa med pa'i ye shes kyi theg pas snang bar
35b2(phal chen): gyur te/ theg pa chen po shin tu mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad smon lam thams cad sgrol po la rab tu zhugs pas/ btsam pa chen po'i theg pa ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ban
35b3(phal chen): khor bsgrubs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rab tu thob pa la pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la rab tu zhugs pas/ mnyam par nyid kyis byung bar cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes rin po che sangs rgyas thams
35b4(phal chen): cad kyi chos la shin tu byung ba'i chos can tu gyur te/ theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ sems can byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzan thams cad kyi me tog rgyas bri zhe sems dang rgyud tu gyur te/ byang chub/ 
35b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan rnams par stsags pa'i theg pas shin tu/ byung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mtha' yas pa'i theg pa myur ba la mngon par rtson pa'i ye shes kyi chos can tu gyur te/ bskal grangs
35b6(phal chen): med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyang ba rjes su bsam pa rjes su zhing rnam par stong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad kyis yang dag par sgrub pa la langs pas 'ongs spyod kyimachog
35b7(phal chen): cad dang / chang gis pa'i theg pa rtson po'i spyan ces gyur ci/ sems can rnams cad 'gro bkun thams cad sakhyen pa nyid kyis lam gyi mthar 'dugs par mngon par bzung bar byu 'i phyir theg drushin tu mthong bar kun pan
35b8(phal chen): rab tu brtan pa dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po cang shes brta dang cang shes bye gzag khrig rgya nang grangs med pa'i sbyin pa byed pa'i byurtan pa dang yang dge pa'i rtsa
35b9(phal chen): dag sems can thams cad chags pa med pa'i theg pa la mngon par skyon cing ye shes dang bzhon pa yongs su 'grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sajig paskangs pa med ngas 'byung ba'i mdzar thug par yongs su bcwam
36a1(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba/ chos kyi dbang byed pa bstan gyi sbyin pa byed cing / rgyal po bzhugs pa'i khri bstan bzang po bye dUr+ya'i gang pa can seng ge/ 
36a2(phal chen): khri la gnas pa/ gser gyi rgyu dang rin po che'i dra bas blas stan reg na bde ba grangs med pa tu ma bting ba/ nyen 'khor slong gau dam pa thams cad kyis shin tu bri zhim par byas pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng / 
36a3(phal chen): ga ran be che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tu ma'i rgyan gyis rgyan pa/ gser gyi dra ba'i bA re bris pa/ gser gyi bral bu'i bra ba 'khril ba'i sgra yid tu 'ong ba'i dbyangs byung ba'i rin po che'i 'brug bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong phrag bcus
36a4(phal chen): kun nas bskor te/ rnam par phye bas shin tu 'phags shing lta na 'dzes pa/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrag rgya stong grangs med pas kun nas ltas pa/ ba dadugs khab gcig gis sa chen po thams cad skyong bar dbang bskur ba rgyal
36a5(phal chen): srid dbang phyug thams cad la dbang bstan du bya ba de dag la 'dug cig/ 'khor lo thogs pa med pas skyed pa dang / ches bya ba la rgyal po'i/ bka' thams cad nyams pa med par nyan pa dpal rnam par snang ba dang / 
36a6(phal chen): in 'dra ne la dang / nor bu rin po che'i snying pos spros pa nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar ma che bra lta bur rab tu rgyun pa/ rgyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs rmad tu byung bas rgyan pa/ rin po che'i khyad par tu 'phags rgya mtshos slob pa/ 
36a7(phal chen): mchos dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bkra shis dang / bum pa sna tshogs yongs su gang ba dang / dga' ba 'khyil ba'i rgyan sna tshogs rmad du rnam par brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gi khyim bag drim med cing rdul dang
36a8(phal chen): dral bas bkab pa/ de la 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi bdag po spyi bos nas dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba'i bsod nams kyi stobs dang ldan pa/ byams pa dbang bskur ba dang / pha rol gyi 'khor bcom pa
36a9(phal chen): dang ldan pa bka' la zlog pa med pas/ 'dug na dga' ba de lta bu'i bstan gi rnam par tshul de 'dra ba sbyin pa zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / de dang de dag gi rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong grangs med pa la khri bstan bzang
36b1(phal chen): bai'aM nas 'delta bu'i sbyin pa byed yongs su gtong bA dad+ha/ yang dgu par rdzogs pa ni sangs rgyas rkun pa'i gnas kyi sa pal gsol ba 'am/ skyes bungs pa dge ba'i gnyen mam/ skyes thu ba dge 'dun na
36b2(phal chen): mchogags/ chos sde ba'ang/ chos pa dga'i ba'i phyi'i 'angs sug yonas pa'i senas kyims pa/ nga za nga tha ma'i skyes pongag/ nyan thoms mi rang rgyal pa'i sbyin pa'i gnas pam/ byang chub sems pa
36b3(phal chen): theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod rten mchod pa'i phyir ram/ 'phongs pa dang bkren pa slong ba dpag tu med dag gam/ sems can thams cad la phran gdag
36b4(phal chen): phyir yang rung ste/ spyan zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i brtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can tham sa cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes dang ldan
36b5(phal chen): zhadi shin tu byang chub pa'i bstan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bdud kyi dkrugs ma dang dpung rab tu 'joms pa'i chos kyi/ dbang phyug thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ri rnam par thams cad du thub pa med
36b6(phal chen): pa'i lus dang ldan zhing 'gro ba thams cad la dbang ba'i bstan pa rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba'i thams cad kyis lta bar 'os shing / sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa'i seng ge'i gdan
36b7(phal chen): tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba'i kun la chos kyi dbang phyug gis sbyong ba'i phyir bstan gyi rgyan dang 'khor rnam par dag pa brjod du med pa'i yang dag rjod du med pas rab tu thob par gyur pa cig/ sems/ 
36b8(phal chen): can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba tshogs chen po rnam par dag pas khams gsum pas zil gyis mi non pa'i bstan ba tu 'thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba grangs med par sangs rgyas kyi gdan gyi yon tan smras
36b9(phal chen): pa mthas thug pa med pa'i dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gi khams brjod tu med pa'i yang rjod tu med pa bstan gyis rgyas par byed pa'i byin brlabs dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad lus kyi/ 
37a1(phal chen): rgyas par byed pa'i phyir gter chen po'i tshogs kyis bstan pa la gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ci ltar dam bu'i sems can gyi khams thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas rim 'gro byed pa'i phyir/ rgyun
37a2(phal chen): gyi rnam par bsam gyis mi khyab pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i bstan pa rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i yang dag par ston bI
37a3(phal chen): byar dge ba'i bstan pa la rab tu gnas par gyur nag/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid che ba thams cad dang khyu mchog gi mthu' phyung ba yang dag par
37a4(phal chen): bstan pa'i phyir rani po che thams cad kyi bstan dang / spos thams cad kyi bstan dang / me tog thams cad kyi bstan dang / gos thams cad kyi bsta na dang / 'phreng ba thams cad kyi bstan dang / nor bu rin po che'i thams
37a5(phal chen): cad kyi bstan dang / bye dUr+ya sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsta/ na dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i bstan tshad med pa'i bsdu na dang / 'gro ba thams cad ma lus par rgyan pas rnam par bstan dang / 
37a6(phal chen): rdo rje'i bdan thams cad la 'khod pa'i gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i bstan pasbyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i byang chub sems
37a7(phal chen): kyi bstan rab tu thob cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir yong su sde'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtugs kyi sbyin pa byed cing dbang phyug gi lus la dga' ba'i gdug
37a8(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyan chen pos shin tu brgyan pa bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong khyad du 'phags shing dbang po chen po'i yo byad tu bya ba rani po che'i dra ba can dril bu'i bra bas kun nas bskor ba/ rin po chena'i srad bus gser gyi dril bu sbyangs ni
37a9(phal chen): bsgra byung bas/ rin po che bye du rgya'i 'phreng ba rab tu sbyangs pa/ nye bar 'khor nas rnga'i sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ gser gi pra ba rnam par dag pas g.yogs shing brgyan pa/ rin po che'i 'bru grangs pas sbas pa/ 
37b1(phal chen): rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas sna tshogs su bris shing brgyan pa/ a ka ru dang tsan dan dang spos kyi dam pas sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong tu mas nye 'khor dri zhim par bsgoms shing gdugs pa 'dzam bu chu klung
37b2(phal chen): gi gser ltar 'od gsal zhing dag pa/ rgyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mtha' yas pas rgyan pa/ de bas kyang ches lhag pa'i gdugs bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong grangs med pa dag kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa
37b3(phal chen): byed cing / sems can gyi gtso bo mngon tu gyur pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten rgyan pa'i phyir ram/ chos bcol ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang dge ba'i gshe gnyen 'am/ 
37b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' chos btsun par smra ba dag gam/ pha dang ma 'am dge 'dun dkon mchog gam/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa 'am/ sbyin pa'i gnas kyi gang zag sna tshogs sam/ slob dpon dang bla
37b5(phal chen): ma dang / byang chub kyi theg pa 'grub pa 'am/ de la zhugs pa/ dag gam/ dkris 'ongs pa dang / bkres pa slong ba dang / len pa da ga la 'dul ba dang / yongs su gtong ba sbyin pas byed pa'i tshe/ dge
37b6(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yong su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi g.yog pa rab tu thob ste/ dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dge bar g.yog par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang / nye/ 
37b7(phal chen): ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su 'das te/ yon tan dang ye shes kyis mngon par bkab par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gi rdul dang mun pa dang yongs su gdung ba thams cad las rnam par
37b8(phal chen): 'das te/ lus shin tu btab par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis ltan bsdug cing / sangs rgyas thams cad la mnga' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs
37b9(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos la log pa med par 'jug pa la brtson pas ma 'khrugs pa'i chos dkar pos shin tu btab par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi lus kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mthar thug te/ mngon par bka'
38a1(phal chen): bde lus dang ldan pas byur cig/ senas can thams cad 'jig rten kun la stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi zla res skyong bas 'dugs su reg par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad / 
38a2(phal chen): shin tu 'phags shing chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snying po ldan pas ye shes kyis rnam par snang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas dam pa'i la bsod nams thams cad kyis mchod pa'i phyir gdugs
38a3(phal chen): su 'os par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi bdugs rnam par sangs rgyas pas gdugs kyi dam par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pa byed bI
38a4(phal chen): tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa de dag sems can thams cad kyis chos la dbang ba 'i bdugs yang dag par gzung ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngol/ gdugs cig nam mkha' thams cad kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ chos
38a5(phal chen): kyi dbyings kyis mthur gdugs pa'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyung mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag parabastan pa'i las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi
38a6(phal chen): dbyings thams cad du gdugs gcig gis brgyan te de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// gtugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan yid du 'ong bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la mngon
38a7(phal chen): par dga' ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par gdugs kyi rgyan kyis kun tu g.yog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la mos pa'i sems can thams cad dang 'gro
38a8(phal chen): pa'i tshogs thams cad gdugs thams cad kyis dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// rin po che'i thams cad kyi gdugs sku tshogs rjod du med pa yang brjod du med pa yang brjod tu med pas sangs rgyas gcig la
38b1(phal chen): phul bas sangs rgyas brjod du med pa'i gdugs phul bar sems shing yongs su bsnga'o// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par byang chub par 'phags pa'i gzugs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad bkab ba'i phyir
38b2(phal chen): swA'o// sangs rgyas kyi sku ji snyed 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa na mkha'i mthur thugs pa zad na bzhugs/ thams cad la gdugs kyis bkab ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// nor bu/ 
38b3(phal chen): rin po che thams cad kyis rgyun pa'i gdugs dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'phreng bas rgyus shing klubs pa dang / spos thams cad kyi mchog gi drim po'i ngad 'byung ba'i gdugs dang / rin po che tham
38b4(phal chen): cad kyis rnam par spras pa'i gdugs dang / rgyan 'dzes shing rnam par dag pa'i gdugs dang rgyun tshad med pa yang dag shing rgya che ba dang / gser gyi dri ba kun nas g.yogs par rgyan pa/ bral bu'i dra bas kunas
38b5(phal chen): sbyangs pa'i sgra yid du 'ong ba'i zhing snyan par byung ba'i gtugs dang / ye shes bsgrubs pa med bcing / chags pa med pa'i gdugs dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon par dga' ba'i gtugs yongs
38b6(phal chen): gtang ba'i phyir yongs su sngo ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtugs kyi sbyin pas yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la ye shes mchog gi gdugs
38b7(phal chen): kyis mngon par dag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan kun nas g.yogs shing rab tu brgyan pa'i phyir yongasu bsngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang yon tan dang dgongs pa dam pa rnams par
38b8(phal chen): dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// rini po che mtha' yas pa la dbang sgyur ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi thams cad la ye shes kyis dbang skur ba kun tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su
38b9(phal chen): bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis mngon par g.yogs par yongs su bsngo ba'i don du yongs su bsngo'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi ye shes mchog gi gtugs rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgya
39a1(phal chen): thams cad kyi bstobs bcus bla re bris pa'i gdugs su 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dpyis thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gis g.yogs par bya ba'i phyi'i yongs su bsngo'o// 
39a2(phal chen): chos thams cad nu dbang phyug tu dbang sgyur ba'i dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings mthu chen pos sems kyi rgyud thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// blo yangs dang sems rgya chen pa thob par bya ba'i
39a3(phal chen): phyir yongs bsngo'o// yon tan tshad med pas bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// yon tan tshad med pas 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// yon tan thams cad kyis sems mngon par dag
39a4(phal chen): ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyis 'gro ba'i thams cad mngon tu bar dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// ye shes chen pos mnyam par dgab pa thob pa'i bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems
39a5(phal chen): can thams cad kyis bsngo ba'i tshul la mus par tho bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su snga'o// sems dang bsam pa rnam par dag sa 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// bsam pa dge ba dang yid kyi drag
39a6(phal chen): po rnam par dag pa dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo'o// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsngo ba chen pos mngon par dag pa'i 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ses
39a7(phal chen): dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i bya ba'i phyir ban rin po che sna tshogs rnam par tha dad pa'i yu ba can/ rin po bache'i dra 'u'i thabs 'a bral ba'i sgra yis du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ snam bu rin po me rnam pa sna tshogs
39a8(phal chen): bsgyangs pa kha dog dang mtshan pa sna tshogs kyi sna bus rgyas cing bsgreng ba/ gser gyi tha bas kun nas smyung shing klubs pa/ gse gri dril bu'i sgra yad du 'ong byung ba/ dri'i bu mer ka'i dra bas shin tu rgyal ba'i rgyal man
39a9(phal chen): dang ba dan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kha dog tha dad pa/ mtshon tha dad pa/ shan tu 'tho ba rin po ches rnam par rgyan pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo zla gam gyis 'dzes par brgyan pa/ 'jam
39b1(phal chen): bu chu blo gi gser gyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bcug pa/ 'od gzer rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba/ rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan gyis sa thams cad kun tu yog pa/ rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam par du ma 'od dang ldan pas rab tu rgyam
39b2(phal chen): pa'i rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs bsgreng ba'i rgyan de lta bu dag 'dzag rten gi khams thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan gyis kun tu khyab pa'i bya bar dang / 'jig rten gi khams chom
39b3(phal chen): kyi dbyings thams cad kyis klas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing namakha'i dbyings thams cad 'byam klas pa la gnas pa/ yangs pa kun tu rgyal mtshan gi sbyin pa yongasu gtang bar mos pas/ 'jig rten gi khams thams
39b4(phal chen): cad rgyal bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nga bso dang mos pa'i khyad par rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom lnga ngan 'das mngon tu gyur pa'i rnams la 'bul ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs
39b5(phal chen): pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten nam/ chos dkon mchog mchod pa 'am/ dge 'dun dkon mchog la 'bul ba'o// dge ba'i dra shes gnyen la byang chub sems dpa' rnams sam/ nyan thos
39b6(phal chen): dang rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/ 'khor gyi tshigs su gyur pa 'am/ gang zag gi rnam pa gzhan su yang rung ste/ bslong ba thams cad la rim 'gro bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa yongasu gdung ba dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sbyin pas
39b7(phal chen): yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di lar 'ongs spong ste/ dge pa rna pa 'dis sems can thams cadang ye shes tu rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan lajug pa med pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams thams cad
39b8(phal chen): yang dag par bskong ba'i rgyal mtshan can tu gyur nag/ sems can thams cad chos kyi go 'phang bris pa/ sbed pa'i chos nyid kyis chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar gyur cig/ sems can
39b9(phal chen): thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi chos yang dag par 'dzin pa'i chos can tu gyur te/ rin de che'i bzhi las sangs rgyas kyi chos bris pa'i dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun
40a1(phal chen): lA mar me snang bar gyur te/ rgyal mtshan shin tu 'phags par gyur cig/ sems can rna thams cad bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyir thugs pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan can tu
40a2(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bdud thams cad kyis mi mthun pa'i chos can tu gyur te/ ye shes dang stobs kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rgyal mtshan thams
40a3(phal chen): cad mi lhung bar snang bar gyur te/ ye shes mthu che ba'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag par gyur te/ ye she
40a4(phal chen): kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ma chod pa la rtson zhing rgyal mtshan sna tshogs rab tu bsgreng bas sangs
40a5(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi'i rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyis rgyan dang ldan par gyur cig/ ses can thams cad zhags pa thub par dgu bcu rtsa drug gi rgyal mtshan
40a6(phal chen): gyis dben zhing sems 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu thob par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i
40a7(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i snong brgya che gang yangs pa dang ba semams cad dang ldan par bya ba'i phyi'i yongs su bsdu'o// byang chub se mas dpa' bgrus ca kyi
40a8(phal chen): papadang rnam par 'phrul pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa gang tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa rnam par dag pa thob par bya ba'i phyi'i yongs su bsngo'o/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i rkyen
40a9(phal chen): rin po che thams cad gtong ba la mos pa dang / sems can thams cad nor gyis phyugs par byed pa dang / rin po che'i 'dzod thams cad 'byed par dang / rin po che'i gtang thams cad gdong ba dang / ran
40b1(phal chen): po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi sbyin pa byed pa dang / rin po che kun gyis sems can thams cad la khyab par byed pa dang / rin po che'i tshogs thams
40b2(phal chen): cad pangs par mi sems pa'i yid kyis gtong ba dang / rin po rje'i tshogs thams cad 'thor ba 'dra/ rin po che thams cad yongs su gtong bar sems bskyed pa'i tshe/ srog chags bye ba lag khrug
40b3(phal chen): stong blangs med pa la rin po che byin pas yongs su bzung ba'i/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag myur yongs snga ste/ sems can thams cad dran pa'i rgyud rmongs pa med cing / sangs rgyas mthong bya rab tu thob pa
40b4(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas zad kyi chos kyi 'dzod 'dzin pas/ chos dkon mchog gi snang ba rab tu thob gyur cig/ sangs rgyas cad sbyin pa dang / yongs su gtong ba shin tu brdzu
40b5(phal chen): bas dge 'dun dkon mchog yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems rin po
40b6(phal chen): rje rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rmongs pa med par gzhol bas yin/ rin po che la zhugs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
40b7(phal chen): ye shes rin po che chang med pa yang dag par bston par bya ba'i phyir byang chudu sems dpa'i yon tan rin po na grangs med pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig+sas sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po
40b8(phal chen): mngon par 'ayang bsdu pa' btsun byas/ yon tan na po tshe mtha' yas pa'i sngags dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes rin po me shin tu yangs pa'i mtha' thug pa/ ye shes rin po che bcu dus
40b9(phal chen): gi snyoms par 'jug pa rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rin po che la rnam par sangs rgyas pas rin po me dam pa'i sbyin pas gnas kyi mchog tu gyur cig/ sems
41a1(phal chen): can thams cad tha dad pa'i yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa'i 'dzod kyi chos rin po che rab tu bstan pa la rtson pas rini blo ma'i dbang po dam par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
41a2(phal chen): po de dag yongs su rtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spyan rin po che'i dbang po dam par gyur cig ces de ltar rnam par dag cing nyams pa med pas ye shes dam pa rin po che yongs su
41a3(phal chen): rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang yan lag dang nying lag thams cad rgyan kyis shin tu brgyan pa/ lus lta na bsdug pa rnam par dag cing mi
41a4(phal chen): 'thun pa med pa'i rgyun gyis lus shin te brgyan pa/ rin po n+de'i rgyan sna tshogs rnam par tha dad pa bye ba khrag khrig rgyu spong gis shin tu rgyan pa/ semam can thams cad kyi lus rgyan+ta b+har can pa/ sems can thams/ 
41a5(phal chen): cad la 'du shes kyis 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang sangs rgyas kyi bde ba thams cad stobs pa dga' ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rab tu dag 'a bar byed pa/ de dag rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag sems
41a6(phal chen): can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rkyen yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar/ 
41a7(phal chen): yongs su bsdu'o// sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyan rnam par dag par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan tu red par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsod nams kyis rgyud kyi mtshan rnam par dag pa'i dang ldan/ 
41a8(phal chen): mtshan gyim lus shin tu rgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams bdu bsod nams rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa'i lus can tu red de/ lus mtshan gyis shin tha rgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad du
41a9(phal chen): kyi nams can pa kyis khyen pa dang ldan dang / thas bcan pas mi turnam kya gro pajam sum med pa yi pa'i/ ses dang 'a dag 'i shes pas rapa tshangs
41b1(phal chen): shAn gyu / du mas pa du'ong shi ma dus bya ma tsa can pan smras da ma sa / sems
41b2(phal chen): mas kyis kyi n+d+ha rnaMs 'a 'gro sun cu gyi rjes nasakyithams cad sa tsha'i 'dzi m-i bar ldan pa dang ldan pa gyu / sems ca thams cangs sa
41b3(phal chen): na mas par 'du ya sems san cu // sems can rnas nam du mams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis zas ra tu nga bye / gzugs thams cad kyi rkyen gyis ya du rgyan pa
41b4(phal chen): sems can thams cad sangs rdzus kyi ma shes kyis rgya gan tu brgyan pas sems ye shes kyis yang dag par brgyan par dang ldan par gyur ci grwa ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi
41b5(phal chen): rgyan de dag yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa bded/ sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa thams cad kyi yan tan dang ye shes kyi rgyan yongs su rdzogs te/ sems can thams
41b6(phal chen): cad kyi ris na nga rgyan dang rgyags pa dang / bregs pa med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang phyug la spyi bos nas dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang skur pa/ 
41b7(phal chen): cad pan dang gzugs pa'i na ba mye'i sbyin pa byed cing yongs su gtong ba dang / mngon par mdzes pa dang / sems can thams cad la ldan 'dogs pa dang / lus pa med pa'i yongs su gdong ba'i sems rnam par 'dzim/ 
41b8(phal chen): bar byed pa dang / spyan pas bsus pa cud yongs su bsgom pa dang/ sbyin pa la dbang bskur bas rab tu 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa'i ye shes la rab tu bsgob ba dang / btsun gtang ba'i ldang ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / 
41b9(phal chen): gdong ba'i sgo rgya cher byed pa'i tshe/ cod ngan dang gtsug gi rin po che yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo'o// dge pa'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid
43a1(phal chen): tu sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas dbang po thams cad la shin tu dang skur bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi gtsug gi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas spyi bo gtsug ging
43a2(phal chen): 'gro dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi yon tan gyi spyi bo'i mthar phyin pas ye shes rin po che mchog gis sems can thams cad yang dag par bsnyung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro'i
43a3(phal chen): kun gyi spyi bos phyag bya bar 'os shing ye shes rin po che'i mchog la yang dag par gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi skyid pa la dbang skur pa rab tu thob ste/ ye shes kyi gcod pan shin tu bcings par gyur cig/ 
43a4(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyis lta bar mi nus pa'i chos can du gyur te/ ye shes kyi nor bu rin po che mchog tu rab rgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spyi bor gyur pa'i ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos
43a5(phal chen): thams cad la rnam par lta bu'i chos can tu gyur te/ spyi bo shin tu ba tsun pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes rin po che/ rgya mtsho'i snying po rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing stobs bcu'i brgyan cod
43a6(phal chen): pan gyi 'go rab tu brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i khams kyi dang po nas bdud thams cad rnam par 'jom pa'i phyir sa'i dam pa la gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bstobs bcu'i mthar thug ste/ 
43a7(phal chen): chos kyi ye shes kyi spyi bo rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems cad thams cad mkhyed pa'i dbu zil gyis mi non pa'i snang ba rab tu thob ste/ rgyal po'i mchog dam par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
43a8(phal chen): chen po cod pan dang gtsug gi rin po che yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can gyi ye shes mchog gi 'byung ba nas rnam par dag pa dang / ye shes kyi cod pan dang nor bu rin po che rab tu thob pa'i phyir yongs su bsngal/ 
43b1(phal chen): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos btson rarang bcug cing / mtshon mas bcings pa'i sems can bsdug bsngal ba bsdug bsngal gyi khyim gyis bskor ba/ shing sgrog dang / lcags bsgrog dang / lcang gi/ 
43b2(phal chen): bcings pas gcings pa/ lus ljags thag gis brtags pa/ bsdam pa shin tu rgyu ba'i lus can mi bde ba'i bar lus shin tu mnar ba/ skyabs med par ltung ba bkres pa dang / skom pas nyen pa gos med pa/ mun tha
43b3(phal chen): g.yogs bcing khebs pa/ shin tu ke brla lcags sgrogs gis sgrogs pa de lta bu dag mthong ba nas/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can dang / rgyal po mig bzangs kyis ji ltar byas pa bzhin du/ bdag dang 'khor tu ban pa
43b4(phal chen): nor thams cad dang bcas par yongs su btang ste/ byin pa nas bcoM na ra de nas sems can de dag yongs su thar bar byed do// de btson ra de nas sems can de dag thar bar bya ba'i nas kyang nor gyi sbyin pa thams pa mngon lnga
43b5(phal chen): byin nas/ sman dang sman pa dang sngags kyi rnam par lus nad med/ par byas te/ bde ba dang yid dga' ba la rab tu bkod nas chos rin po/ che thos par byas te/ dga' ba'i gtam gis dge ba'i rtsa ba la bkod
43b6(phal chen): nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa las mi nyams par byed do// de de ltar sems can btson ra nas dkye bas yang dag bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dge 'di ltar yongasu sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad
43b7(phal chen): srid pa'i bcings pa dang / zhags pa las shin tu grol bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes mthong bas pha rol tu phyin pa cing 'khor ba'i rgyun shin tu chad par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bag la nyal ba'i shin
43b8(phal chen): tu bcom pa ste/ kun nas 'khor ba'i dang rnam par bral bas ma rig pa'i mun pa dang rab rab dang / lang tog rnam par bskul ba'i rab rib med pa'i ye shes yang dag par mthong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba/ 
43b9(phal chen): kun gdon par bya ba'i ye shes kyi mthar thugs par gyur te/ khams gsum pa'i bcings pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gdan par byas pa'i ye shes bsgrubs pa med pa mthong
44a1(phal chen): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing nyon mongs pa'i bcings pas thams cad shashin du shigs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rlom sems kyi g.yo ba rnams pa thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir g.yo ba med
44a2(phal chen): pa'i ye shes la yang dag par gzhol bas g.yo ba dang / rlom sems kyi bcings pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad du chags pa med par gnas shing / 'dod pa'i dri ma thams
44a3(phal chen): cad dang bral te/ 'dod pa'i bcings pa thams cad rnam par spangs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsam pa sangs rgyas thams cad la btang bas lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu grol bar gyur cig/ sems can thams
44a4(phal chen): cad chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs nga pa dag tu sems chags pa med pa dang / grol ba zhing bcings pa med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gi khams thams cad tu 'gro/ 
44a5(phal chen): po thams cad yongs su smin pa'i byed pa dang / gtugs pa dang / theg pa chen po la 'god pa'i phyir rnam par rgyu bzhing byang chub sems dpa'i ma ngon par shes pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dong bar gyur cig
44a6(phal chen): ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad brtson ra drang / brtson ra nas bkye bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad shin tu grol zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thos
44a7(phal chen): cad kyi ye shes kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsdu'o// 'di ltar yang sems can la la zhig srog dang bral ba'i phyir sad du khrid pa/ sdug bsngal gi rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gis mi zad pa'i drang bcings pa lngas
44a8(phal chen): bcings pa/ skye bo rgya brag stong gis kun nas bskor cing 'dzam bu'i grong du gtogs pa snga tshugs nas bshal zhing bkrig gnyen gshes kyi rgud dang 'dza'i ba'i rgyud thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa/ rul bris gtsab cing
44a9(phal chen): gsheg pa/ gsal shing bsgreng ba la bskyon pa lus thams cad kun nas glegs te/ me 'bar ba'i nang du dong ba 'am/ bsdug bsngal gi rnam pa mi bde ba thams cad kyis mi bde bar bya ba dang / gtse ba sna tshogs thams
44b1(phal chen): cad tu bsgreng ba zhig skya byang chubs sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mthong ba'i gyur na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bsad par bya ba deng don tu lus yongasu gtong ba ste/ ji ltar byang chub sems
44b2(phal chen): dpa' mi 'pham pa dang / rgyal po khyad par 'gro bas ji ltar byas pa dang de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan rnams kyang sems can bsang ba blu ba'i don du lus rtong zhing / sdug bsngal gi tshor ba thams
44b3(phal chen): cad nyams su len par de bzhin tu rab tu gtong zhing byed bcing tshig 'di skad du smraso/ khyod kyis mi bde ba 'di dag bdag la gyis shig/ lus 'di yongs su gdang gis nga'i srog gcad par gyis shig nga la ni tse byas so chog kyang mi mnyan
44b4(phal chen): pa med gyis/ khyed kyis mi 'di la ci bya bar 'dod pa de las grangs med pa'i gyur bu sdug bsngal gyi rnam pas gtse ba thams cad kyis mi bde ba sna tshogasu gyis shig ces te 'di ltar bdag gis gsad par bkri ba mthong yang bdag
44b5(phal chen): gi lus dang sreg g-i sa thu pa ni bdag la nul dang mi 'dra'o/ da de ci byar zhen/ bdag gis ni sems can thams cad la dmigs te/ 'phrob dathams cad bskul ba'i phying thams cad mkhyen pa'i nying du sems 'byed
45a1(phal chen): sa lta bu'i mi 'a thams cad las 'das par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi shing dam pa'i drung du phyin cing 'dzags pa med pa'i bdud kyi sde thams cad rnam par 'thor bas bag tsha ba dang 'jigs shing
45a2(phal chen): bsgrag pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'jigs pa med pas rnam par dag cing khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pas 'khor gyi 'jigs pa dang bag tsA ba thams cad
45a3(phal chen): dang grol bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las la yang bar spyod cing 'gro ba'i thams cad kyi nang na sgrubs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i seng ger gyur cig cig/ sems can thams
45a4(phal chen): cad skye bo kun yongs su bskyob pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'gro ba kun 'jigs 'jigs pa'i khang par zhugs par gyur cig ces de ltar bsod par gyur pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi
45a5(phal chen): lus dang srog gtong ste/ zlos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i btson ra'i bsdug bsngal kun spangs na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba mi spangs pa'i phyir yongasu bsngo'o// 
45a6(phal chen): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las 'go las gtsug pud dang thor bag tu bcas pa bslangs na/ rgyal po gtsug na rini ngo che dang / byang chub sems dpa' yan lag dam pa
45a7(phal chen): shin tu 'phags pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis ji ltar byin pa de bzhin du des slong ba de dag mthong nas/ gtong bar mos bar chag dge bas thor bag dang gtsug bud du bcas te khyer cig
45a8(phal chen): ces stobs shing / kye tshur sheg bdag gi 'go las gtsug pud dang thor pag tu bcas pa long shi'i ces nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dzam bu'i gling na btsun pa ma'i dam pa des yad rtse gcig tu byas te/ yad ma 'khrug
45a9(phal chen): pa dang / yid ma 'bres dang las gzhan la mi sems pa'i yid dang / 'jig rten la 'phags pa'i yid dang / rab tu zhi ba'i ya di dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yidi dang / dag pa'i yid dang / brang ba'i yid dang / waM
45b1(phal chen): la rtsod pa'i yid kyis gtsug pud dang thog bag tu bcas pa'i dge slong ba la gtong ba'i tshe/ gtsug pud dang thor bag tu bcas par rtson gyis phog ste/ mgo las phab nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs
45b2(phal chen): te/ rim gro dang bcas pa'i lus kyis sor mo bcu thal mo sbyor te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ong ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa rjesu dran pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / dga' bas rnam
45b3(phal chen): bar 'phel ba'i lhag bsam pa dang / chos kyi yongs su rgyas pa'i yid kyis dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas rengs par mi 'gyur ba'i yid kyi dbang po dang / bsdug bsngal gi tshor ba skye bar mtshan nyid dang / tha dad par 'o
45b4(phal chen): du chud pa dang / tshor ba gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa de dag thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya bar rab tu shes pa dang byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad dang / rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur
45b5(phal chen): pa'i gtong ba'i sems dang / sems can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du skyed pa'i las phyir mi ldog pa'i dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i lhag/ pa'i bsam pa'i rnam par thob pas gzhan gyi drong mi 'jog pas/ dge
45b6(phal chen): ba'i gshes gnyen gyis bstan pa'i tshul la gnas te/ gtsug bud dang thor bag tu bcas pa mgo las phog ste/ yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de ltar yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i gtsug
45b7(phal chen): gi mchod rten tu gyur te/ gtsug gtor ltar mi snang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sma shin tu phra ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par stsal ba'ing sgra rdo rje'i nag po'i dam pa ltar bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sku stug byed
45b8(phal chen): sgra 'tshams legs pa dang / skra snum par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro legs pa las shin tu legs par skyes pa'i ska rab tu 'jam pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skra dga' 'khyil pa ltar g.yas phyogs su
45b9(phal chen): 'khyil cing dpal gyi be'u bkra shis kyi sgra dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa las rnam par 'das shing / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'i sgra thob par gyur cig/ sems can rnams
46a1(phal chen): cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams tu 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par rang gi sgra las 'od gzer rab tu 'gyed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi dbu shin tu rnam par dag pa ltar sgra shin tu 'dzes par gyur cig/
