46a2(phal chen): sems can thams cad sems ma nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi dbu bsku dang dbu lta bur 'dzes pa dang ldan pas/ spyi bo la gzhag pa'i mchod rten 'os par sgra dang / ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi dbu ltar chags pa med
46a3(phal chen): pa'i sku mdzes par skyes pas mun pa med pa'i dang / rdul gas chags pa dang / ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug pud dang thor bag tu bcas pa yongasu gtang bas/ yang dag par gzung
46a4(phal chen): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis ltar shin tu zhi ba'i sems yong su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs bu'i mtha' gtugs pa'i bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems
46a5(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po slong ba rnams la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa 'a dga' ba byed pa dang / rgyal po zla ba 'od dang de ma yin pa'i byang chu rab sems dpa' tshad med pa gzhan dag gis gtong ba'i sems mig yongasu
46a6(phal chen): bskyang ba'i sems dang / ye shes kyi mig g.yongasu sbyangs pa'i blo da / chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa'i yid kyis gnas dang / bla na/ med pa'i sangs rgyas mngon tu gyur pa'i yid kyi rnam pa dang / mngon par shes
46a7(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa'i yongs su bsngo ba dang / ye shes kyi skye ba ched la yang dag par gtang bas sems dang dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par smin pa dang / gtong ba'i sems dang / zhe sdang med pa'i
46a8(phal chen): mig gis dad pa mi zlogs pa'i dbang dang / slong ba rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan la gzhol bas byang chub sems dpa'i sems theg pa chen po dang / khyams pa dang / snying rje yongs su bsgoms
46a9(phal chen): pa dang / dbang po drug shin tu bsgoms pas spong ba rnams la mag byin pa de bzhin tu de sangs rgyas mag yongs su gtong ba zhing chos de lta bu la zhugs pa'i sems kyis slong ba dang 'dod pa dag la sbyin pa byed cing mchod sbyin gyi
46b1(phal chen): don la 'jug pa dang / chos kyi mthu shin tu skyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dga' bar lnga pa dang / bag med pa'i sred pa rnam par bzlog par byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba dang / 'dod pa cing sna chog
46b2(phal chen): mthong bas rang gi dga' ba khong du chud par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dag pa myong bar byed pa dang / ci spangs pa'i dngos pos kha dog mi stong bar ba dang / mi gnyis pa'i sbyin pa rjes su bsrungs pa dang / rlom sems
46b3(phal chen): med pas shin tu sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / spong ba rnams kyis dngos po kyi bslabs pa sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad
46b4(phal chen): 'gro ba'i thams cad kyi mig tu gyur te/ mig gis/ dam par gyur cig yang sems can thams cad ye shes kyi mdzod shin tu yangs pas nyams pa med pa'i mig tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad snang ba mi 'phrogs pa dang / 
46b5(phal chen): ldan zhing sha'i mig rnam par dag pas yongs su grub par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad shi 'pho dang skye ba shes shing lha'i mig rnam bar dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i
46b6(phal chen): shes kyi su so zhi'i chos kyi mig rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams nad gtong ba thams cad rnam par rton pas shes rab kyi thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir/ 
46b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan pa ni myur tsagr-i/ sems can thams cad chags pa med pa'i mig gis mthar thug ste/ kun tu ltalnga ba'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems can gyi khams yongs su shes shing rab
46b8(phal chen): mi ldan pa ma // sem canams pad mangs ban mngar ba'ade bzhi gshegs bya bye bas parnashes pa med pa'i tshig nga lda par gyur 'i sa de ltar byang chub sengs dpa' des dpa chen pom
46b9(phal chen): yongos su gtong ba na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshad kyimi ni ge chos sems can thams cad 'angs su bsngo bal nye bar 'dod do// shin du byas bachen pa'i 'do/ sangs rgyas pal po che zhes byang
47a1(phal chen): bam po sum bcu bdun pa'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'dun med pa'i spyi gtsug gis yongs su btong ba bzhin du/ slong ba nye bar 'ongs pa la/ 
47a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa blangs pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su rigs dang ldan par 'byung bas// sangs rgyas kyi rigs su 'byung bas sbyin pa'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su dran
47a3(phal chen): pa'i spyod pa la brtson pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mthun par skyes pa dang / dbang po dang / ye shes dang yon tan gyis shin tu btsun pa dang / khams gsum ma dag cing snying po med pa la snying po rab tu rtogs pa dang / sangs rgyas byang
47a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' lta ba rab tu thob pas rang gi lus la chags pa med pa'i sems dang / gnas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rjes su dran par gnas pa dang / dul ba'i dang zhi ba'i sems dang / dbang po'i rgyu ba shin tu zhi ba dang / 
47a5(phal chen): 'gro ba dang / myang ngan thams cad nas sems can thams cad gdon par sems pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams dang 'byung gnas/ dang / rgyud chen po brjod pa rgya mtshos gtong ba'i sems can yangs par byas pa
47a6(phal chen): dang / don la rnams par nye bar chos dang / 'gon po thams cad kyi laMtu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug la ye shes kyi spyod pa dang / rang gi lu sa snying po l+la snying po glang ba'i blos yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rna ba dang sna
47a7(phal chen): yongasu btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di lta bu yongs su bsdu ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi sgra rnam par rig par bya ba la chags pa med pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ se
47a8(phal chen): can thams cad kyis sgra thams cad skad ji lta ba bzhin tu shes par bya ba'i phyir bsgrubs pa med pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi snyan dang ldan pas thogs pa med pa'i rna ba dag ldan par gyur cig/ sems
47a9(phal chen): can thams cad rna ba'i skye 'ched shin tu bsgoms pas rna ba rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rnam par shes pa zhi ba skye ba'i phyir bsgrubs pa med pa'i rnam pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams can sangs rgyas thos cad
47b1(phal chen): kyi gsung khong du chung ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyis la gzhol da'i rnam par dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i lus rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir gnas med pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sem
47b2(phal chen): can thams cad phyir dgol ba 'jig par byed pa'i shes pa la mi byed pa'i rnam pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rnab shin du dag par la dbang bsgyur bas kun tu 'jug pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems
47b3(phal chen): can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi san rang tu thob par bya ba'i phyir thob pas/ lha'i rnam pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rna ba yongs su btang bas yang dge dang bslus pa'i dge
47b4(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi rna ba rnam par dag pa'idage ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi rna ba rnam par dag pas phyir yongs su bsngos nas/ sna rnam par dag par yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can
47b5(phal chen): thams cad legs par mtho ba'i sna dang / dpe byad bzang po'i sna dang / mtshan bzang po'i sna dang / shin tu yid tu 'ong ba'i snang dang / rnam par dag pa'i sgra dang / rini byis gzhol ba'i sna dang / mdzes
47b6(phal chen): bar 'phags pa'i sgra dang / dgra thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i sna dang / ngo lta na bsdug pa'i sna dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shangs rab tu mtho ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams
47b7(phal chen): cad do la mi bsdu ba'i med pa'i dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo dang / chags pa med pa'i ngo dang / lha na bsdug pa'i ngo dang / mi mthun par med pa'i ngo dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngo dang / kha na ma tho ba'i med pa'i ngo dang / 
47b8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal byed dkyil 'khor lta bu'i ngo dang / kun nas lbu ba'i ngo dang / yid du 'ong zhing tshad med pa'i ngo dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna ba dang
47b9(phal chen): skalangs su gal las yang dag par bkru pa'i dge pa ma ba de dag se mam can thas can la yongs su sa pa/ tsanas sems ldan tham das sa rgyas kyi chos rnams cad dun la rgya ma dang / 
48a1(phal chen): ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu 'dus par 'gyur ba dang / ji nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu shes par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems
48a2(phal chen): can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu 'jug par gyur pa dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shin tu mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / ji nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs
48a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos kyi bsgo khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin du zil gyis mi non pa yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la
48a4(phal chen): snang ba thob par gyur pa dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par gyur pa dang / ci nas na kyang sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byind kyis rlabs pa'i lus
48a5(phal chen): dang ldan par 'gyur ba de lta bu de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs ngasu bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po bskyed pa zil kyis mi non pa'i sa la gnas te/ u du ma 'bar ra lta bu shi na
48a6(phal chen): tu dkon par sems pa'i sems rnam par dag bya dang / gtong / kha ma zad cing 'byam klas pa dang / dad cing klung sprugs te/ gang nga ba'i sems can dang / yongs su gtong ba'i blos mtha' yas pa dang / tul
48a7(phal chen): ba dang yongs su dul ba'i yid kyis gtong ba'i dbang po dang // gtong ba thams cad yongs su gtong ba mthar thug pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam dang / 'gro ba thams cad bde bar byed pa'i gtong ba'i 'bras bu dang gtong ba
48a8(phal chen): zin pa dang / gan du gtong ba dang / rab tu gtong ba dang / mchog tu gdong ba'i sems kyis rang gilus dang yan lag dang gdong gis kyang phan 'dogs pa dang / mi ston par gdong bar sems kyis rnam par de lta dun
48a9(phal chen): chos la rab tu gnas te/ ji ltar rgyal po me tog so dang glang po'i rgyal po che ba drug pas/ so ji ltar byin pa de bzhin du rang gi lus dang kha nas so yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su
48b1(phal chen): bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis mchod rten tu mchod pas 'os par gyur te/ 'che ba dkar po zhing rno ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rab tu thob pas somanyam zhing tshan
48b2(phal chen): bzang por gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la legs par zhugs shing dul ba'i sems kyis nye bar spyod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gtong gi dkyil 'khor lnga na bsdug
48b3(phal chen): tsang kha'i nang na so rnam par dag pa'i gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kha dang so dpe med par rnam par dag cing bzhin du dran pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad so bzang po'i gseb na/ spos zhim pon
48b4(phal chen): mchog grangs med pa ya tu 'ong ba'i dga' ba bskyed pa'i rang dbyung / pas yongs su dag cing so bzhi bcu tshang ba dang gyur cig/ sems/ can thams cad shan tu dul ba'i so rab tu thob cing / bkra shis dang dga' ba
48b5(phal chen): 'khyil ba'i pad mo sna tshogs kyis 'dzes par bris pa'i so dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gdong gi dkyil 'khor nas tshad med pa'i 'od zer snang ba byung bas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong mthong yas pa
48b6(phal chen): rab tu 'byung ba'i so dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kha zas la chags ma zhen cing kha na ma tho ba med par spyod pas sbyin pa'i gnas dam pa'i mthar thug par gyur de so'i thags legs shing 'bras can kha phye ba lta
48b7(phal chen): bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i dam par lung bsngon cing / so'i gseb kun nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i snang ba 'byung ba dang ldan par 'gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i so'i
48b8(phal chen): sbyin pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can ma lus par thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid du yang dag par bskyed pa dang / chags pa med pa'i rgyun kyis chos thams cad shes par rnam par dag pa'i bya ba'i phyir yongs
48b9(phal chen): bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la lce bslangs na/ ji ltar rgyal po bzhin bzangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis
49a1(phal chen): bkyang skye ba'i skye 'ched rnam par sna tshogs dag la gnas shing tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig rgya song grangs med pa de dang de dag yongs su btang bar gyur te de bzhin tu des kyang spong ba'i de dag rgyal po la 'os pa'i seng ge/ 
49a2(phal chen): gdan dag la bkod pa'ang slong bas mos pa'i sems kyis yangs tu 'ong zhing 'jam pa'i ngag dang / byams pa la spyod pa'i sems kyis rang gi lce gtong ba'i tshe/ gshe ba'i sems med pa dang / rma med pa'i sems dang / nyams pa
49a3(phal chen): med pa'i sems dang / rigs chen po'i rigs dang ldan pa'i sems dang // sangs rgyas kyi rigs su byung ba'i sems dang / byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa cing bzhag pa'i sems dang / rgyud 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang / 
49a4(phal chen): mthu stobs chen po'i shugs kyi sems dang / lus la sems dang / tshig tu brjod pa la chags pa med pa'i sems su byas te/ pus mo'i lha nga sa la gtsugs shing bdag gis kha nas lha phyung ste/ lus thams cad la slong
49a5(phal chen): ba dbang byed du bcug nas/ chag gnyen zhing 'jam pa dang / yaM/ tu 'ong ba dang / byams par spyod pas tshig tu brjod cing / ji nas kyang / khyed dga' zhing yid 'dre ba dang / 'gu zhing rangs par bdag gisi lce long la/ 
49a6(phal chen): gang tu dgos pa de'i dgos pa sgrubs shig ces nas/ de lce byin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ lce yongs su btang bas yang dag par gzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis
49a7(phal chen): sems can tshag gi tshul thams cad kyis shes par byed pa'i phyir lce shin tu yongs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu tshig bden pa gnyis su bya ba med pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ rdod/ 
49a8(phal chen): gi dkyil 'khyil 'khyabs pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho 'phrul pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bsngon pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab par byed pa'i/ 
49a9(phal chen): lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ro bro ba'i mchog shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing shin tu srab pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gi tshag shes pas the tsom gcod pa'i
49b1(phal chen): dA ri nges pa'i tshig gi dbyangs mtha' yas pa yod pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad lce'i 'dzad nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brjod tu med pa'i yang rjod tu med pa 'gyed pa'i phyir spang ba mtha' yas pa 'byung ba'i
49b2(phal chen): lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad rnam par nges pa'i spobs pa'i tshogs mi zad pas ston cing brjod pas chags shin tu nges par brjod pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spyod
49b3(phal chen): kun du brjod pa tshad med pa'i 'dzod kyi lce dang ldan zhing 'dul ba'i mtha' dang mnyam par sems can kun gyi tshig thams cad dang / sba ba thams cad rnam par 'grel ba'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams rgyang byung
49b4(phal chen): pa'i rjes su brjod pa'i tshig gi rgya mtsho thams cad la rab tu bzhugs bras dbyangs kyi tshogs dang tshigs gis rnam par shes pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spyod pa thams cad mngon par rjod pa
49b5(phal chen): ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing chos thams cad kyi tshi/ thams cad shin tu bston pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces de lta ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
49b6(phal chen): dmigs pa'i spyan lam la rab tu rtson pa de lce yongs su gtang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dge sems can thams can gyis bsgrubs pa med pa'i ye shes chags pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i
49b7(phal chen): yangs su brgya'o// de ltang yang byang nub sems dpa' sems dang chen po chos sems cad kyi dang nga 'gro lta bu'i le shes la 'ju cing sem can drangs cang 'dos su sgyu babyang chug pang nung pa rnyed ba dan
49b8(phal chen): thams cad kyim myos rgyal gyi 'gro dang ldan par bya ba'i bya bang dag par lta ba dang / ye shes rnam par dag pa'i 'grol yang dag pa lta ba dang / bsgrubs pa med pa'i ga yong su sgrub pa dang / sa dam pa'i dgarje
49b9(phal chen): lta ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dam pa 'go lta bu 'dod cing tshol pa dang / khams gsum pa thams cad kyis ltar med pa'i ye shes kyi 'go das pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / phyogs thams cad tu phyin pa'i ye ni/ 
50a1(phal chen): kyi rgyal po'i 'gro la mngon par mos par byed pa dang / chos thams cad dbang byed pa'i zlal gyis mi non pa'i 'gro yongs su grub par byed cing / de ltar du'i chos la spyod pa'i rtson pa'i byang chub sems dpal
50a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad kyi yongs su gtong ba'i tshul la slabs pa/ sangs rgyas la mos pa skyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu thob pa/ slong ba mtha' yas pas dga' ba'i yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan/ 
50a3(phal chen): pa/ yid kyi dbang po shin tu gsal ba/ rgyud rab tu dang zhing sems la yad shin tu dang ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' ba'i snang ba thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bskyed pa shin tu rgya che ba'i rgyud mi 'chad par sems// 
50a4(phal chen): pa gtong ba chen po gtong ba shin tu gtong pas gtong ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ dbang po shin tu dga' bas nye bar rten pa'i chos can/ lhag pa'i bsam pas yangs shing dge ba'i rgya che bas smin pa gtong ba la mngon par 'dor
50a5(phal chen): bde ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mchog dang / skyes bu dam pa ka shi'i rgyal po dang / de ma ya ni pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag kyang / 'gro yongs su gtod/ 
50a6(phal chen): bar gyur pa de ltar mgo gtong ba'i tshe 'gro yongs su gtang ba sa yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar sems can thams can kyis sangs rgyas kyi dbu rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su
50a7(phal chen): bsngo'o// spyi gtsug ltar mi snang ba dang / skye 'ched zlal gyis ma non pa dang / zhang thams cad tu mngon par 'phags pa dang / bum pa rgyas pa dang / dga' ba 'khyil ba dang / skra dang 'go rtog 'od dang / 'od zer sna tshog
50a8(phal chen): kyis rnam por rgyan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du rmad bya'i ba dang / dpal gyi be'us rgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbu dang ldan pa dang / sangs ye shes kyi 'ogo rtogs par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi mchog tu phyin
50a9(phal chen): pa'i mgo dang ldan pa dang / mgo rnams par dag pa dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mgo yongs su rdzogs pa byanga'i phyir yong su bsngo s+ho/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ogo yong su gtong ba'i
50b1(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar 'gro ba'i thams cad kyis chos kyis chos kyi mgo yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ye shes kyi yan lag dam pa rab du thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ses
50b2(phal chen): dpa' chen po slong ba rnams la dad pa'i lag pa thog mar 'gro ba dang / phan 'dogs pa'i tshul dang / chos spyod pa'i la brtson pas 'gro ba'adi ldog pa dang / rin po che'i lag pa thog mar 'gro bas lag pa gtong ba dang / skyod
50b3(phal chen): ba don tu yod pa byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod pa dang / lag shin tu brkyang zhing gtong ba'i sems mi 'khrugs pa dang / rim par spyad pa'i tshul shin tu nges pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis spyod
50b4(phal chen): cang lag pa yang bar gtong ba la mos pas lag pa yongs su da gtong ba dang / tshul gi bzhi chen po rab tu rten pa la spyod pa'i byang chub desems dpa'i yid dam/ dang / tshor bas ma nyams pa'i blo dang / ba dang // 
50b5(phal chen): 'gro ba ma ya ni bar 'gro ba las phyir ldog pa'i 'gro bas byang chubab tu se 'byung bas de ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rtson pa dang / rgyal po dga' ldan dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
50b6(phal chen): dpa' chen po gzhan tshad med pa dag kyang skye ba'i skye gnas sna tshogs dag na gnas shing lag pa yong su gtong bar gyur pa de lta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che yangs shing rgya che ba tshad med pa dang ldan zhing / sangs
50b7(phal chen): rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur ba/ chos kyi byung kyo bsgo rnam par bye ba 'jig rten gi khanas thams cad du khyang bur gtong ba'i lag pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin pa'i smon lam na
50b8(phal chen): soms skyed pa rtul med pa'i dang 'grubs kun nas 'askor ba med pa'i ye shes dang chos kyi lus rgyun mi 'chad bya/ mi shigs pa mi chang ba'i lus dang ldan pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi sgul ba/ dge ba'i bu shen
50b9(phal chen): gnyen gyis nye bar brtan pas/ sems spel ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spyad pa dang gcig tu gyur pa'i gtong bas byung ba'i dge slong ba la rga lag gi sbyin pa byed cing / yongs su gtong ba'i tsin/ 
51a1(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongasu sngo ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te rga lag yongs su gtong bas yongs su byan pa 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa de dag 'di
51a2(phal chen): ltar sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa thob pa cing rkang par rini po che'i lag pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ de dag rin po che'i lag pa sems
51a3(phal chen): can thams cad la sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes rab tu thob ste/ phan tshun gyi lus la rin po chen mthor bar gyur cig/ mngon par 'thor bar gyur cig/ rab tu 'thor bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
51a4(phal chen): cad tu khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi sman kyis sa rangs rgyas thams cad mchod par gyur cig/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang pha na tshun du zhe sdang med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / phan tshun byas
51a5(phal chen): pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ de dag sa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rjes su dong zhing 'jigs pa med pa la gnas te/ mngon par 'dus bya ba med pa'i phyir thams cad la lag na rin
51a6(phal chen): po che thogs pa dang / lag na spos thogs dang / lag na gos thogs pa dang / lag na gtugs thogs pa dang / lag na 'phreng ba thogs pa dang / lag na me tog thogs pa dang / lag na phye ma thogs pa
51a7(phal chen): dang / lag na ltab lhub thogs pa dang / lag na me tog mtha' yas pa thogs par gyur te/ kun nas bsgo dang ldan pa'i thabs la gnas shing / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par brtson pa'i sems dang / sangs
51a8(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing kun tu 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tu thogs pa med pa'i lag pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'o rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi lag pa mtshan bzang po dang / 
51a9(phal chen): ldan pa'i lag pa dang / 'od zer gi 'dzod mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba'i lag pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad lag 'thil gcig gis g.yog par byed pa'i lag pa dang / dra bas 'brel cing
51b1(phal chen): sen mo bzangs kyi ltar 'dug pa'i lag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi phyag shin tu yangs pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa byed par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon
51b2(phal chen): tan rgya mtsho thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / khas len pa'i ngang tshul can dang / slong ba thams cad la mngon par mos shing 'dod pas dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / dad pa chen po rab tu thob// 
51b3(phal chen): pa dang / slong ba 'bod par bston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pas rkang lag yongs
51b4(phal chen): su gtong ba byed cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi byang chub tshol ba'i tshe/ rga lag yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa 'di dag 'di ltar thar cing gtong ba'i don du yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub
51b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po thams cad mi'i na pa'i bsam pa dang / sems dang 'ad du ldan pa'i byang chub kyisas kyis rab tu dgi/ 'a ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par 'dod pa'i mi
51b6(phal chen): da na/ ngas sa par mi gyur ba'i khrims dang ldan paspang ba'i rnams cad la mngon pa ma pa'i sem dang ldan pa/ leg pa rnams lani ma snang ba'i rims da ldan ga tu chub semam
51b7(phal chen): smra na ma du klung su mas su na
52a1(phal chen): kha rang gi lus kyi khrag gtong ba'i tshe// khrag yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad chos dang ye shes kyi lus dang ldan zhing / byang chub
52a2(phal chen): sems dpa'i lus phun sum tshogs pa'i dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po dang 'dra bar dge slong gi lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad lus nyams pa med cing dag pa dang ldan te/ lus
52a3(phal chen): la rma med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyis mi 'phrogs pa'i sems dang ldan zhing sprul pa'i lta bu'i lus dang ldan par cig/ sems can thams cad 'od dang ba'i lus nyams pa med pa dang ldan 'an/ 
52a4(phal chen): yid tu 'ong ba'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gzhin gshegs pa'i sku mi gnas pa dang ldan zhing chos kyi dbyings su mngon par skyes pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad la rimi bro byed dri
52a5(phal chen): lus dang ldan zhing rin po che lta bu'i 'od yod par lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'chi bar med pa'i dbyings su chos kyi skyid pa la dbang skur ba'i lus dang ldan zhing ye shes dam pa'i lus dang ldan
52a6(phal chen): bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi/ lta na yod par skyes pas rin po che rgya mtsho lta bu'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems ca na thams cad 'jig rten kun gyis gtse bar gos pa med cing bar snang gi
52a7(phal chen): rang bzhin gi lus dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus la khrag gi spyod pa byed pa'i tshe/ ye shes kyi theg pa dang theg pa chen po la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de
52a8(phal chen): dag yongs su bsngo'o// dga' ba'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// yongs pa'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// dge' ba'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// rangs pa'i yid kyis yongasu bsngo'o// rangs pa'i yid kyis yongs su sde'o// / 
52a9(phal chen): spro ba'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// zhum pa'i med pa'i yongs su bsngo'o// bde ba'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// dang ba'i yid kyis yongasu bsngo'o// 'gu ba'i yid dang rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis dang / yid bde zhing rangs bI/ 
52b1(phal chen): skyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba'i sems gzhal tu med pa'i dge ba'i rnam par 'brel pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / mkhas pa'i skye bos/ 
52b2(phal chen): sbyin pa'i zla med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa'i 'jig rten gi bri ma stsal ba dang / slong ba thams cad kyis zad par mi nus pa'i nang gi lus nye bar blangs pa'i yongs su gtong ba dang / yon tan rin po ches yang
52b3(phal chen): dog par blangs pa'i dge ba'i 'byam klas pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yid dam gyis nye bar blangs pa'i sbyin pa'i tshogs chen po dang / slong ba thams cad kyi yid kyis 'dod par bsam pa dang / yang 'gyod pa med pa'i
52b4(phal chen): sems dang / sman pa'i la dmigs pa'i dngos pos shin tu brtags pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas rten dang / len pa rnams la sbyin pa'i yongs su gtong ba'i sems nyams pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon bur gyur pa
52b5(phal chen): pa lta bu 'du shos mngon par 'dzin pa dang / 'gro ba tha/ thams cad la mngon par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa la gnas pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
52b6(phal chen): brgyan thams cad dang 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i snying rje chen pos yongs su skyob pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub la mngon par gyur ba'i bstobs bcu rnam par dpyod pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
52b7(phal chen): ba dang / de lngar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon tu gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thums pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i ngo ro bsgrag pa dang / 
52b8(phal chen): tus gsum mngon par gyur pa'i dus thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang // dus gsum thams cad mngon du gyur ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i brgal par thug ge bar zhe non pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / yong su 'di 'cha
52b9(phal chen): pa med pas mngon par gyur pa'i sems can bskyed pa grangs med pas/ de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' phan pa tshol ba dang / rgyal po thams cad gtong ba dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan
53a1(phal chen): grangs med pa'i ngag kyang skye ba'i skye 'ched sna tshogs dag na gnas shing / sha dang rkang yongs su gtong ba de dag slong ba rnams lus las sha dang rkang yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ sha dang rkang yongs su gtong bas yang
53a2(phal chen): dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongasu bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po ltar 'khregs pa'i yang dag dang ldan cing mi shigs pa'i lus dang ldan pa
53a3(phal chen): gyur cig sems cad thams cad gseb med pa'i lus rab tu thob pas/ gsob pa ma yi ni pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus rnam par dag pa dang ldan par gyur sangs rgyas kyis rgyan
53a4(phal chen): ba'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis lus shin tu grub pas bsod nams rgya'i mtshan gyis lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i swA hA
53a5(phal chen): bcu'i tha ma dad cing ma nyams pa dang ldan te/ dpe' byang bzang po brgya bcus rnam par bris pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams/ cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsku rab tu thob pas mtha' las 'das
53a6(phal chen): tshad med pa'i lus dang ldan pa'i gyur cig/ sems ca na thams cad btud thams cad kyi dkrugs ma rab tu 'joms pas kun khyab pa'i spyod dang ShA can bzhing / thub pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams
53a7(phal chen): cad 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lus gcig par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad na mkha'i dbyings kun tu chos kyi bskus khyab par byed pa'i phyir/ chags pa med pa'i lus
53a8(phal chen): mngon par grub pa'i gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad shong ba'i lus dang ldan zhing / byang chub sems kyi lus dam pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen
53a9(phal chen): pa'i dmyigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i slong ba la bsha dang rkang yongs su gtong ba'o tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi bsku mtha' las 'das pa tshad med pa rnam par dag pa rab tu thob par bya gI
53b1(phal chen): phyi ri yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i rgyud brlabs pa'i sems dang ldan pa sbyin pa thams cad byin pas spyod pa'i sems dang ldan pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po thog/ 
53b2(phal chen): ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyin pa grub pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi basbyin pa'i rjes su bslabs pa'i sems can dang ldan pa/ sbyin po dang yongs su gtong ba'i thams ca
53b3(phal chen): kyis zad byi shes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas thams cad shin tu gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i las la rab gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams
53b4(phal chen): cad yid la bya bas mngon tu gyur pa'i gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ slong ba thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par rgyu ba rab tu mchod pa'i sems dang ldan pa de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yong su bskyo ba med pa dang / rgyal po
53b5(phal chen): g.yo ba med pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sem/ nyes dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag gis kyang snying yongasu gtang ba gyur pa de ltar slong ba'i kun nas 'ong ba rnams kyis bslangs nga
53b6(phal chen): rang gi lus las snying po yongasu pa gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa dang / spong ba dang thob pa byed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dgrol ba'i phyir/ stobs bcu'i byang chub migs
53b7(phal chen): par byed pa dang / smon lam chen pos nan tan tu byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas pa dang / smon lam yongs su mi gtong ba'i byin pa byed bI nang / smon lam chen blas rtsa ba de dag sems can
53b8(phal chen): thams can 'di ltar yongasu sngo ste/ sems can thams rdo rje'i rang bzhin lta bus yongs su bzung ba'i snying dpal gyi bye 'us rgyan pa dang ldan zhing / rdo rje'i ri 'khor yug thams cad ltar mi shigs shing rdo rje'i snying po lta bu'i
53b9(phal chen): snying dang ldan pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa'i snying dang thub par dka' ba'i snying dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa'i snying dang / dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan ye shes kyi snying po can gi snying dang / mthu' bo che chen po dam bI/ 
54a1(phal chen): sems kyis rgyal mtshan can gyi snying po dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi gtso bo lta bur mi 'phrogs pa'i snying dang / mthun po che lnga bu'i mi shigs pa'i snying po can gyi snying dang / bdud kyi las dang bdud kyi dpung dang / bdud/ 
54a2(phal chen): kyi sde rnam par 'joms pa'i snying dang / rtan pa'i snying dang / gzed mtho ba'i snying dang / dpa' ba'i snying dang / rtul phod pa'i snying dang / mi 'jigs pa'i mi skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i snying dang / rdo rje'i go tshe chen po yang dag par dgos pa'i
54a3(phal chen): snying dang / shin tu btsun pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i snying dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yong su rdzogs pas byang chub snang bar gyur pa'i snying dang / byang chub sems kyi shing drung du 'dug nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rjesu rtogs shing mo
54a4(phal chen): pa med par thams cad 'khyen pa nyid tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i snying dang / bstobs bcu mngon par byang chub rab tu thob pa'i snying po dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying gi sbyin pas yang
54a5(phal chen): yang dag par bzung ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis gos pa med pa'i bstobs bcu mnga' ba'i thugs phun sum// tshogs pa'i yongasu rdzogs pa dang ldan par yongs su snga'o// 'di ltar/ 
54a6(phal chen): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slong ba mngon par dad ba'i lta ba dang / gsal zhing dga' bar byed pa'i mig dang / byang chub dang nye ma par bya ba'i byams pa dang / ji 'dod pa'i slong ba phu dud tu bya ba'i spyi
54a7(phal chen): ba dang / rgyun mi 'chad par yid la byed pa'i gtong ba dang / lus la snying po med pas rtogs pas snying po blang ba'i sems dang / 'da' bar gyur pa'i lus rjes su dran par yid la byed pa dang / spyang khu dang wa dang khyis bza' ba'i
54a8(phal chen): lus su rab tu rtogs pa dang / gzhan la rag lus shing lus mi rtag par yid la byed pa dang / lus kyi rgyud thams cad khong tu chud pa dang / gzhan la dad pa'i sems dang / de lta bu'i chos de dag yid la bya ba la brtson pa de ji ltar
54a9(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' legs par byin pa dang / rgyal po sngag brtsal ba dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa'i ngag gis kyang slong ba rnams la rgyu ma dang / 'chin pa dang / 'khal
54b1(phal chen): ma dang / glo ba yongs su gtong bar gyur pa de ltar sgyu ma dang 'dzin pa dang / mkhal ma dang glo ba dag yong su gtong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' slong ba de dag la mi 'gebs pa'i mig gis lta zhing 'di ltar sems bskyed/ 
54b2(phal chen): de/ 'di ltar bdag gis lus mi rtag cing 'di ltar mi gtsang na/ 'on kyang rgyu ma dang 'dzin pa dang 'khal na dang glo ba lta bu dag kyang slong ba dag la dgongs pa ltar spyan par bya'o zhes de ltar bur yid la byed cing dga' ba'i rgyud dang / 
54b3(phal chen): de ltar chos nyid shes pa'i bsam pa dang / slong ba'i mthong ba de dge ba'i bshes gnyen tu 'du shes pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis lus snying po med pa de snying po blang bar 'dod de/ de lta bur yid la byed pa cing rab tu rtogs pa dang lta
54b4(phal chen): ba'i seMs kyis rgyu ma mchis pa dang / 'khal ma dang yar glo ba de dag yongasu gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su sngo'ini rgyu ma dang 'chin pa dang mkhal ma dang glo ba yongs su da
54b5(phal chen): pas yang dag par bsdu ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad ye shes kyi snying po'i lus dang ldan po zhing lus phyi nang shin tu gtsang zhing dgapar gyur cig cig sems can thams cad 'khyen pa'i smon lam yang dag
54b6(phal chen): par 'dzin pa'i phyir ye shes kyi lho dang yang dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nang spos zham mo'i mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing pha rol tu 'od zer rab tu 'gyeng ba'i lha na bzang ba'i lus dang / ldan par gyur cig/ sems
54b7(phal chen): nan thams cad rami gyis gzhol pa zhing mnyam pa'i lus kyi yan lag dang ldan te/ gzhu lta bu'i lto dang ldan pa'i lus su gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dge' bras/ lus shin tu skyes pas lus chos
54b8(phal chen): kyi zas dang ye shes kyis gso bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dga' ba'i lus dang / chos kyi lus kyis yang dag par spyod pas zad mi shes pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad tha dad pa yang dag/ 
54b9(phal chen): par shes pa'i chos sna ba dang ldan pas gzugs kyi snying pos lus kyi nang rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nang gi bsam pa'i rgyud shin tu sbyangs pas lus yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems
56a1(phal chen): can thams cad ye shes kyis ngoms par byed bcing chos kyi sman gyi char rab tu 'babs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang ye shes kyis rnal 'gyor khong du chud pa'i gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyi rol
56a2(phal chen): kyi lus 'gro ba thams cad la ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzes shing snang bar gyur pas nang gi lus dag cing zhing bar gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyu ma dang 'chin pa dang 'khal ma dang / 
56a3(phal chen): ba de dag rang gi lus la spong bar rnam la yongasu gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi lus phyi nang yongs su dag cing bgribs pa med pa'i ye shes la rab tu 'khod par thob par bya ba'i phyir yongasu
56a4(phal chen): bsngo'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar byang chub seMs dpa' chos kyi 'byung gnas dang / rgyal po bskar ma'i 'od dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan
56a5(phal chen): gis kyang yang dag dang nying lag dang rus pa slong ba da rnams la yongasu btang bar gyur pa de ltar/ yang dalag dang nying lag dang rus ba slongs pa slong ba rnams la gtong ba'i tshe/ slong ba mthong ma
56a6(phal chen): thag tu sems dga' ba dang / sems mos pa das sems drad pa dang / sems rab tu spyod pa dang / sems thar pa dang / byams pa'i sems dang / chags pa med pa'i sems dang / dag pa'i sems
56a7(phal chen): dang / slong pa rnams la rim gro bya ba'i sems rab tu 'thob ste/ de yam dag dang nyin log dang rus pa de dag slong pas slong ba la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar
56a8(phal chen): yongs su sngo ste/ rang gi lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag dang rus pa yongasu gtong bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems can thams cad rus pa dang sha dang khrag med pas lus dang ldan zhing sprul pa lta
56a9(phal chen): lta bu'i lus can tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad lus la thug pa med cing zil gyis mi non pas rdo rje lta bu'i stobs kyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chags pa med cing / grol ba dang bcings pa med
56b1(phal chen): ba'i ye shes kyi lus kyis byung ste/ thams cad 'khyen pa'i stobs dang chos su ldan pa'i lus phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dbang po tha mi dad cing gcad tu med pas rab tu thob pas ye shes kyi stobs kyi lus dang ldan
56b2(phal chen): bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi stobs dang dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas chos kyi stobs kyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad lus shig shig bor med pas yan lag shin tu brtan pa'i lus dang ldan
56b3(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun yongasu smin par byed cing 'dul ba la zhugs pas 'gro ba thams cad ji ltar mos pa'i lus dang yan lag gi byin gi rlabs dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mthu bo che'i yan lag dang nying
56b4(phal chen): lag yang dag par 'dzin pas stobs chen po dang ldan 'ang ni shes la gnas pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad cad cing dub pa med pa'i lus rab tu thob pas shin tu brtan par lus kyi rgyud 'brel ba dang ldan par gyur/ 
56b5(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad mthu dang rtson 'grus chen dang ldan pa'i lus kyis shin tu rten cing stobs dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ma/ tha' yas pa'i ye shes kyi khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa'i lus dang ldan zhing
56b6(phal chen): chos kyi lus kyi 'gro ba'i rnams cad du rnam par rgyan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad lan mtho ba med padi wAn don yod pa dang ldan te/ besod nams kyi stobs kyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams na
56b7(phal chen): gnas med pa'i ye shes kyi mthor thug gtugs te/ lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam pa byin kyis brlabs pa dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas kyis yongasu bzung ba'i ldan pa'i gyur cig/ 
56b8(phal chen): sa sa nga ma na lags shes sa pam la phyi mapa 'a
56b9(phal chen): nangs 'am 'i som sa ni bzung me sem sa sa med yig sa pa ma sa kya na ma su dang dranas na du mas ca
57a1(phal chen): cad ye shes brtan par gnas pa thob pas nga rgyal dang / rlom sems dang / dregs pa thams cad rgyun 'chad cing rnam par dag par lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad 'khyen pa'i theg pa la yang dag
57a2(phal chen): pa ji lta ba bzhin tu lus 'grub par gyur pas/ rtul zhugs dam por lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten du skye ba'i lus thams cad las rnams par 'das shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge bas byung ba'i lus
57a3(phal chen): su gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yan lag dang nyingadi lag dang / rus pa de dag slong ba rnams la yongasu gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems thams can gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes grub par
57a4(phal chen): bya ba dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yong su bsdu'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus la slong ba dag gis mdog dang ldan pa'i pags ba slangs pa'i tshe/ mtshon ma thogs pa'i slong ba mthong yang dag/ 
57a5(phal chen): bar byed pa'i dbang pos slong ba la lta zhing slong ba rnams la dran tu bzo ba'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag nas/ legasar gting ba'i bstan pa slong ba rnams bkod de/ slong ba rnams la rim 'gro'i 'du shes nye bar gzhog pa dang / len pa rnams
57a6(phal chen): la shin tu dkon pa'i 'du shes yang dag par skyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i bzhir gyur pa smon par bya ba yang dag par mthong bar sems shing / slong ba rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i sems kyis rtogs cing 'dzum pa dang ldan par lta bas slang
57a7(phal chen): ba rnams la lta zhing / tshur gsheg long shig ces bya ba'i tshigi brjod pas dang / slong ba rnams la bdag nyid ci dga' bar bya bar gtong ba de ji ltar byang chub sems dang 'dag pa'i snying po dang / ri dgas kyi rgyal po gser gi rtsa'i logs ldas
57a8(phal chen): mdog dang ldan pa'i bags pa/ spong ba rnams la yong su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can rnams la 'di ltar yongasu bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gri mingon par/ rnam par dag ngas shen/ 
57a9(phal chen): tu 'jam pa'i mdog dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rdo rje'i mdog thug par dga' ba'i kha dog dang ldan zhing / ma 'dres pa'i khadog dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'dzam bu nu klung gi gser gyi snying po ltar dag/ 
57b1(phal chen): dang tha man ga/ dmas thamams cad pa sa yin pa pa bya nas srung bas dpa nga bdag mthamar ma ma ma dang blan thu na sems sa panas cang sa cung deb zhe
57b2(phal chen): dru gzhan la dog gis rnam par dag cing rtog pa med pa'i dang pa'i/ dog dang / mdog gi mchog dang ldan pa'i mur cig/ sems can thams cad rang bzhin gis kha dog rnam par dag cing kha dog dang mdog gi dam pa dong ldan par gyur cig rjen
57b3(phal chen): can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byang bzang po rnams par bris shing / sangs rgyas kyi kha dog rnam par dge pas/ mdog dang kha dog rnam par dag cing shin tu rnam par gyur cig/ sems can thams can kha dog dang kha dog bzang po phun sum chom
57b4(phal chen): shing / shin tu 'gro ba kun du mdog gi snang ba rab tu 'gyed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jigs rten gi khams thams cad 'od zer byed kyis 'khor rjod cing med pa rnam par 'gyed pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan zhing kha dog 'od zer gyi
57b5(phal chen): pra ba can dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gzugs thams cad kyi kha dog rnam par dag ste/ mdog dang kha dog shin tu snum pa'i dang ldan pa'i gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus las mngon
57b6(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i bags pa spong ba rnams la yongasu gtong ba'i tshe/ dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yong su bsngon/ 
57b7(phal chen): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa sems la phyin ci log med pa dang / bzhin tu 'dzum pa zan 'di bde ba thob pa/ theg pa chen po la legs par gnas pa grags pa 'dod pa med pa'i spyani ba can/ snying zag pa nas sbyin
57b8(phal chen): bal brnas pa/ gang ba dang bachen po la 'di ra tu grags pa// 'dus pa'i bris la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ zag da dang 'dug pa'i bris dang thas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la rab tu zhugs pa/ de rjes
57b9(phal chen): chub sasas dpa ga de so bcum dang / 'a sa du'i gling ga zhag pa'is kyi 'dag des ngan par bya chu ba pam dadapar tha med ba gang gags tha mar mas dzasu gang bar byub des nga dang / de ni
58a1(phal chen): sor mo yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yong su sngo ste/ sor mo byin pa dang ci slabs pa'i dngos po btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thos
58a2(phal chen): rbad sangs rgyas kyi phyag sor tho bar gyur te/ sor mo ring bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sor mor mi byas gzhol ba dang legs par grub pas sor mo zlum pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sen mo gang ba'i so
58a3(phal chen): mo rnam par dag par dang ldan zhing sen mo zangs kyi kha dog lta bu'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad 'dzin par rtson pa'i soro mo dpe' byang bzang po dang ldan zhing skyes bu dpa' bo thams cad 'khyen
58a4(phal chen): ba'i sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsamos bcu'i phyag sor dang ldan par gyur cig/ dpe' byad bzang po grub par sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa'i sor mo'i tshul dang 'thun
58a5(phal chen): ra skyes pas sor mo'i dam pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can nAd sor mo chos nyid kyi yan lag dang / bum pa gang ba dang / bkra shis kyis 'dzes pa dang ldan zhing sor mo'i rtse mo la 'khor yod pa'i sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ 
58a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i phyag sor 'drani las kyi rnam par smin pa rgyu 'thun pas byung ba lta bu dang ldan pa'i sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ pad mo bzang po dang dga' ba 'khyil bas sor mo thams cad kyi tshigs dang yon lag shin
58a7(phal chen): du rgyun cing dpe byed bzang pos 'jos par rnam par bye ba zhing rgyun gyis rgya na nga'o sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjo du med pasrung bar bya ba la rtson zhing / 'od zer gri za ba'i 'dzud rab 'byed pa'i
58a8(phal chen): ser mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sor mo shin tu 'dzes pa'i dra ba legs par dris pa dang ldan zhing / sor mo legs par dang ldan pa'i gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sor mo spong
58a9(phal chen): pa rnams la sor mo yongasu gtong bar tshe/ sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i sems kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sems can rnams la yongs su bsngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
58b1(phal chen): ngo chos 'dod pa la/ la la zhig gis chos thos par bya bar bsams te/ des 'di skad du gal te khyod kyi sha dang bcas pa'i sen mong la 'byin na ni/ ngas khyod la chos snyan par bya'o zhes zer ba zhig yod na/ de la 'di skad du smras te/ 
58b2(phal chen): bdag gsi sha dang bcas pa'i sen mo ci bder khyed la bdag la chos bstan par 'dzod cig ces nas/ ji ltar rgyal po dbang phyug tu gyur pa legs par bshad pa tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' zad pa shes pa dang de ma yan
58b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan tshad med pa/ chos kyi chos bzang po nyid la rtson pa/ 'gro ba kun tu chos kyi lo shin tu legs pa/ yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir bshad dang bcas pa'i sen mo yongs su tag
58b4(phal chen): par gyur pa de/ de ltar slong ba rnams la rang gi sha dang bcas pa'i sems mo yongasu gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su ba ste/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyag sem
58b5(phal chen): rab tu grub cing zangs kyi kha dog lta bu'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dpe' byad bzang po'i sen mo rab tu thob cing mdog snum pa'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sen mo'i dam pa
58b6(phal chen): dang ldan par 'od 'tsher ba'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sen mo bzang po dang ldan zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyag sen rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten thams cad kyis
58b7(phal chen): mi gos shing mtshungs pa med pa'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'od kyis bsnang ba'i bya ba la rtson zhing shin tu rgyan pa'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyams pa med cing rnam
58b8(phal chen): par dag pa'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes che zhing yangs pa rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i mtshan nyid ma dang ldan par gyur
58b9(phal chen): cag/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par sngani byas rnam par dag cing 'dzes par bye skyed pa'i semos dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'od zer mdog mtha' yas pa
59a1(phal chen): ka rab tu 'byed pa'i 'dzud dang ldan zhing / 'gon po'i thams cad 'khyen pa'i phyag sen dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir sen mo nga
59a2(phal chen): shar bcas pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i brtsa ba de dag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsku dang phyag sen dang ldan pa gyi rgyan yongs su brdzogs par bya ba dang / thogs pa med pa'i bstobs kyis mthar
59a3(phal chen): phyin par bya ba'i phyir/ yongs su bsngo'o// / shin tu brgyas pa chen po'i mdo'o// sangs rgyas
59a4(phal chen): phal po che zhes bya ba// bam po sum bcu brgyad pa'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi don tu chos tshol ba lhur len pa shin tu dkod pa'i chos
59a5(phal chen): tsho ba la zhugs pa la chos gadro ba'i gang zag la las mo'i rlabs su lus gzhug par byas te/ de bskyed du ga' te khyod mi 'breng bdun du brkos pa'i mi'i drungs su 'thong bad na/ dus khyod la chos kyi brdzun
59a6(phal chen): pa bya'o zhe ne/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bas+tha de thos nas shin tu dge' zhing 'di bde ba dang / rab tu 'dun pa'i yid bskyes nas 'di bsnyam du sems te/ ngan song thams cad mnar ming / 
59a7(phal chen): ba'i bsdug bsngal nyams su blangs pa'i dang yang bsngo ba zhing / bdag gis dam pa'i chos rtsal dgos na/ 'di ltar me'i brlabs su mchong pa tsam gyis dam pa'i chos rnyed par gyur na de lta kye ma de ltar dgon
59a8(phal chen): pa'i sa sa rgyas kyi ros de dag kyang sems can dmyal ba'i bsdug bsngal lta bu med pa'i me'i brlabs tsam du mchong par sems pa 'di na ngo 'char che'o snyam nas/ 'di ltar bdag gis mi 'greng bdun du
59a9(phal chen): brkos pa'i me'i rlabs su 'tshong bar gyis/ khyod kyis bdag la sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad du gsol zhes nas de ji ltar rgyal po legs par bshad pa tshor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sems pa dang / 
59b1(phal chen): de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag gi kyang / me'i brlabs su 'tshong pa byas pa de ltar chos kyi don du sdug bsngal gi tshor ba thams cad dang bsngo ba'i lus kyis/ me'i/ 
59b2(phal chen): rlabs su mchong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub las shin tu phyir mi ldog
59b3(phal chen): ba'i chos can tu gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba thams cad myong bar gyur te/ g.yang sa thams cad las phyir log par cig/ sems can
59b4(phal chen): thams cad 'dzegs shing skrag pa thams cad dang bral bzhing bag tsha ba med pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bde ba'i dang yid bde ba dang / chos thams cad kyi rgyan rab tu thob cing / chos
59b5(phal chen): tshol ba la rtson pa'i gyur cig/ sems can thams cad me gsum rab tu zhi bas gnas pa'i sems dang ldan zhing ngan song gi lam thams cad dang shin tu bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams
59b6(phal chen): cad kyi bde ba'i rnam pa rab tu thob ste/ yid bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad me gsum dang bral zhing / byang chub kyi sems kyis 'dod chags dang / zho sdang dang gti mug zhi ba
59b7(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i dga' bas yang dag par spyod cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams
59b8(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam par med pa la rab tu gzhol zhing shin tu thos pa'i chos can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rjes su shin tu song ba'i chos dang ldan zhing/ 
59b9(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa'i bde ba rab tu thob par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos tshol zhing me'i brlabs su mchongs pas yang dag par
60a1(phal chen): gzung ba'i dge ba'i brtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis bsgribs pa'i las dang spyod pa'i mthar phyin cing ye shes kyi me shAn tu brdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo'o// 'di ltar
60a2(phal chen): yang byang chub sems can sems dpa' chen po dam pa'i chos kyi phyir bsdug bsngal gyi tshor ba/ thams cad bdag gis lus kyis bzod pa'i byed cing / dam pa'i chos brjod pa dang byang chub se
60a3(phal chen): mas dpa'a'i lam bston pa dang / sangs brgyas kyi byang chub la gsal bar byed pa dang / bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi phung po'i tshogs yang dag par rdzogs pa dang / bstobs bcu'i la brtson par
60a4(phal chen): byed cing thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa yangs par byed pa dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phung po la bdag mngon tu mthun par yang dag par lta zhing sems can thams cad kyi rnams par dag
60a5(phal chen): pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa dang / ye shes chen po la rtson zhing / sangs brgyas kyi byang chub yongs su bsrung ba'i
60a6(phal chen): tshe/ ji ltar byang ba'i yang dgu par bsgrub pa dang / sems dnga' chos bzang po tshol po dang / rgyal po shugs chen po 'dzin pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan tshad med de dag gis kyang ji ltar
60a7(phal chen): spyod pa bzhin tu bsdug bsngal gi rnam par gcig ma yin pa nyams su 'brab pa dang / bsdug bsngal tshor ba'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba dang / bsdug bsngal gi gnod pa thams cad dang phrad pa dang / rang gi lus
60a8(phal chen): kyis nye bar len cing bzod par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos slong ba'i gang zag sems gtum pa can/ sdig pa'i las kyis bsgribs pa/ bdud kyi las kyis byin gyis rlabs pa dag las bsdug bsngal gi gnod pa de dag
60a9(phal chen): thams cad nye bar len bcing bzod par byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar dam pa'i chos shes par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad bde ba'i nan tan gyis mngon par
60b1(phal chen): shes pa myur ba dang ldan zhing bsdug bsngal dang / mi bde ba yongs su spangs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa thams cad rab tu thob pa la gnas pas bsdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad dang bral
60b2(phal chen): bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mig g.yor lnga bu'i bde ba rab tu thong cing / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad 'gal bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad le shes kyi spyod pa'i mebar phyin te/ bag pa
60b3(phal chen): brtson ra nas phyir ldog par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsdug bsngal gyi las rgyun dang gtse ba thams cad las phyir log cing bde ba'i lam mthong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nga sdug bsngal thams cad shin
60b4(phal chen): tu rnams bar chad pas chos kyi dga' ba dang / bde ba'i rnam pas shin tu brtan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phan tshun tu zhe mi sdang zhing byams pa rab tu thob pas/ bsdug bsngal las grol bar gyur cig/ 
60b5(phal chen): sems thamams cad 'khor ba thams cad na yod pa'i bsdug bsngal rab tu byung zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba'i don mthong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba sdug bsngal gyi tshor
60b6(phal chen): ba thams cad kyis/ lus la gnod par gyur pa med bcing 'dra ba med pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs brgyas kyi bde ba bsgrubs par med pa'i mthar phyin
60b7(phal chen): te/ bde ba'i khyad par thams cad rab tu thob par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi phyir bsdug bsngal gyi rnam pa thams cad bzod pa myed cing nyam
60b8(phal chen): su lend pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad g.yang sa las bsrung zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnam par thar pa bsgrubs pa med pa la/ rab tu 'god pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang
60b9(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam pa'i chos tshol ba la brtson pa/ chos kyi tshig dang yig ges 'khor lngas yang dag par lend pa/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar 'byung ba'i sangs brgyas
61a1(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dga' ba'i sos shin tu spel ba'i 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang bral ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ spros pa med pa'i sangs rgyas chos la gnas pa rab tu thob par mngon par zhugs pa/ des rgyal/ 
61a2(phal chen): rimathar thug pa'i sa chen po grong rdal bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong dang / yul dang yul gru bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / skye bodu mas yongasu gang ba/ bde ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang skye bos rgyas pa'i khyim gos gang ba/ baba'
61a3(phal chen): shing gi ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya skor che zhing dga' bar bya ba'i gni dang ldan pa/ chu lung yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs dang / grib shing dang 'dra shing skye mdangs dga' bas shin tu brgyan pa/ 'jug yong med cing bzhin tu
61a4(phal chen): bde ba/ gzhon gyi kham sa shin tu bcom pa/ bdag gi lam sprul nyams pa med pa/ gsi dang rin por che'i mdzod dang / bang ba byeb khrag khrig brgya stong gyis brgyan pa/ bu dang bu mo dang chung mi dang 'khor sna tshogs
61a5(phal chen): dang / chung pan ma ma sna tshanas me / zung kyi/ rgyan dang / ma po zang gapa dang / chen po song bden bu sa da dang / byor dang mi'i 'brug cig gang du med/ 
61a6(phal chen): rgyal pa'i srid gyung ba med thams sring po skyed nas 'gro babs pa cid byi na du sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa dang / thams cad sakhyen padings rnam par dag tshos zhing // de kya chub 'i sa
61b1(phal chen): rnams pa yong su gtong 'gyur cig/ sems pa rnathams cad lus dang srog dang sa byad ma
61b2(phal chen): yangs pa'i gtong ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thos cad 'gyod pa med pa'i sbyin pa'i bdag po gyur te/ 
61b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas rgya chos la me da du 'di thob cing / chos 'i mngon pa par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyims tshol ba'i chomam sarten pos spyod pa/ byang chub chad med parnyed
61b4(phal chen): lus dang srog dang 'jig rten gi skyid pa yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad lus dang srog la mi lta zhing chos kyi dga' bas mthar thug pas chos kyi rim 'gro dang sri zhu rab tu thobar 'gyur cig
61b5(phal chen): sems can thams cad sangs na rgyas kyi chos shin du dkon pa la brtson zhing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gzhan gi dring mi mchog
61b6(phal chen): pa'i ma par byin cing sang byas kyi byang chub spang bar 'i dum bar 'gyur bye/ sems pan thams can rang tugs pa'i yid kyis/ bcos ni drug rdung drab zhing / sangs rgyas gyotsho mothos pa ngas par rton pa
62a1(phal chen): can rnams rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'dzam bu gling gi grong dang grong khyir dang ljongs dang po rang 'khor dang / rgyal po'i gnas thams cad kyi shen pa dang / gsad pa'i gnas thams cad rnam par gcod pa dang / rka
62a2(phal chen): gnyis pa dang / rkang pani pa dang / ri dgas mang po la mi 'jigs pa'i rdzi sbyin pa byed pa dang / ldong pa med pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dadra pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dang / khon med pa'i sems
62a3(phal chen): kyis rgyal po'i sring lnga bams cad la gnas pa dang / sems can gi 'de ba dang / sdug sngal ba thams cad sel ba dang / 'gro khyad lo bde pa byed pa'i sems rin po che skyed pa dang / 
62a4(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad rin po che dang 'dra ba'i bsam pa rin po che rab tu bsgrubs pa dang / sbom po gsum rnam par dag pa la gnas shing gzhan rab tu gzhog pa la tshe/ srog gcod pa spangs dang / slab pa lnga
62a5(phal chen): la sems can ba tu gzhag pas yang dag par smras pa'i dag na pa de dang yongs pas/ dge pa'i rtsa ba'adi sems can rnams byu sa ban pa'i sems sa pa po' nga/ thog shi
62a6(phal chen): cad du mad pa dang / dang shi sa ra na par pa mams cad sgru rgyas bams pad par 'du 'ang ba'i yo nag tu med
62b1(phal chen): ra gyur / sems pan mams pad bye ma'i sa nga'i 'bral ba bya brgyar byang chub sems du bu'i spyod pa la gnas ba sems can thams cad songasu smin par bya ba dang / gdus ga la zhugs te/ 
62b2(phal chen): ba 'grug pa med par gyung cig/ sems kyi ni rgyas kya ston sa bcu'i dge rje na myong dag par thos gso pa'i 'thung gan su gyur cing tsho'i rje bro 'dzin bur gyur cig sems can thams cad tshe'i tshad 'gag
62b3(phal chen): med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / smon lam yongasu rdzogs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsam pa thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par gyur cigasems can thasra cad tshe'i tshad zad mi shes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson
62b4(phal chen): zhing / sangs rgyas thas cad mthong ba dang gnyis par bya ba la dus dang mnyam par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i chos la dga' ba rab tu thob cing / srog gi dbang po 'gag pa med pa dang 'ang
62b5(phal chen): pa'i skye mched la slab par bya ba shin tu bslabs par gyur cig/ sems can pas cad mthu stobs dang brtson 'grus zad mi shes pa rab tu thob ste/ sang so rgyas kyi ye shes kyis dbang sgyur ba la rab tu 'jug pa
62b6(phal chen): dang / rga ba dang na ba dang myed pa'i tshe phun su tshogs par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
62b7(phal chen): nu ma gyis shin du rdzogs par bye 'a gyur// srog gsong pa sbyangs dang rloms sa surnam par dag pa rab du dgod par bya ba phyir yongasu stsol/ 'on sang byang chub sems dpa' bos dma' rten pa gyim po
62b8(phal chen): skye bas gyur pa/ nang ban pa dang mer gyur ba rnams kyim mtshan pacad par gyu 'i skyes pa'i rang ba ni dang bral por gyur tho/ skyes bu dngos pa zhig pa 'gyur/ kung nus kyi mngon pos
62b9(phal chen): bdag par gyur ba/ lus dang gnod pazhin du mi med par gyur pa 'thang ba dang / skyes pa'i dngos po las bzlog par gyur bi tho sa gnyis ka ma yin pa'i skye gnas sun mazhin pa thung po
63a1(phal chen): byung nga/ sa zhen tu bar byar gyur pa skyes par myu gyis dpags pa
63a2(phal chen): skyob cing / snying rje chen po sngon du btang ste/ 'gro ba thams cad sa pan 'dogs pas/ 'ja ba klung gi skyes pa las rnams par gyur pa thams cad rnam par zlog go// rab tu brdzun spyod do// yongs su
63a3(phal chen): skyob po/ rnam par chad par byed do// chos dang mthun pa'i mdzod dang bang ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang gtong zhing tshig 'di skad du brjod do// khyed kyis gang gi phyir sdig pa'i las rnam pa 'di lta bur
63a4(phal chen): myong bar gyur pa de'i bde ba dang phan pa'i rnam pa ngas sbyar gis sdig pa'i las da kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag/ tshul zhin ma yin pa la 'jug sde sems skyed pas bde ba myong ba'i don du khyed ma byed cig/ 'di/ 
63a5(phal chen): lhor ba ral la sdig pa'i las 'dig bu dag byas shing / bdag gi bde tsher ma myong ba dag gnas ma yin te/ 'di'i gnas med do// 'di ltar sdig pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu la spyod pa 'ang ni/ sangs
63a6(phal chen): dag byar smad do// sa byu thams cad kyis kyang mngon par sdud par rnyed do// 'di sa skyed zin pa chos la 'di ces par byed bla / dge brjems shin tu bags pa dang / mi dge pa'i phas lan tshun du gyu
63a7(phal chen): kyis byung po dang / ya rjen me na kyi sa kya shin sa / ma sa
63b1(phal chen): sdang ngo // rnam par bzlog go// mi spyod do// des de ltar bsgrub pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongasu sngo ste/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gsang ba sgrubs na 'dug pa dang ldan zhing / skyes bu
63b2(phal chen): chen po'i mtshan rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad brtson 'grus dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pas spyod cing skyes bu'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams
63b3(phal chen): cad chags pa med pa'i ye shes la yang dag par gnas pa las mi ldog cing shin tu brtan pas dbang sgyur ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i dga' bas mi thogs mi chags pa'i sems dang / 
63b4(phal chen): ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad smad par med par thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba'i ye shes bzang po dang ldan zhing skyes bu dam pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu byung ba'i dge ba'i
63b5(phal chen): na te/ rten pa sa 'gyur / nga du chu chu dbang po sam macar
64a1(phal chen): pas yang dag par spyod pa'i/ skyes bu'i tshul yang dag par mthong zhing rtogs pa/ skyes bu'i mthu rtsal dam pa dang / skyes bu'i mthu brtsal ma nor ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i/ 
64a2(phal chen): mthu rtsal dang / dpa' ba'i mthu skyes bu'i mthu rtsal dang / brtan pa'i skyes bu'i mthu rtsal gyis yang dag par bzung ba de skyes bu'i dbang po gcad du med par byas pa dang / skyes bu'i dbang po brtan par byas pa dang / 
64a3(phal chen): yang dag par bdung ba'i dge ba'i tshe bde dag thams cad gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi mthun la yongasu dag pa ba tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bur 'grub pa yongs su
64a4(phal chen): snga'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par sangs rgyas pa 'jig rten thams cad du grags rmar byed pa dang / kye ma sangs rgyas 'jig rten byung ngo // kyem
64a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'jig rten tu 'byung ngo zhes/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog cim sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs kun tu grags par byed pa dang / sems can/ tegi rgyal dang zag med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang thams
64a6(phal chen): cad rnams par zlog pa dang / sangs rgyas par sems can rnams yang dag par stobs dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la sems can rnams rab tu gnog pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas
64a7(phal chen): la gzhol bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas dmigs pa la brtson pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad la rim 'gro byed pa dang / sangs rgyas rnam par rtog par sems can rnams la ston pa ngo
64a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas brjod pa la sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzud pa dang / bskal pa bye bar yang sangs rgyas skyes pa ni shin tu dkon no// zhes bya ba'i tshig sems can rnams la brjod pa dang / sems can
64a9(phal chen): de dag gis kyang de'i phyir sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas la rim gro zhes byed pa dang / dga' ba dang spro ba skyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa las sangs rgyas kyi thams cad kyi mtshan nyan
64b1(phal chen): pa pa sangs rgyas grangs med pa la shin tu bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgya srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya skang grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gder rnam par sbyong ba dang / srog maH/ 
64b2(phal chen): bzhag tshig brgya gang grangs med pa pani na gshegs pa rnamapa kyi rlung du yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sems carnathams cad dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i dag pa'i sa ba shes gnanangs par tu
64b3(phal chen): shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i la yid ches pas sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur po dang / 'jig rten thams cad du bskal pa grangs med par skyed cing / spel bu'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sangs
64b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi 'phrin las yang dag par sgrub nus pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngos te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byas te/ mi mnyes par
64b5(phal chen): mi byed pa dang / sangs rgyas lta ba dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas lta ba dang yid la byed pa dang ma thal zhing / sangs rgyas lta ba brtson pa'i yid dang ldan par gyur
64b6(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang / chos kyi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin cing ye shes sgom pa shin tu mang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos mnyan pa dang
64b7(phal chen): 'bral zhing skal pa grangs thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos sgra 'byin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad mthong zhing
64b8(phal chen): ye shes yang dag par bzung ba'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mthong ba'i bya ba'i mthu la brtson zhing / yid la bya ba dang las gzhan med par gyur cig/ 
64b9(phal chen): mas can thams ca nam ma pa'i dbyings kun du sangs rgyas mthong ba'i 'thung gnas sa thugs shing / phyogs kun tu sangs rgyas mthod par ga par gyu da/ mas pan thams cad 'jig rten go ma su
65a1(phal chen): skye bams cad rab tu rjod par gyur cig ces ltar byung chung sems dpa' thos dpa'achen pa/ sangs kyis skye ba brjod pas sang dag par bzung ba rig pa'i rtsa ba de dag sems can mams byed kyis sangs rgyas
65a2(phal chen): mthong ba dang mnyes par byed pa dang / mi mnyes pa mi byed cing sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa thams cad yongs su dag pa'i mthar phyin par yongasu skye mo/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sos rab chen pos
65a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs kyi pho brang gi long spyod dam/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i gshes gnyen rnaMs kyi dge' ba'i long spyod dam // 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi long spyod/ 
65a4(phal chen): dam/ pha ma gnas pa'i gnas sam/ nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas sam gang zag gi rnam par smin pa'i gnas dag gam/ de ma yin pa'i 'phongs pa dang / bkren pa bslong zhing dben pa dag gas
65a5(phal chen): 'khor bzhi'i 'phongs pa med par gnas pa'i gnas sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rtsigs pa'i gnas sam/ yod byad sna tshogs gzhag pa'i gnas ci 'dod pa'i long spyod du bya ba dang / 
65a6(phal chen): 'jigs pa dang dogs pa med cing dag dang bral ba/ skyi g.ya ba med pa'i gnas kyis dag 'bul ba'i tshe/ sa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtang bas yul ci 'dod par byin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i
65a7(phal chen): rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rje ba 'dis sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa
65b1(phal chen): mong du rig par gyur cig/ sems can tham pa cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cud nang dag par 'dzin pa 'dran pa'i dbang ba rmongs pa med bcings lta bu rmed par gyur cig/ sems can
65b2(phal chen): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi snyan pa thams cad bsrung ba la zhugs shing yang dag par 'dzin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad la zhe sdang med cing / dge ba'i bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba la/ 
65b3(phal chen): brtson pas sems dang mnyam par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa la mkhas
65b4(phal chen): shing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa la zhugs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun yongasu smin par bya ba la dang / gdul ba rnam par dag pa'i lam la zhugs te/ 
65b5(phal chen): gnas su reng bar gyur cig/ sems can thas cad sangs rgyas kyi stobs la rab tu dgod cing bar brtson zhing sangs rgyas lta bur 'gro ba thams cad la phan 'dogs par gyur cig/ sems can pas
65b6(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas kyi dga' ba bla na med pa la rab tu gzhog pa'i 'a 'gro ba thams cad kyi dga' bar gyur cig/ sems can thos nang sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang mi 'jigs pa'i chos kyi
65b7(phal chen): 'byung gnas su gyur te rab tu dgod pa la gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi rnam pa rtse cig ni yongs su spyod pa thob ste/ sa lta bu'i ye shes dang
65b8(phal chen): ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa'i sbyin pa yongasu gtang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ci nas kyang sems kyi khams thams cad kyis de
65b9(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yong su dag pa thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la yong su sngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
66a1(phal chen): byung ba rnams la/ rim gro'i don du bdag gi bran dang las byed pa rnams dbul ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i gshes gnyen sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
66a2(phal chen): yang dag par spel ba brtson pa rnam sa pa/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog gas/ bdang ma'am/ slo bo dpon dang / bla ma'i sbyin gnas la dran dang las byed pa'i mi dbul ba 'am/ seMs can nad pa nas la
66a3(phal chen): rim gro byed pa med pas 'chi bar mi 'gyur bar rim 'gro bya ba'i phyir dran dang las byed pa'i mi sbyin pa 'am/ de ma yin pa'i sems can g.yog med pa la blan dang las byed pa'i mi gtong ba 'am/ phongs pa dang bkren
66a4(phal chen): pa slong zhing len pa gzhan dang / gzhan dag la bran dang las byed pa'i mi gtong ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mo mchod rten srung ba'i phyir dbul ba 'am/ dam pa'i chos srung
66a5(phal chen): ba'i phyir yi ge dang / grangs las shin tu slabs pa'i mi bye ba khrag/ khrig brgya stong mang po dbul ba byed cing rim gro byed pa de dag kyang / mkhas pa tshul shes pa cang shes pa/ btson pa le lo med pa/ dran pa
66a6(phal chen): drang po dang ldan pa/ phan par sems pa/ bde bar sems pa/ byam sa par sems pa/ rim 'gro byed pa'i ngang tshul can/ mngon med pa/ gzugs med pa'i yongasu spyod pa/ bzo dang rgyu rtsal sna tshogs dang / grangs/ 
66a7(phal chen): bshin du bslabs pa'i zhes rabastan/ rim pa'i dul skyes pa dga' bar byed cing rim gro byung pa la brtson zhing rtsong pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las 'byung ba/ srid du du ba rimagro byung ba/ sems kyis
66a8(phal chen): dang pa de lta bu'i rim gro dag gnas par 'os pa dang / ci rigs pa dang / phan 'dogs pa de dag la dbul zhing yongasu gtong ba dang / sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltas
66a9(phal chen): yongasu snga ste/ rim gro pa yang dag par btang ba dang ldan pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur ba dang / rim gro bya ba la mkhas shing brtson to/ cang shes ca
66b1(phal chen): sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang dag par len cing / sangs rgyas kyi thams cad dang mthun mong du gyi rim gro bar gyur cig/ sems can thos cad yid la
66b2(phal chen): bya ba dang bsam pa dang rnam par rtog pa gzhan med cing / sangs rgyas thams cad la rtag tu skabs che bar gyur cig/ sems can thas cad dge ba thams cad yang dag par bsdad pa la brtson zhing sangs rgyas
66b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi rigs las mi mnyam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rjes su snyegs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad don yod par dus thams cad du phrad cing / sangs rgyas thams cad la dus dang mthun po'i rim
66b4(phal chen): gro dang bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yig rnam par dag pas mi 'jigs par spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi don 'dzin par gyur cig/ sems can thas cad sangs rgyas thams
66b5(phal chen): cad la lus dang srog dbul zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad ngoms mi shes pa'i 'dzin pa dang lta bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gi gnas thams cad yang dag par 'jom pas/ sangs rgyas
66b6(phal chen): thams cad la lta ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa dang de ma yin pa'i gnas gzhan med cing // sangs rgyas thams cad la rten par gyur cig/ sems can
66b7(phal chen): thams sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa la dadon du byung ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bla gos dang ldan par rgyu ba cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po
66b8(phal chen): rim gro pa yongasu btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba/ dri ma dang med pa rnyog pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par dag pa dang
66b9(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sku gzhan la rag lus pa med pa'i rten gyi tshul rab tu thob par par bya ba'i phyir yong su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dma' bar byas shing / sa la bting ba
67a1(phal chen): sbyo da mapa dang dus pa'i par smras pa/ su na/ pa/ kyad la bya
67a2(phal chen): yang thos gnas pa la brtson pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad bsnyen bkur ba'i sems kyis bdag nyid rim gro par dbul ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa de dag 'di ltar yangasu lnga ste/ ci nas kyang sems can thams cad
67a3(phal chen): shin du rim gro bya ba dang / ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i don nyams pa med pa dang / ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lam du legs par zhugs pa/ 
67a4(phal chen): gyur pa dang / ji nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam pa nyid khong ngadu chud par gyur pa dang / ji nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig su bdag nyid bgrang bar gyur pa dang / ci nas kyang byang chub sems
67a5(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa'i den pa'i tshig dang 'grogs pa rjes su srung bar gyur pa/ dang / ci nas kyang khams gsum thams cad sangs rgyas kyis rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / ce nas kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas rtogs par
67a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skyon med par cing rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can de dag thams cad yon tan chen
67a7(phal chen): bo la rab tu zhugs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i mthar shin tu thug par gyur pa de ltar yongasu sngo'o// de 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ de ltar lus kyi rim gro sems can thas cad la yongasu btang ba 'di dge ba'i rtsa gang
67a8(phal chen): bsags po des dang sems can thams cad yongs su rtogs pa'i chos can/ rang tu 'dzin pa'i chos can/ yang dag par len pa'ochos can/ mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can/ chung mi la ba'i chos can/ mi mnyam cin
67b1(phal chen): chos can/ mi 'bral ba'i chos can/ yid dul bya'i chos can/ ma dul ba 'dul ba'i chos can/ chos nyid nye bar dul ba'i chos can gyi rim gro pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la shin du nye bar sems pa'i sems
67b2(phal chen): dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gro'i nan tan du byas te/ sems can de dag dzas cang dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ mchod rten gyi dam par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba thams
67b3(phal chen): cad bsnyen bkur bar 'os par gyur pa dang // sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i gnas dam par gyur phye 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir len pa'i
67b4(phal chen): dam par gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyir bsod nams kyi don dam pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir/ sbyin sregs dam pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / khams gsu
67b5(phal chen): thams cad nas byung ba'i dam par 'gyur ba dang / lam ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa'i phyir ded dpon dam par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bzung ba'i phyir/ gzungs
67b6(phal chen): gi ma thar ba tu ba par 'gyur ba dang / nam sa pa'i dbyings la sa mi med pa'i las gis 'byung bas/ chos kyi dbyings tshang med pa dam pa ra 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su sngo ste/ ltar byang nubasems
67b7(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag rim gro par phul bas yang dag par gzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can gyi khams thams cad phyag bya bar 'os pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams
