67b8(phal chen): cad la yongasu sngo'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag rim gro pa phul bas yang dag bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi sems can thams cad gyi khams thams cad phyag bya bar 'os pa'i ye shes
67b9(phal chen): kyi phung po dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la yongasu sngo'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dga' ba dang dad pa drang rab tu dga' zhing dang ba'i sems kyis sangs rgyas
68a1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das la mos pa dang / chos dkon bachog zhan med pa la mos pa'i bsam pa dang / sems can thams cad byar sems pa'i sems skyed pa dang / chos bye ba grangs med pa'i bar
68a2(phal chen): byad med pa'i chos kyi khong du chud cing yang dag par bzung ba/ shes rab chen po rin por che la yang dag par gzhol ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon du gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa rje su
68a3(phal chen): dran pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / don gis rje su 'brang bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po ngag khong du chud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sprin las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi char mngon par
68a4(phal chen): bab pa dang / rtul phod pas dbang sgyur bas sems kyi dpa' ba thob pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen da pa'i gang zag gi mchog gi sar shin tu snyan pa dang / chos chen/ 
68a5(phal chen): brgya stong tshad med pas shin tu brtan pa'i dbang pos/ bdag ki lus dbul zhing de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de lta bu nyan pas// de bzhin gshegs pa la dga'
68a6(phal chen): med par rnam par 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos spyod pa la yong dag par gnas pa'i sems dam pa rang gi the tsom bcad pa/ gzhan gyi the tsom gcod pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ rab tu dga' ba'i mtshan mas so/ 
68a7(phal chen): ma nyams pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas rab tu thob pa/ bsam pa tshad med pa'i spyod pa'i tshad med pa'i rje su zhugs pa/ sems can thas cad kyi don la brtson pa'i sems dang
68a8(phal chen): ldan pa/ rdo rje snying po lta bu'i ye shes dam pa'i khyad par khong du chud pa'i sems brtan cing shin tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du gnas zhing rnam par dag par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs
68a9(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi drung zhabs kyi drung na gnas pa dang mi 'bral ba ste/ chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag la rab tu gnas te/ rang gi lus de bzhin gshegs pa dbul bas tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar
68b1(phal chen): yongasu sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par bzung ba'i lus dang ldan zhing mi dma' ba'i lus yongasu rdzogs pa rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
68b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad blta ba dang mi 'bral ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pas sangs rgyas thams cad la nye bar brten cing spyod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi yon tan dang ldan zhing nyams pa
68b3(phal chen): med pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par bya ba la brtson zhing mi dmigs pas tshangs pa'i sbyang ba spyod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bdag tu
68b4(phal chen): bya ba dang bdag gir bya ba la gyen du 'phags zhing / bdag gi med pa'i lus rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad lus 'phos pa med par lus yang dag par ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du
68b5(phal chen): lus rnam par bkram par gyur cig/ sems can thos bdag gi me ra du cing yongasu 'dzin pa med pas 'gro bas gzhan la rag las pa med pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i
68b6(phal chen): lus kyi rigs dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi skur mngon par skyes par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i stobs kyis sems la thug pa med cing chos kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i lus can du
68b7(phal chen): gyur cig/ seMs can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa sku rnam par dag pa yong su rdzogs pas 'dra ba med pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can nas zang dmigs pa med pa'i dbyingasu byung bas/ 
68b8(phal chen): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa la rang gi lus phul bas yang dag par sdus pa'i/ 
68b9(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag/ ci nas kyang sems can gi khams thams cad dus gsum gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang rgyud du yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad yongasu snga'o/ 
69a1(phal chen): padang / sa rna sa mas nams na debs ngas sems canams cad pa sbyi gyimanapa pa dang/ sa na
69a2(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud lta bur bdag 'gro ba thams cad la ston pa dang / dge pa'i gshes gnyen la bur bdag sems can thams cad la spangs dang / lam lta bur bdag sems can thams cad la yang dag pa/ 
69a3(phal chen): ston pa dang / bla na med pa'i bde ba'i rnam pa rab tu thob pa lta bur bdag sems can thos cad la yongasu sbyong ba dang / nyi ma lta bura'agro ba thams cad la snyems par byed pa dang / de ltar bu'i
69a4(phal chen): chos dang ldan par bdag sems can thams cad lo song su gtong ba'i rmi/ bdag btang ba'i byung ba'i dge zo'i rtse ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongasu sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa 'dis
69a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi sar rab tu phyin par gyur cig/ sos can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams
69a6(phal chen): cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du dul bathob par gyur cig/ sems can thos cad sangs rgyas kyi phyir spyod pa la mkhas shing spyod la phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thos
69a7(phal chen): cad don dang chos dang ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa ldan zhing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mthu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung bas rab tu tshim par gyur cig/ sems
69b1(phal chen): ltung bas/ sangs rgyas pams cad kyi'is glo bya ba deng bu lngar bsom pa nga de bzhin gshegs pa thams cid kyi byang chung du zlas pa'i bsas pa rnam par sbyangs pa dang / sangs rgyas byan
69b2(phal chen): thams cad la sems 'od snang zhing dang bar byin gyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig na gyi 'du shes las bdag phyir log par bya ba dang / bdagra sangs rgyas kyi rig su rdzogs par byam dang / bdag sangs rgyas
69b3(phal chen): thams cad dang mthun par bzung ba dang / bdag 'dud kyi yul las ring du bya ba dang / bdag sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu mos par bya ba dang / bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi snod du byin gyis rlab pa dang / de lta buni/ 
69b4(phal chen): chos la brtson par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongasu sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems
69b5(phal chen): na thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rin por che'i 'byung gnas su myur te/ sems nye bar na pa rnam par dag pa rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thos cad sdig tu'i las thams cad la zhe sdang zhing
70a1(phal chen): cang shes dang yang dgu par thogs par gyur la/ sems can mams pa dgan du 'azung ba mas su gyur te/ marjed pa ma ga dang ldan par gyur ci// sems can thams cad dbang 'askur / 
70a2(phal chen): 'imabyong ni/ smra 'gyur / sem thamams pad pa dag 'i shin du dbang / mangs rgyas tham sa ma byas mangs su 'arung ba zung cim
70a3(phal chen): thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i chos skyon med pa la yang dag par spyod cing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dang 'thun par gyur cig / sems can thams cad thams cad ma khyen pa'i ma shes su lung ldan pa'i phyir sas
70a4(phal chen): rgyas la dmigs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing sangs rgyas thams cad la rag lus par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad len pa med pa'i las mngon
70a5(phal chen): par 'du byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nye bar bzung dpar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes dang spyod pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par bya ba la brtson zhing / sangs rgyas
70a6(phal chen): thams cad la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i dam par gyur ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pas rim gro byed pas yang dag par 'azung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyi byang chub mngon/ 
70a7(phal chen): du gyur par yongasu sngo'o// 'jig rten thams cad yongasasu sgrub pa'i sems kyis yongasu sngo'o// khams sum thams cad la byung ba'i sems kyis yong su sngo'o// gnod pa med pa'i rgyud kyis yongasu sngo'o// tshad med pa'i
70a8(phal chen): byang chub yangs pa thob par yongasu sngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snang ba byas pa'i shes pas yongs su sngo'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin du bzung bas yong su sngo'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin
70a9(phal chen): gyis rlobs pas yongasu su'o/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos lams pas yongs su sngo'o// 'das pa dang mabyon pa dang dalta thung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / dag pa'i rtsa ba gcig du byas te yongs su rnaM
70b1(phal chen): chenas / la las byang sems pa' sesas dpa pa mi bya chem pa mang ma thams cad banas par 'a
70b2(phal chen): rgyal ba'i grod ma zhen pa'i ngam pas med ma ma chags pa'ims dang ldan pa/ spyong bsam bcings brgyal po'i srid la yang su 'dzin pa med pa yongasu bzung ba la ma gnas pa/ ma btang ba gtang bas pa
70b3(phal chen): mi gas pa/ gnod pa med pa'i nas dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la ldan pa dang bangar bar sems pa rgyal ba'i srid mang su mthong bam/ rgyal bar grong byin pas yang ngas par ma
70b4(phal chen): dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag gis 'di ltar ma su dzA b+he/ nas kyang dakhyirnam par smin pa la me bangs med pa de ltar dag pa'i rtsa de dag mangs nga kyi nas kyang 'jig rten gi tshal la dka' bam skyed
70b5(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongasu sngo'o// ji nas kyang srid pa skye ba'i rgyu mched la mngon par zhen pa med pa de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongasu smra tshwa/ ji nas kyang 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi ban/ 
70b6(phal chen): lal gnas pa'i 'du shes mi skyed pa de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu sngo'o// ji nas kyang phung po dang khams dang skye mchen la mngon par zhen pa med pa med pas de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngo'o// ji nas kyang phyi/ 
70b7(phal chen): nang gi chos thams cad du lus la gnas pa'i sems mi skye ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongasu sngo'o// ji nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la rmongs par mi 'gyur ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
70b8(phal chen): yongasu sngo'o// ci nas kyang dge ba'i gshes gnyen thams cad dang ring du mi 'gyur bar de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongasu snga'o// ji nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chen po'i smon lam nyams par mi 'gyur/ 
71a1(phal chen): bar de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngo'o// ci nas kyang dge ba'i gshes gnyen thams cad la mngon par mnyes par gyur pa de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongasu sngo'o// gzhan yang 'di ltar yongasu
71a2(phal chen): sngo ste rgyal po'i srid byin pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbang phyug dam pa thob ste/ chos kyi rgyal po'i srid la dbang sgyur ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ seMs
71a3(phal chen): can thams cad rgyal po'i dkrugs ma dang / dgra thams cad rab tu gzhol ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi rgyal srid rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos
71a4(phal chen): rab tu brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rgyal srid chen po la rab tu granas par gyur cig/ sems can thos cad bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor thog sra pa med par bskor ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gi
71a5(phal chen): rgyal srid la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad // sa kyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi dang rigs rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag par 'dza/ na pa'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i
71a6(phal chen): rtsa bas mngon du byung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyal srid yangs shing tshad med pa rjes skyong bar gyur cig/ sems can
71a7(phal chen): thams can sangs rgyas 'thung brgyun ma chad bldan zhing chos kyi dbyangs la nges pa'i rgyal sring dang ldan par gyur to/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gdus pa la thogs pa med par zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi ni
71a8(phal chen): cad du rdzogs kyi bang d+hAsbyin / ma mams pa de 'jig rten las la kun gyi'ims can na pos ra tu ga pa rdul gyi dig rte gyi 'ams shin tu d+has kyi sa
71a9(phal chen): 'dugs pa bam la byis kyi sbyin pa dag gyur / sems can mas pa 'das pa dag / mkhyen pa dang lta byung ba sa rgyab thams cad na pa rtsa ba'i chu kyi tshul ci gyur te/ stod pa ma / 
71b1(phal chen): na med par byos te/ stong rjerten po byung bang / mas pa da pa'i slobs 'a par gzhan ste/ mas bzhin du ma par byas nas sems can na dan pa 'ong par baju na/ te/ mi shes chen pa la na rnams pa
71b2(phal chen): rnam sangs rgyamo la mnyam pa'i sem su byos te/ dge pa'i chos nyid larnam par spyod cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal srid la rab tu gzhol bar sems skyed pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug la shin du bson pa'i bsam pas
71b3(phal chen): mi shes la dbang sgyur ba'i thob pa yid kyi dbang po dang / yon tan thams cang rnam par sbyong ba rab tu 'jug pa dang / blo brtan pa dang ldan pa'i bsam po nyin du yangs pa dang / tshogs su gyur pa dge ba'i rtsa ba/ 
71b4(phal chen): cad dang brtsam pa'i skabs che ba dang ldan pa'i spangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ma na lam dang / gnan la rag las pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos dang shin tu brtan pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i
71b5(phal chen): stobs dang / brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyis mi dang yul du bcas pa dang / grong khyer dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa thams
71b6(phal chen): cad btang ba yongasu btang bas/ slong ba thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i tshe// yul dang mir banas pa dang / grong khyer dang rgyal po'i pho brang yongs su btang bas/ yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thos
71b7(phal chen): tsang la 'di ltar yongasu sngo ste/ yul dang mir bcas pa dang grong khyer dang rgyal po'i gnas rab tu byin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems can thas cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par sbyangs te/ sang
72a1(phal chen): rgyas thams cad bzhugs shing spyod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad par dbul bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ni ba'i gnas rab tu thob cing dgon bshin du dben pa la shin tu mos par gyur
72a2(phal chen): sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i dben pa'i mthar thug pa/ grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang / khams dang rgyal po'i gnas la gnas pa med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi smra ba thams cad las na/ 
72a3(phal chen): par 'das te/ 'du 'dzi med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gyod pa med pa'i sbyin bdag tu gyur te/ gtong ba'i sems dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gnas med pa'i bsam pa rab tu thob
72a4(phal chen): ci / khyim gi gnas dang rab tu bral bar gyur cig/ seMs can thas cad btang ba shin du mthong ba'i sems dang ldan zhing gtong ba bya ba gtong bar gyur cig/ sems can thos cad khyim gyi gnas la chags pa las rnam par 'das te/ 
72a5(phal chen): gnas chung za ba med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gnod pa dang ma ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par 'das te/ gtso ba thams thad kyis yong su btang bar gyur cig/ sos can thos cad
72a6(phal chen): sakyis bams cad la yangs rgyas kyi nga 'dul bas/ sa 'du rnamam par byung bar thung cig su de d+hA byang chub pa yang napa dpa chen po dus dang ming zas pa dang / zung
72a7(phal chen): dag ba 'bar ma sa / ba de dgas pa chus kyi nga giganas nga su dag par bya bar byor mas thams cad la yong sa 'o// 'dag dus sems pa
72a8(phal chen): 'jugs kyinam pa thams cad la mngon par mchags sesas dang ldan pa/ 'ad pa ga' bams cad ga sems mi mags pa dang / 'dod pa'i na la pa tshoms sa su spyong ba ga pa yang ba na
72b1(phal chen): pa'i sbyor ba thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ bud med gi dga' ba dang rtse mo'i dga' ba yongs su spyod pa thams cad la mtshan mar mi 'dzin pa/ bud med rin por che'i yan lag dang / 
72b2(phal chen): nying lag thams cad lam chags pa/ 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa la thams cad las phyir log pas/ g.yog 'khor dang chung ma'i 'khor dang rol mor bcas pa/ glu dang gar dang rnga dang rol mo dkrol bar byed cing
72b3(phal chen): spyod pa/ bsnyen dkur shing rim gro bya ba la shin du mkhas par gyur pa 'gro dang / rgyurtsa la shin tu brlangs pa/ 'jig rten pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa/ dga' bar byed pa yid du 'ong ba'i rim 'gros brtse bar
72b4(phal chen): byed pa/ bkur sti'i tshul la mkhas pa/ rol mo brdung ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i shin tu byung ba dang / rol mo dkrol ba dang / klu'i sgra mi mthun pa med pa dang / gar gis nye bar spyod pa dang ldan pa/ bud med cang shes kyi chogs
72b5(phal chen): kyis kun nas bskor ba/ bzhin sdug gu dang cha byad sbu gu'i rin por med pa nga ldan pa/ 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / rgyan gyis rim gror byad dab gzhan dag dang / rol mos dga' bas brtso zhing
72b6(phal chen): bkur sti'i rnam pa yid du 'ong bas ston pa'i bud med rim po che 'grogs 'grogs pa rabastan cing mthun par 'dzin pa/ nges pa'i tshig gis dga' ba byed cing rim gro byed pa/ rgyan babang po rab tu mang bas
72b7(phal chen): bltan yid du 'ong bar brgyan pas shin tu rnam par dag pa/ rol mo bdungs pa dang / dkrol ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyud mthun par byung ba/ 
72b8(phal chen): dri bya chum sems dpa'i nga ni dza~M 'bring na/ sems dga' ba byung ba/ de lta bu'i g.yon 'khor dang / rlung ma'i 'khor dang / rol sor mas bshin tu shes pa de dag thams cad mong su satong dang sbyin
72b9(phal chen): byed pa / dge pa'i ma pa de dag 'gro ba thams cad nas byung ba'i sems kyis mang su pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' ba rab thob pas yong su 'o// snying po drangs pas sems kyis mangs su rdzong
73a1(phal chen): gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongasu snga'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las rnam par 'das ma dang / sems can thams cad/ 
73a2(phal chen): grogs su gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su spro'o// rnam par dag pa'i chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i/ 
73a3(phal chen): las yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yong su sngo'o// chos snang ba thams cad kyi rgyun yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon gsum du rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ 
73a4(phal chen): sems can thams cad la yongasu sngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po bu dang bu mo dang chung ma yongasu gtong zhing / ji ltar gzho nu shin du sbyong ba dang / rgyal po'i rgyan thams cad ston pa dang / 
73a5(phal chen): de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag kyang / thos cad mkhyen pa'i lam la mngon par gnas pa dang / gtong ba dang / yongasu gtong ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa
73a6(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba'i lam rnam par sbyong ba dang / byis 'gyod pa med par gtong ba'i sems rnam par sbyong ba gtong ba rin por che thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa
73a7(phal chen): la mnyes par gzhog pa/ 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rab tu sgrub pa/ lhag pa'i bsame pa dag pa'i byang chub rnam pa thams cad du yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang / byang chub
73a8(phal chen): sems dpa'i lam gyis bdag mngon par sgrub pa yang dag par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub du sems mngon du gyur par byin gyis rlob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs la gnas
73a9(phal chen): pa'i sems bskyed pa yongasu sgyur ba rnams kyi bu dang bu mo dang chung ma yongasu gtang ba de lta bu dang bu mo dang chung ma de dag bsam pa stobs dang ldan par byas te/ gtong ba dang bdag de bzhin nyid du mos par byas te/ 
73b1(phal chen): sbyin par byed pa dang / bdag nyid kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyis ci 'dod pa spyad par lta ba dang bdag sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i kun gyi 'byung gnas su gyur par byin gyis rlob pa dang / gang gis seMs// 
73b2(phal chen): tsan dma' bar gyur pa de dag gis yongasu rgyas par byed pa dang / de lta bu'i tshul gis bdag yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / mchod rten dam par gyur pa zhes 'gro ba thams can la bdag spro bar byed pa dang / thams ca/ 
73b3(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i sems nyid du 'gro ba thams cad du sgrub pa dang / bdag 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa'i mu sdegasu la rjes su lta ba dang / bdag 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'babs bde bar rab tu rtog pa dang / bdag 'gro/ 
73b4(phal chen): thams kyi sbyin bdag tu mos par byed pa dang / bdag ye shes kyi ying dang ldan par byas shing / bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pal rab tu rtson par yang dag par shes pa dang / bdag ji ltar smras pa de sa
73b5(phal chen): byed pa la spyod pa dang / bangag gis thos pa du mkhyen pa'i gami gas smras da ba tu dgas ci ma shes dang 'amadun pas rkyen la ba da 'gro babs cad langs bcas pa'i mas rjes rlo
73b6(phal chen): dang / 'ong tunan na byed pa la bdag shin du gnos pa dang / 'gro mas sa pad du spang ba'i mi shes yang dag par skyed pa dang / sems dpa'i thams cad kyi gtang ba'i ma / 
73b7(phal chen): yi 'byed pa dang / da bozhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du migs par byed ba'i'i/ chags pa med ba dang / 'grol ba bcings pazod ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can sas cad kyi ngor rgyu
73b8(phal chen): yang sa / sa pasams pa she / / dud bras da su ma pas la 'dus
74a1(phal chen): shes da ci dbyings sogags pa'i sems kyis song su lnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tuthob pas yongasu rdzal/ snying po len par byas te yongasu sbyor// blan med pa'i sems dang / 
74a2(phal chen): rten pas song gyur/ kyis 'ad chun pa chos dang ldan pas yongs su dza'o// dag ma thamams cad kyi 'byung gnas su rid par byas shem su gyu// dus gsum gi sangs rgyas thams cad dad
74a3(phal chen): 'gal bar byas te yongasu snga'o// de lta bu'i chos la rnam par spyod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa'i rigs dang kyi rgyud du byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs rnam
74a4(phal chen): par dag pa rab tu skyes pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam du sems mngon par skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ye shes 'byam klas pa zhugs pa 'jig rten gyi dri ma thams cad rab tu sbyong ba/ sbyin pa byed pa/ 
74a5(phal chen): sbyin pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ yon tan chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su gyur pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi gnas dang / 'gro ba thams ca/ da kyi rten du gyur pa/ sems can thams cad rnam par
74a6(phal chen): ga par bya ba la yang dag par zhugs pa/ dag pa'i mas ni mi mang dag par brtson pa/ de mkhor mas cad mong su gtong bas mang dge par bzung ba'i dge bzhi rtsa pa de dag 'di sangs su gyu ra/ 
74a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mi 'phrogs pa rab tu thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i 'khor gis bskor bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas mthong ba'i spro ba dang dga'
74a8(phal chen): ba rang du bobu ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal mnyam par gzhag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad tshad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par sprul pa gnas shing / byang chub sos dpan
74a9(phal chen): tid po byin gyis nam pa ra nga myod par chung ga sems can grus ca sems la 'jug pa med cing / chos rdzun pa dzin tu thos zung / man sa
74b1(phal chen): thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zab mo rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yang dag par bral ba'i yid rab tu thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin gi 'khor dang ldan par gyur ste/ 
74b2(phal chen): sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan ma 'dzin pashin du tho bra ste/ ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs gra mkhas par gyur cig sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams cad sgom pa lnga gnas shi ting nge 'dzin
74b3(phal chen): kyi khyad pa shes par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems kyis myi gshes pa'i ting rje 'dzin la yang ngan par spyong cing / chags pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rang du thob par gyur cig/ 
74b4(phal chen): ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po 'khor thams cad yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i de dag/ sems can thams cad kyi 'khor gzhan gis mi byed cing rnam par dag pa dang
74b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su snga'o// byang chub du sems bskyed pa shin du rnam par dag par gyur pa ro dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu
74b6(phal chen): thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thas cad la yongs su sngo'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i stabs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir yo/ sems
74b7(phal chen): ban thamasa'i mdo la yongasu snga'o// zhal ba mnyam pa'i sems can 'grogs pa dang mthun pa'i g.yog 'khor ba tu thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la mang du lnga'o// khan ma tho med pa'i dge pa'i
74b8(phal chen): tsha b.rab tu 'grub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu thogs par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad pa yongs su sngo'o/ sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par dag pathob pa dang / gsos ngas pang/ 
74b9(phal chen): ldan pa thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su sngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos mi zad pa thams cad kyi mdzod shin tu rig pa la zhugs pas rab tu bston pa dang / tha dad pa ston pa rab tu shes pa
75a1(phal chen): shA/ dpas kyi sa su rung du ston pas byas 'dod 'ang du 'dzin pa rnags pa med pa gyur cin/ sems can thams cad kyi chags mkhod zag
75a2(phal chen): blangs shing sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i sems dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rjesu skyong cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su red par gyur cig/ sems can
75a3(phal chen): thams cad tha dad pa med pa'i sems kyis byung zhing sangs rgyas thams cad la rab tu 'du shes thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku las byung ba gsung las skyes par gyur te/ 
75a4(phal chen): nges par sangs rgyas kyi sra su gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i phyir go skabs rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yang dag par
75a5(phal chen): bral gA'i mthar byin te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thas cad bla na med pa'i chos gtong ba la brtson ning/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par bgod pa dang ldan par/ 
75a6(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rkyen thas cad kyis zad mi nus shing / shin du rtogs par gzhag pa'i sems dang / ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi shing drung du rnam par mchog thams
75a7(phal chen): cad dang ldan pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam par sangs rgyas te chos las skyes pa dang / chos las byung ba'i bu dang bu mo dang chung ma rab tu 'phro bar gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems
75a8(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bu dang bu mo dang chung ma yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa dang / khams gsum thams cad la chags pa med pa'i tsha bar tha
75a9(phal chen): pakhong du chud par bya ba'i phyir yongasu sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim gi dngos po la chags par gnas pa'i rnam pa la mos pa med pa/ khyim gi rnam par rtog pas yongs su
75b1(phal chen): med sas yos na stong spyod pa pa myong ba bye nga/ gyiyang gyu mas 'ang dung bang ba ma dang tham ma
75b2(phal chen): sa pathams cad pas byin du sags pa'i sa pa da rdzanas mdza gas sa rten thathams cad pa ma ngan pa mos pa med par gyur ba/ khyim dang gnas pa nyin thamams cad dul sa kyi 'dugs kyis
75b3(phal chen): gyi rlabs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la shin du byung ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad la zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thos cad kyis brgyan pa'i sems dang
75b4(phal chen): ldan pa/ gcig nas gcig tu rjes su 'gyod pa med par gtong ba/ darigs pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi sgo nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par sngags pa/ 'byod pa med pa'i gtang ba'i sems dang ldan pa khyi
75b5(phal chen): yongs sa zung ba zhi tu nga bral sa na chags pa me ma ma na dang sum thams cad pa gnas pa med par gnas pa ba dang gnasas chags pa med pas bcan pa med pa med
75b6(phal chen): pa sbyi pa pa 'i tong sa sto / sa / slong rnams
75b7(phal chen): nga khyim gyi yo byad dang / rgyan thams cad yongasu gtong ba'i tshe/ khyim gi sbyin pa yongasu btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad chos dkon mchog
75b8(phal chen): dam par 'byung ba la mngon par mos shing bu dang bu mo shin tu btang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad khyim med par rab tu byung zhing khyim las rnam par grol te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan
75b9(phal chen): ma spangs pa'i spyang ba spyod par gyur cig/ sems can pos cad byir mo ldog pa'i sems kyis 'jungs pa med par gnas shing / thams cad mong su gtong ba la mngon par mos par gyur cig/ sems can
76a1(phal chen): khyim dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad khyim na gnas pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mthong ba'i ye shes dang ldan zhing yongasu sbyin par bya ba la mkhas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs
76a2(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi thesu song ba'i sems kyi ye shes dang ldan zhing / khyim gyi gnas rnam par rig parab tu mthong bar gyur cig/ sems kyi/ na thams cad khyim gyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob/ 
76a3(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can mtha' yas patshim par byed par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim gyi sbyin pa yongasu btang bas yang dag par sdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
76a4(phal chen): ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang sgron la ma dang rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongasu sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bza' shing
76a5(phal chen): gir bdaga' ba dang / rtse ba dang songs spyod mang po sna mnas kyis song su gdapa'i di sbyin pa dang stobs dang / bdag sems can thams cad kyi ba shing girab 'gyur ba nas yang dag par lta ba dang / bdag chos kyi
76a6(phal chen): ra 'gyur bar 'jig te ma pa sa mangs su ldan pa dang mams cad la med 'i byin byed par byi kyis stso pa dang / gro bas pa nga du ga ma'as pa med das
76a7(phal chen): byung bzhin non pa dang / bdag pas ga ma pad chom parab gyu 'dor byur ba yang ngan par dzin pa dang / 'dag gro rna sa kyi la tan tu rgyas byed yi
76b1(phal chen): byung bdang / gsams sa da pa nas sa dzin pa 'angs pa dang / nga N+DIr ma cad kyis dang 'dra bar na byung ba dang / bdag thams sa mam ca
76b2(phal chen): shes kyi 'byung banas su gyur bar rab tu rtog pa dang / bdag sems can ni khams thams cad la yo byad kyis mi 'brel bar byed bye rab tu zhog pa dang / bdag smon lam thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ma dang
76b3(phal chen): byud pa'i yang dag par sgrub pa'i tshe/ ge nyis pa de dag sems canathams cad kyi skyon gyis skyo med par mang mu bya'o// sems panathams cad kyi sanod pas 'khrul pa med pa bams kyis songasu su
76b4(phal chen): 'gi nyin gyis nas sbyin du ma thos pas yong su gang bas yong su mched pa med par ma cu 'o// bams pan thams cad pas thob pa med pas bya ba la reb med las mang su lnga'o// 'jig rten thams cad la smon pa med
76b5(phal chen): pa'i sems kyis yong su sngo'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dba'i sems kyis 'gro ba thams cad la yongasu sngo'o// bar snang mnyam pa'i sems kyis 'gro ba thams cad gos pa med pa'i bya
76b6(phal chen): bar phyir yangasu snga'o// dge ba'i rtsa babams cad sngon du 'gro ba'i sems sa sang dag pa ji lta bzhi du ba tu rtogs pa'i phyir mongasu rdzum sems can thams cad kyi sdug snga la blang bar ga cha bgos pa'i sos
76b7(phal chen): kyis skye dbu thams cad la yongasu sngo'o// wA ba'i rnam pathams cad shin tu zlog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sbyong ba chen po dang / smon 'am rnams pamed pa la rab tu brtson pa dang / theg pa chen po'i smon lam gyis skyo ba med zla
76b8(phal chen): byang chu da sa pa'i du ShA// de shAng med 'byems btsu ga pa
77a1(phal chen): thams cad sangs rgyas tha mad la lta zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / rim gro byed pa'i phyir mi 'khrug pa'i chos can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bza' shing gi ra ba la dga' rab tu
77a2(phal chen): thob ste/ chos la yongs su dga' bas dga' bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba'i bza' shing gi 'bar/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir dga' ba'i sems dang ldan
77a3(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi yul la rnam par brtse zhing spyod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi dgyes pa dang rol pa la rab tu brtson par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin
77a4(phal chen): gshegs pa'i 'khor gi dkyil 'khor dang / 'dul bar 'dod pas dga' ba dang rtse ba dang longs spyod la rab tu brtson par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas/ phyi ma'i mthar thug pas
77a5(phal chen): skal bar byang chub sems pa'i spyod pas/ yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems kyis gan das pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i rtse ba dang long spyod pa dang / dga' ba la mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
77a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi bza' shing gi ra bar sems chen po bskyed pas/ dga' ba la sgra de ston cing chos kyi dbyings thams cad sangs rgyas gis gang bar chud par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs/ 
77a7(phal chen): su sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba la dga' ba zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba la brtson par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'thams cad rab tu brgyan par bya ba la rnam par dag par/ 
77a8(phal chen): gyur pa'i phyir/ dga' zhing mos pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bza' shing la bar brtse ba dang / dga' ba dang long spyod kyi gnas yongasu gtong ba'i tshe/ dge
77a9(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi thams cad kyi bza' shing gi ra ba rol pa'i gnasu 'dong zhing sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba 'grub par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems
77b1(phal chen): dpar sems dpa' chen po mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mgrangs med pa du ma rung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sngags pa/ sems can thams cad mi 'tshe bar gzhol ba/ 'grol ba thos cad rnam par dag par bya ba la brtson pa
77b2(phal chen): btang ba med pa/ las kyi lam gsum shin du dag pa/ ye shes kyi grub pa'i mchod byin yo byad grangs med par bsags pa dmigs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa can/ gyi mchod sbyin byed pa'i tshe/ mchod byin byas pa'i sbyin pa
77b3(phal chen): chen po yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag/ byang chub kyi sems dkon pa'i sbyin pa'i tshogs tshad med pa/ sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba la zhugs pa/ dge ba brtsams pa/ thog ma dang thar mir rnam par dag
77b4(phal chen): bsna tshogs dang ldan pa/ mos pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bsam pa can sems can grangs med pa mngon par mgu bar byed pa/ byams pa tshad med pasgoms pa dang / yang dag par spyod pas nye bar gnas gnas pa dang
77b5(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad snying rje chen po yongasu sgrub pa shin tu grub pa/ 'das pa dang mdabyon pa dang / da ltar thung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par mnyes par byed pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyir rjes
77b6(phal chen): la 'gyod pa med pas gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ phyis 'amya ngan las 'das pa 'i byas pa med par yang dag par spyod pas khyad par rnam par 'phel ba byed pa/ dad pa'i dbang po sems skad cig gi tshad med
77b7(phal chen): par rnam par 'phel bar byed pas gtong ba dang ldan pa/ de 'di ltar yong su snga ste/ theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed pas/ grub pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems can thams cad gtong ba dang shin tu gtong / 
77b8(phal chen): dang bdu rgya dang / mdu nga ba dang / byamam par g.yang ba dang / byung ba dang / skye pa ba ga dang nga/ gtan mas chung la 'phags pa'i gtong bdang / sas rgyas tham
77b9(phal chen): kyis bsngags pa'i chos gtong ba dang ldan zhing sbyin bdag gi dam pa/ sems can gi khas thams ngan song nas gdon pa/ ye shes las lu rab tu gog pa'i smon lam chen po dang ldan mnyam pa med pa dang ldan pa dge pa'i
78a1(phal chen): nam med pang ldan pa/ dgas nyim pa med pa sa shes rjes su sangs rgyas pa dang ldan cing thams canathams cad ni pa'i migs pa rang tu gnos pa/ mngon pa chags pa'i mi shes rnams pa da
78a2(phal chen): pas 'gro ba thams cad la shin du mkhas par byas pa/ ye shes kyi sa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhol ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brgyan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad phyir mi
78a3(phal chen): ldog pas rgyun med pa med par gyur te/ mtshad sbyin shin du rgyas par gyur cig/ sems can thas zad 'gro ba kun larim gro byed cing blan med pa'i mi shes kyis tha'i thug brgyan chags pa med pa'i phyir ma ldog pa'i mnang byin byed pa/ 
78a4(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems thanams cad tshad med pa mam mas pa'i bsod rnams bsags pa'i pha rol tu phyin cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba legs par skyed pa dang ldan par gyur cig sems can bams cad mam nas kyid kyil 'khor
78a5(phal chen): gyis chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa bla na med pa'i snang ba'i bde ba yong su gtong da zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sngags pa 'gro ba thams cad/ da kyi sbyin bdag tu gyur cig/ sems canathas cad sos can gyi khas
78a6(phal chen): su snyoms par dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par 'dzin pa'i pha rol tu phyin thob cing / mnyam pa'i sems kyis mchod sbyin byed par gyuracig/ sems can thas cad theg pa'i mchog la 'gro ba thams cad
78a7(phal chen): rab tu dgod par 'artson zin/ mchod sbyin dam pa byed par gyur cig/ sos can thams cad dus ma yin pa thams cad las 'das shing // dus thams cad la bab pa'i mchod byin gyi mthar byin pa 'gro ba thams cad ma
78a8(phal chen): shing ga du myur ba'i mchod sbyin byed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skyes ru ngas pa'i mchod skyon nun tshu dgas pa'i pha rob tu phyin pa dang ldan ning tshod sbyin legs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can mas pa
78a9(phal chen): sa rgya kyi sa kyi sa sanan pa la sa lang kyi sa tsun pal kyi mtsho drin ldan papa' b.laman banas pa sa gyi chu
78b1(phal chen): na gshegs pazhin gnag pas ma brdzun ni tshang sbyin gyis padas mas byang chu
78b2(phal chen): sa pa na ma yod kyi kyis pa'i yong sa sa rgyud pa yang du 'dul pa ga sa da tungs kyang / bams can gi mas pas kyi kyis cad rgyan segs par byas pa ba dang
78b3(phal chen): ma ra 'gyung bang ngo // sangs rgyas pas 'du gnyis bapa' na da ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams padal na byung med pa'i mig na ma tshang byin du 'gyur ba dang / 'gro babs zlang
78b4(phal chen): mchod sbyin du 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis grub/ rga pa'i mchod sbyin byas par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thos/ cad blta ba dang mi 'bral ba'i mchod sbyin du 'gyur ba dang / chog
78b5(phal chen): dang shin du ldan pa'i mchod sbyin du 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dayon tan thams cad kyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mamad sbyin du 'gyur ba dang / sems can thas cad bla na med pa'i mchod
78b6(phal chen): sbyin byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod sbyin go mthar thug par 'gyur bar yong su snga'o// gzhin yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yo byad kyi tshogs dang dngos po la chags pa med pa'i sos pa
78b7(phal chen): na po/ mngon par mchags pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ rnam par smin pa la ma'i ba'i sems dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad re zhing 'dod pa med pa'i sems dang / skyon med pa'i sems dang / 
78b8(phal chen): rmongs pa med pa'i sems dang / chos la rtogs pas shin du 'tshal ba'i sems dang / sems can thams cad don la bzhag par yong su sngo ba'i sems dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang dag par jis
79a1(phal chen): bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ longs spyod mtha' yas pa rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad la dmigs pa tshad med pa'i rim gro byed pa'i tshul can/ sems can la phan pa
79a2(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pas rnam pa sna tshogs du mar yang dag par spyod pa/ dngos po'i rnam pa tshad med pa brjod du med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba'i rgyal mtshan nyid sna tshogs can thams cad sbyin pa'i tshogs la
79a3(phal chen): rab tu brtson pa btang bar bya ba mtha' yas pa stobs pas gtong ba thams cad yang dag par gtong ba la gzhol ba/ phyi nang gi yul zad mi shes pa'i dmigs pa thams cad shin du ston pas/ de dag
79a4(phal chen): gtong ba dang / yongasu gtong ba dang / stobs pa dang / sbyin par byed pa dang / dbul ba dang bsam pa'i stobs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad du yon tan chen po thob pas
79a5(phal chen): sems rin po che dang 'grogs pa dang / lan la re ba med par 'gro/ pa thams cad snying rjes rjes su skyong ba dang / 'gro ba rin po che/ thams cad kyi bsam pa rin po che shin du sgrub pa dang / 'das
79a6(phal chen): pa dang mabyon pa dang / daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang gcig tu 'grang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par 'phel bar byeng ba'i tshe/ so byang bas cad kyi sbyin pa yongs
79a7(phal chen): su ma ngo byas yang dag par skyes pa'i dag pa'i sa ba de dag sems can gi khams thams cad ma lus par yongs smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba gcig nas gcin tu rgyud pa nas par / pa
79a8(phal chen): ba phyir yongs su su'o// 'di rnams cad ma lus par gciganas gcig tu rgyud pa'i chi ba'i dzin mdzes pa med cing / rkyen namo par dag pas rnam par 'byed pa dang / rin tu rgyan pa yongasu tshogs pa
79b1(phal chen): rgyas par bya ba'i phyir yong su sngo'o// dus mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad ma lus pa la 'jug cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'dul ba dus thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'i phyir yong su sngo'o// 
79b2(phal chen): ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs thams cad ma lus pa rol mkhas pa yang dag par bstan pas 'gro ba thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir yongasu sngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thas cad ma lus par mngon pa 'tshang
79b3(phal chen): rgya bar bya bas phyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par snyan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rgyun mi 'chad pas sems can kun gis sangs rgyas kyi chos shes par bya ba'i phyir yongasu sngo'o
79b4(phal chen): bskal pa'i grangs thams cad ma lus par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas rgyas par gang ba'i phyir yongasu sngo'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'a
79b5(phal chen): klas pa kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par rig pa dang / che ba rje chung ba dang / phra ba dang yangs pa dang / snrel ba nir gyur pa dang / spyi'u tshugs su snyan pa dang / rgyan gcig pa dang / rgyan tha dad
79b6(phal chen): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sna chog su 'grang zhing bstan pa thos lus par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongs su rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi 'dzin
79b7(phal chen): sa mas pa shA smras par ma nus gsum nu btsun pas/ sems gang cigi rishing thams da mthun pa'i 'du ba dang / 'a tu yo bar bya ba ra ya sa dz+ra ste/ byang chub skyes pa
79b8(phal chen): bas dpa yin pa sems san kyi 'oms thong med palas byu 'azung bar byu phyi sangs rgyas kyi ya tshun tshong pa lazhugs pa/ ni can thos 'ag thathams cad mang po sa
80a1(phal chen): la dge ba'i rtsa rgyun mi 'chad par skyed pa/ dus thams cad du spong ba la skyo ba med par rim gro byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ btang ba thams cad btang bas 'gyod pa med pa'i sems dang ldan
80a2(phal chen): pasbyin pa brtsams pa thams cad thams cad mkhyen par yongs su sngo ba la brtson pa des/ slong ba de dang de dag der 'ongs zhing yo byad kyi dngos po mtha' yas pa slong ba dang / slong ba thams cad kyi sam pa
80a3(phal chen): yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas dus gzhan dang gzhan du spong ba 'ongs pa dang / slong ba de dang de dag du yul de dang der 'ongs shing dus gzhan dang gzhan du phyin pa/ dmigs pa'i
80a4(phal chen): dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa slong ba dang / slong ba'i sems can sna tshogs dang / gang zag gzhan dang gzhan sems can sna tshogs dang dang ldan pa/ phyogs gzhan dang gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i mi rnam pa tha dad pa gzhan dang gzhan
80a5(phal chen): du gyur pa/ skye gnas tha dad pa zin pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas gzhan dang gzhan du gyur pa/ de lta bu'i slong ba'i tshogs chen po srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa/ kun nas 'dus pa
80a6(phal chen): mthong na slong ba de dag thams cad la sems dga' ba dang / sems dang pa dang / slong ba la byams pa dang / dge gshes gnyis mthong ba'i 'du shes kyis/ snying rje chen pos rim gro byed pa'i sems dang
80a7(phal chen): yid rab tu spro ba dang / sems shin du tshim pa rab tu thob ste/ phyir log pa med pa'i dad pas gtong ba rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i sems dang / skyo ba med cing khyad par du 'phel ba'i btang ba'i sems kyis slong bci
80a8(phal chen): ltar 'ongs pa dang / dngos po che spong ba de dag r+g+hAm+b+ha pa dang / yongs rgyas pa dang / lag gang bdang / snod gang ba dang / bsam pa gang ba dang / ci 'dod pa'i dngos pa thob pa dang / yid bde ba mtha' yas
80a9(phal chen): pas rgyas pad dbul bor ba dang / nor dang ma byed sems cad bskus pos brtan pa dang / dngos po yongasu btang ba bas cad kyis shin du bsdud pa dang / ci spangs pa'i dngos po thams cad thob pa'i yid med de/ sgra
80b1(phal chen): tshe zhing mthong ba byin pa dang / ci bder 'dor zhing spyong ba dang / bsam pa ji bzhin du rim pa dang / nyon mongs pa med par sbyin pa thob pa dang / chad cing dub pa med pa'i sems dang ldan par byed de/ slong ba de
80b2(phal chen): dag mthong ba tsam gis byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po shin tu dga' bar gyur gyi rgya byin bstan la 'dug pas skal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas pas ni ma yin no// rab mtshe ma'i dbang phyug la skal pa bye
80b3(phal chen): 'khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par gnas pa ma yin no// dga' ldan du skyes te/ skye ba dang 'chi 'pho las rnam par 'das pas ma yin no// rab 'phrul dga'i dbang phyug bskal pa grangs med pa tho ba de bo'i
80b4(phal chen): rnam pa thob pas ma yin no// dbang sgyur ba'i dbang gis bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par yid du 'ong bas bud med kyi bde ba la gnas pa ma yin no// tshangs pa'i stan la gnas pas bskal pa brjod du med par
80b5(phal chen): tshangs pa'i bde ba la spyod pas ma yin no// mir gyur te 'khor lo sgyus/ pa'i rgyal srid stong gsum gyi mthar thug pa'i bde ba'i rnam pas skal pras mtshams med cing tshad med par dga' ba dang / rtse
80b6(phal chen): dang long spyod thob par 'gyur bas ma yin no// dag rgyas kyi lha'i bdi rje skal pa 'tshungs pa med par bde ba'i rnam pa zad mi shes pa dang / 'grogs pas ma yin no// gtsang ma'i gnas na gnas pas
80b7(phal chen): thams pa su med par bad ba dang 'phrogs pas gyur pas ma yin na/ de ltang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa slong ba sna tshogs thong na dga' bar 'gyur ba sgo bskyed de// mos pa 'thung ngo/ ra tu
80b8(phal chen): dga'ab grub bo// dang ba'aphel lo// zasam pa 'byung ngo // dbang po las su rung bar 'gyur ro// dga' ba'i sems rab tu rdzogs par 'gyur/ mos pachen pos bskyed pa'i sems kyis shugs rnas
80b9(phal chen): 'as mo// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sa bya brtan zhing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuro/ da dge ba'i ma bde dag slong bde dag dang / semam can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir 'ayongasu sngo'o/ da pa'i phyir mo su \u0f7f
81a1(phal chen): don gyi phyir yongasu sngo'o// rnam par dag pa'i phyir yongasu sngo'o// byang chub kyi phyir yongs su sngo'o// mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir yong su sngo'o// yid bzang po'i 'byung gnas su 'gyur ba'i phyir yongasu
81a2(phal chen): spro'o// theg pa chen po bzung ba nyid kyi phyir yongasu sngol/ ngotsams pa bzang po thams cad shes pa dang 'byor par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon 'am yongasu/ 
81a3(phal chen): rdzogs par spongs bcu'i ye shes mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir yong su snga'o/ de yang sems chags pa med pa dang grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i lus kyi las kyi phyir mingasu snga'o// sems chags pa med pa dang / 
81a4(phal chen): grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i phyir ngag gi las kyi phyir yong su sngo'o// sems chags pa med pa'i dang grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i yid kyi las kyi phyir yong su sngo'o// de yang sems can gi las kyi 'du shes kyis yongasu sngo ba ma yin/ 
81a5(phal chen): gzhung de bzhin du srog gi 'du shes kyis ma yin/ gang zag dgi 'du shes kyis ma yin/ shed la skyes pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/ shed bdag gi/ 'du shes kyis ma yin/ skye ba po'i 'du shes kyis ma yin
81a6(phal chen): byed pa po'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/ tshor ba po'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/ yod pa dang med pa'i 'du shes kyis yong su sngo ba ma yin/ 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes
81a7(phal chen): kyis ma yin/ 'chi 'pho'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/ skye ba'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/ sring pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/ srid pa med pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/ 'du shes med
81a8(phal chen): pas yong su sngo ba ma yin/ 'du shes med pa ma yin pas yongasu sngo ba ma yin te chags pa med pa'i sems kyis yongasu snga'o// bcings pa med pa'i sems kyis yongasu sngo'o// grol ba med pa'i sems kyis yongasu sngo ste/ 
81a9(phal chen): de ni las yong su mi snga'o/ rnam par smin pa yong su mi snga'o// rtog pa yong su mi sngal/ rnam par rtog pa yong su mi sngo'o// sems dpa' yongasu mi sngo'o// bsams pa yong su mi sngo'o/ sems yongasu mi sngo'o// sems med/ 
81b1(phal chen): ma phum ma'o/ dede ltar ma su tho byid na gas pa byedang / la la sa ngan pa rnags pa sa dang / can pa mngan par gsul mi de/ mas pal mngan par chags pa mangs
81b2(phal chen): mngon pa chags pa med do// rgyu 'dus pa la mngon par chags pa med do// chos la dngon par chags pa med do/ chos nyid la mngon par chags pa med pa/ sems dpa' la mngon par chags pa med do// bsams pa'i
81b3(phal chen): mngon par chags pa med do// de de ltar yongasu spo ba'i tshe/ gzugs la chags pa med do// gzugs nye bar len pa la chags pa med do// gzugs 'gog pa la chags pa med do// tshor ba la chags pa med do// tshor ba nye bar
81b4(phal chen): khar len pa la chags pa med do// tshor ba 'gog pa la chags ma meng do/ 'du shes la chags pa med do// 'du shes nye bar len pa la chags pa med do// 'du shes 'gog pa pa la chags pa med do// 'du byed la chags pa
81b5(phal chen): pami / 'du byed nye par yin pa la rags pa med do// da'adu byed 'gog bu la chags pa med do/ rnami pa gas pa 'o chags pa med pa ma mags bka par len pa la chabs pa med do/ nas pa
81b6(phal chen): ba 'gog pa la chags pa med do// gang de lta bu'i chos la chags pa med pa de ni gzugs la bcings pa med do// gzugs kyi skye ba la bcings pa me da do// gzugs kyi 'gag pa la bcings pa med do// tshor ba la
81b7(phal chen): bcings pa med do// tshor ba skye ba la bcings pa med do// tshor ba 'gag pa la bcings pa med do// 'du shes la bcings pa med do// 'du shes kyi skye ba la bcings pa med do// 'du shes kyi 'gag pa la bcings pa med do// 'du
81b8(phal chen): byed la bcings pa med do// 'du byed kyi skye ba bcings pa med do// 'du byed kyi 'gag pa la bcings pa med do// rnam par shes pa la bcings pa med do// rnam par shes pa skye ba la bcings pa med do// rnam par shes pa 'gag pa/ 
81b9(phal chen): babacings pa med do// gang chos de dag la bcings pa med pa de na chos thams cad 'chags pa med pa ste/ daci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang chos lnga 'dzin pa'am/ chos gong la chos kyi chags par gyur ba'i chos de lta bu skyes pa
82a1(phal chen): skye ba 'am/ skye bar gyur pa gang yang mod do// yang chos thams cad 'du shes dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te gcig ma yin no// gnyis ma yin no// mang po mang yin no// tshad
82a2(phal chen): med pa ma yin no// chung ngu ma yin no/ mngo bo ma yin no// dma' ba ma yin no/ yangs pa ma yin no// zab pa ma yin no// gsal ba ma yin no// zhi ba ma yin no// spros pa ma yin no/ gnas ma yin no// gnas med
82a3(phal chen): pa ma yin no// chos med pa ma yin no// chos med pa ma yin no// bsgom pa ma yin no/ bsgom pa med pa ma yin no/ yod pa ma yin no// med pa ma yin no// de de ltar chos med pa'i tshul gyis chos rnaMs la rnam par lta ste
82a4(phal chen): chos kyi tshig gi lam la gnas pa dang / chos ma yin zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // de las kyi lam yang rgyun gcod par mi byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rnam par thogs par mi byed do// thams// 
82a5(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid las kyang phyir mi ldog go// rten pa'i las sgyu ma lta bur yang rab tu shes so// chos sgra snyan dang 'dra bar yang 'jigs par mi byed na sems can du snang bas kyang rlom sos su mi byed do// chos thos
82a6(phal chen): cad sgyu ma yang dang mnyam pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ shes te las rnams kyi rgyu'i mthu dang yang 'gal bar mi byed do// las la gnol pa rab tu 'jug ste/ chos nas la mngon par 'du bya ba med pa yang / 
82a7(phal chen): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i lam yang rgyun mi gcod do// de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yong su sngo ste/ gang gi phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yul med cing / thos cad mkhyen
82a8(phal chen): pa nyid kun du 'gro bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thams cad du yongasu sngo zhing thams cad las ldog par mi byed do// ci'i phyir yongasu spro ba gang zhes bya zhe na/ 'di ni 'jig rten las pha rol tu gyur pas na/ de'i phyir
82a9(phal chen): ro'u bas bya'o/ phung polas gnan du myur bar byed pas na/ de'i phyir sngo ba zhes bya'o// tshig gi lam la shin du gyur pas na/ de'i phyir yong su su ba zhes bya'o// sems can gi 'du shes sna tshogs las pa rol tu gyur/ 
82b1(phal chen): pas na/ de'i phyir yongasu sngo ba zhes bya'o// 'jig tshogs mang po las gzhan du gyur pas na/ de'i phyir yongasu sngo ba zhes bya'o// mngon par 'du byed pas las gzhan du gyur pas na/ de'i phyir yongasu sngo ba zhes bya'o// 
82b2(phal chen): srid pa las gzhan du gyur pas na/ de'i phyir yongs su sngo ba zhes bya'o// nye bar len pa las gzhan du gyur pas na/ de'i phyir yongasu sngo ba zhes bya'o// 'jig rten gi chos las gzhan du gyur pas na/ de'i phyir yongs
82b3(phal chen): sngo ba zhes bya'o// de de ltar yongs su spros pas sangs rgyas kyi rjes su song ba yin/ chos kyi rjesu song ba yin/ ye shes kyi rje su song ba yin/ byang chub kyi rjesu song ba yin/ don gi rje su song ba yin/ yongasu sngo
82b4(phal chen): rje su song ba yin/ spyod yul gi rje su song ba yin/ skyod pa'i rjesu song ba yin/ rang bzhin gyi rje su song ba yin/ rna par dag pa'i rjesu song ba yin/ de de ltar yong su sngos pas chos shes par byas pa thams ca
82b5(phal chen): khong du chung bar byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad na rnas par byed pa yang yong su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas gang yang thugs 'byung dbar byas pa med pa yin/ chos gang yang mi mthun par byas
82b6(phal chen): pa med pa yin/ chos gang la yang chud bsan pa med yin/ chos gang dang yang 'gal bar byed pa med pa yin/ dngos po gang yang ni pa myod pa yin+da/ chos gang yang thor ba med pa min/ rmug
82b7(phal chen): 'ang theg pa med pa yin/ rkyen gango mang byi nang gachos thams cad dang 'gal bar byas pa med pa yin/ las kyi 'bras bu ma rgyun pachad par mabyed de/ kyergyal ba'i mas dag 'di bying chu ba sems pa sa
83a1(phal chen): cad kyi dbang zug la dbang sgyur ba rab tu thob pangs pa rje su song ba yin no// / shin du myos pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas pal pa che zhes bya ba/ bam tho bzhi bcu pa'o// 
83a2(phal chen): de nas byang chuzi sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen por rje'i rgyal mtshan gis phyogs bcur bltas te/ 'khor thams cad la ltas nas/ chos kyi dbyings la lte ba dang / don dang yig dang tshig la 'jug pa dang / 
83a3(phal chen): sems mtho' dang dbus med par mangs pa yong su bsgom pa dang / 'gro thams cad snying rje chen pos rgyas par bya ba dang / dus gsum gyis snga rgyas kyi rigs kyi sems yang dag par 'brel bar hU~M/ 
83a4(phal chen): pa dang / yon tan thams cad la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs pa'i lus su yang dag par shes parabya ba dang / sems can thas cad kyi bsam pa rab tu dbye/ 
83a5(phal chen): ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar skyed pa thob pa yang dag par mthong ba dang / chos kyi lus rjesu song ba'i gzugs kyi lus su yongs su dag pa yang dag par ston par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi skabs
83a6(phal chen): kyis/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcod pa 'di dag smras so// de dag rgyal ba'i rigs dang ldan gyur cig/ 'gro ba kun na rgyal po gang yod pa// de dag zil gnon rgyal po 'gro ba'i mchog/ phan pa'i don
83a7(phal chen): du rgyal bu mthu chen gyur// de dag dang ba'i sems kyis rab gyur cig/ 'gro ba kun la dbang gyur rab thob te/ chos dang ldan par chos kyis rgyal srid skyong // 'gro ba rnams kyi bde ba rab tu bskyed// de dag
83a8(phal chen): rgyal ba'i rigs rgyud rnam dag pas// chos dang ldan pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// de dag 'khrugs med rgyal srid skyong bar byed// phyogs rnams kun nas 'khor lo phyir mi ldog/ de dag yon tan gzugs dang / 
83b1(phal chen): rab tu ldan// mkhas pa'i blo dang shes rab ye shes ldan// de dgra bzil gnon thub la ldog pa med// bdud kyi bkrugs ma thams cad rab tu 'jom// de dag tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ste/ 
83b2(phal chen): bzod pa'i stobs la bsdams pa'i sems kyis gnas/ khon 'dzin khro ba rnam dag yid bsal bas// rgyal ba rnaMs kyi chos 'dir rtag tu brtson// de dag zas dang skom dag byin byed cing // gzhon dang / 
83b3(phal chen): 'phreng ba gos dang spos mang dang // mal dang byug pa mar me rgyab rten mar me dang // rnam pa mtha' yas ji snyed gtong byed cing // phan pa'i sems kyisade dag sbyin byed tshe// de la shin du dang pa'i
83b4(phal chen): sems bsgyur cing // bsam pa dag pas dga' yangs skyed de/ 'jig rten bla ma dag la sbyin pa byed// de dag dngos po thams cad gtong byed cing // byi dang nang gi gang rnams ji snyed pa// kun kyang dang ba'i
83b5(phal chen): yid kyis rib tu gtong // yid la zhum pa med par gang yang med// mgo yang gting zhing mig kyang rab tu gtong // lag pa gtongade bzhin rkang pa gtong // sha dag gtong zhing de bzhin
83b6(phal chen): rkang yang gtong // thams cad lus kyang mi dga' med par gtong // dag dbang phyug shin du yangs kyu sgyur zhing // rigs dang rus ldanagro ba mi dzi/ kha nas lce yang shin du brkyang byas kyi
83b7(phal chen): skyong ba rnams la mi dga' med par gtod // de dag dbang phyug shin du yangs sgyur cing / slong ba rnams la lci yid sbyin byas nas kyang // 'di na 'gro ba yod pa ma lus kun// rgyal ba'i lcags yangs rdo badzin
83b8(phal chen): gyur / sasman da/ da rgya / slong sa byed/ bya / 
84a1(phal chen): ma pa pa rdzo sa kyis/ la ma sa lda 'i sa ma da pa ngas kyang/ bya ldanam pa'i sems kyipa ma / 
84a2(phal chen): byed pa'i yod dang ldan gyur cing // snod du gyur pa'i chos rnams len par byed// ci nas 'jig rten 'di dag bder 'gyur zhing // ci nas thams cad bsgrub par gyur pa dang // ci nas 'gro ba thams cad dgrol 'gyur ba/ 
84a3(phal chen): da shA gro bkun la mangs sum+b+ha/ pa ma zhin du drug ga snyan ldan padan/ me tog sdug nas kyi pa'i sa bsdus pa rnams/ 'thong bawA ba snre ca dang ldan pa 'i// 'khor dang ldan par dang gyur/ 
84a4(phal chen): gyur cig/ mchis gang shes pa'i g.yog 'khor de dag dbying // phan par sems pa'i yid kyis gtong ba'i tshe// ltos shong re ba'i sems kyi dang mi 'byung bar// sems can pan phyir byang chub rab tu tshol// 
84a5(phal chen): dge ba de la rje su sems byed cing // sna tshogs yangs shing rgya che snrel bzhi las// 'gro ba kun la brten pa yongs su sngo// las la gnas ba su byed pa gang yang med / de dag rgyal srid yangs shing
84a6(phal chen): sbyin par byed// yul dang mir bcas grong khyer dam pa dang // rgyal ba'i pho brang gnas su gyur pa dang // khyim dang bza' shing ra ba sbyin par byed// skal ba rgyar yang sus kyang ma byin pa'i// sbyin pa 'jig rten ma'i
84a7(phal chen): gcol dbul// 'jig rten rnams kyi pha rol phyin byas shing // 'gro ba kun la pha rol ston par byed// de dag phyogs bcu'i spong ba mang po dag/ rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar gyur nas kyang // sbyong ba thams cad ni
84a8(phal chen): tu mgur byas shing // shin tu dga' 'gyur de bzhin spro bar byed// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis cir sngos pa// skyes bu 'dul ba de dag spyod yul la// rab tu rlabs te pha rol phyin byas shing // de dag las te yongasu sngo bar byed/ chos
84b1(phal chen): rnams 'di la kye ma su zhig zhugs// gang la thug 'gyur ci ltar zhug 'gyur ces// de dag chos dngos 'di la rnam lha yang // sbyin pa'i sems la rnam par thogs pa med// chos rnams gang la chos kyi chags med par
84b2(phal chen): migs tshul zhes de dag yongs su s+ho// chos kyi tshul li nga na ma blo// dan kyi tshul shes de dag yongs s+ho// las lanam yang rnam par rtog pa med// rnam par smin pa'ang gnas par ma byed do// byang chub rtenapa
84b3(phal chen): rab tu dpa' shes kyang // chos nyid dbyings la 'gal bar mi byed do// lus la chags par de dag mi byed do// sems la'ang de dag gnas par mi byed do// las kyi de dag blo 'jug mi byed de// las kyi ye shes rten la'ang
84b4(phal chen): 'jug mi byed// 'das pa'i chos la rtog par mi byed de// ma 'ongs chos la'ang blo ni gtong mi byed// da ltar yod la gnas par mi byed de// dus gsum kun la rnam par dbyen par skyes// de dag gzugs kyi pha rol phyin
84b5(phal chen): gyur cing // tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed yid rnams dang / 'jig rten kun gyi pha rol phyin 'gyur te// dag pa de dag dma' ba'i yid mi 'gyur// phung po rnams dang khoms la yongs btsal cing // skye mched
84b6(phal chen): nga bzhin lus kyi rnam pa dang // sems kyi rnam pa ma lus na gzhog kyang / byang chub dngos su gang yang mi rnyed do// rtag la nam yang chags pa nabyed de// chad pa la yang de dag sems mi 'jugago chos ci
84b7(phal chen): yod dang med pa ma yin te// gcig nas gcig brgyud las kyang ma lus shes// sems kyi rgyu yis byang chub thob mi byed// chos nyid la yang de dag mi byed de// zhing la de dag gnas pa ma yin no// dus gsum chos rnams kun/ 
84b8(phal chen): kyang yod ma yin// de ltar spyod pa chos 'di kun rtog cing // ji ltar rgyal ba kun gyis rtag mdzad pa// de ltar de bcol nam yang rnyed par byed// spyod pa rnams la mi shes rmongs pa med// bya ba'i lam dang 'gal bar mi byed
84b9(phal chen): cing / las kyi lam rnams yongasu rjod byed pa// sems can lam rnams spong byed cing // rgyur byas rkyen dang bcas par de la rtog/ ye shes mkhas pa'i gang rnams brjod mdzad pa'i// mkhas pa'i lam la de dag spyong rnyed/ 
85a1(phal chen): spyod nga sa stongs/ sa sa smra gas pa / kun dang // tha' ma pa
85a2(phal chen): 'ab med par mang / rgyal ba'i chos kyi tshul rnams rab tu rtogs/ sa rnams pang gi rang nas shes pa// de ni rang bzhin dngas yod mi rtog ste// dang sa med rtag med de dag tu shes// bde gshegs ye shes de dge nas papa
85a3(phal chen): mthong 'gro ba kun dang chos nyid thams cad dang // sems can rnam pa zhing gi rnam pa dang // chos kyi rnam pa dus rnams su lus pa'i// chos rnams mkhas pa gang yang brjod pa med// chos rnams ma lus bdung bar bya ba
85a4(phal chen): med// ji snyed sems can rgyal bas sangs rgyas pa// de'i chos la'ang chos kyi dngos med de// de yang dus su chos rnams rjod pa yin// chos nyid kun du 'gro ba ci 'dra ba// de bzhin de dag yongasu sngo bar byed/ des
85a5(phal chen): kyang 'gro ba kun nas bsgyur byas te// de la kun du dpa' ba yongs su sngo/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ste// yongs su sngo bzhis drug pa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 
85a6(phal chen): dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongasu sngo ba 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba bdun pa gang zhe na// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
85a7(phal chen): chen po thams cad gtong ba'i dmigs pa la brtson pa/ tshul khrims rnam par dge ba la rab tu brten pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam phyir mi ldog pa brtson 'grus drang ljon pa/ thams cad btang
85a8(phal chen): ba'i 'thod pa dang ldan zhing na la bzod pa'i nga tshul can/ bus ma gtan 'byam klas pa/ rnam pa tha dad pa mkhas pa'i rjesu zhugs pa/ gas rab kyi tshul rangs rnam pa skyod pa la mikhas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad ma ts+yai/ 
85a9(phal chen): sems can gyis rnam par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtse bo dang ldan pa/ yon tan mtha' yis pa yang dag par thus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bdang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'am btu btsun pa'i snod dang ldan pa/ 'grob
85b1(phal chen): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi phyogs mngon par skyob pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu sogs kyang rung / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sgrogs kyang rung / dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs pa nye bar sogs kyang rung / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po nya
85b2(phal chen): sogs kyang rung / dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa nye bar sogs kyang rung / dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs mang po rdul tsam yan cad nye bar sngogs kyang rung / dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhal du med pa nye bar sogs kyang rung / dge ba'i rtsa ba
85b3(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa nye bar sogs kyang ru/ dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med pa nye bar sogs kyang rung / dge ba'i rtsa ba mu med pas nye bar sogs kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi la dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar spogs kyang
85b4(phal chen): rung / chos la dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar sogs kyang rung / de bzhin du dge 'dun la dmigs pa dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen la dmigs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yos pa'i tshogs la ma
85b5(phal chen): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa banye bar sogs kyang rung ste/ dge ba'i rje ba de dag yongs su srid pa dang / sems can thams cad kyang migs pa dang / thangs mkhasadabung migs pa dang / legs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bas sgoms
85b6(phal chen): pa dmigs pa dang / nang la dmigs pa dang / phyi rol la dmigs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa'i tshogs la dmigs pa 'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar sogs kyang rung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa
85b7(phal chen): de dag yongasu spyod pa dang / nye bar gnas pa dang / 'jug pa dang / yang dag par sgrub pa nye bar sogs pa dang / tshogs yongasu bya ba dang / mos par bya ba dang / rnam par sbyangs pa dang / rnam par ston pa dang / rgya che
85b8(phal chen): byed pa'i ma 'thod pa thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can dmyal ba'i sgo shin du bcang ba dang / dbang po rgyu ba shin tu bsdams pa dang / bya ba'i tshul la rab tu zhugs bya/ byin ci ldog med par 'gro ba/ sangs rgyas kyis
85b9(phal chen): kye snod du tshathams cad kyi sdod du gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bo song nams kyi zhing du byung ba/ sangs rgyas thams pa byin rgyas rlabs pa/ da bzhin gshegs pa'i dan pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis shin du gsos pa/ dan
86a1(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rje smon lam gi rjes su song ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin pashes pa thams cad kyi
86a2(phal chen): 'phrin las kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ rang gi sems kyi go skabs rnyed/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang 'dra ba/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor thams cad du yang dag par 'byung ba/ sangs rgyas
86a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi phyag gi stobs kyis byung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yon tan gyis yang dag par 'phags pa/ mtho ris la chags pa med pa/ skyid pa la yong su 'dzin pa med pa/ mngon par 'du byed pa la
86a4(phal chen): chags pa med pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dngos po thams cad yongs sngo bar byed rab/ 'gro ba thas cad kyi bsod nams kyi rten tu gyur pa thams cad ldan pa'i nan tan la rab tu zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad dga' ba'i
86a5(phal chen): gdug su gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i lam gos mngon par 'don pa/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan par byed pa/ yul thams cad du yongasu spro ba thams cad mkhyen gyi/ 
86a6(phal chen): byang chub kyi sgro rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa/ ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par bzung bar byed pa/ lam chen po rnam par sbyong ba la brtson pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na don yod pa la zhugs pa/ 'jig rten
86a7(phal chen): thams nad kyi dri ma sbyong ba/ rab tu sbyin pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshes pa'i rigs su rigs dang ldan par 'byung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs rnam par dag pa rab tu skyes pa/ yon tan gyi
86a8(phal chen): dkyil gakhor chen thos sbyin pa'i gan su gyur ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi nyin du gyur ba/ 'gro ma zas cad kyi gnas su gyur ba/ sems can rnas par dag pa la yang dag par gzhol ba/ da'i yongasu srud pa
86a9(phal chen): yang dag par brtson pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu bzung ba ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag spyod pa'i tshe/ sems 'di ltar skyed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub du mos/ 
86b1(phal chen): bskyed pas yang dag par bzung ba/ byang chub du sems bskyed pas bsams pa/ dang / byang chub du sems skyed pas brtan pa dang / byang chub du sems skyed pa'i bsam pa las byung ba dang / byang chub du sems bskyed
86b2(phal chen): bos phan pa la zhugs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad ma lus pa la snying rtse bar byed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul du yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / stobs ba cu la dmigs par ston pa dang / stobs po cu'i
86b3(phal chen): dbyings su yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbyings su mngon par bsgrub pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de ltar yang dag par sgrub pa de dag las/ rnam par smin pa gror byung ba / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug
86b4(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sos dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'gro ba thams cad yongasu btang po'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongasu sngo s+t+wa~M/ semasna nan thams cad las sems can gcig kyang mchud ba med par bya n+ti
86b5(phal chen): sems can gcig la ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad ma lus pa la yongs su sngo bar byed de/ de la 'di ltar yongasu sngo'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rin po ches yongasasu brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams
86b6(phal chen): cad kyi chal bar gang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa gos rnam par gyon cing / gos gis yongs su gang ba dang / 'jig rten rgyakhams grangs med pa smos thams cad kyis yid du'ong
86b7(phal chen): zhing dri zhim thos yongasu rgyas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par mdzes shing / lhab lhub kyis mongs rgyas mdzang / jig rten gyi khams grangs med mnar bu rin por na maH
86b8(phal chen): yas pas khyad par du 'phags shing nor bu rin por ches yongasu brgyan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams blangs med pam tog pa sas kyi/ kha tog du ma dang ldan par gyur cing / me tog thams cad kyis yongasu/ 
86b9(phal chen): rgyas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kha zas zhim po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan zhing / khabs zhim po thun su ma tshogs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa / gser dang
87a1(phal chen): dngul dang nor gi dbyig gis dag cing / nor gyi dbyig gis yongasu rgyas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grang med me rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing / lha rdzas kyi gos thams cad kyis kun nas
87a2(phal chen): g.yogs te grags pas yongs rgyas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i rin por che sna tshogs gi cod pan gyis rnam pa sna tshogs yongasu rgyan cing / rin po che'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa dag slong ba ra
87a3(phal chen): yang phyi ma'i mtha'i skal pa'i mur thug par sbyin pa'i ngoms par ma gyur cig/ rgyun gcod par ma gyur cig/ slong ba gcig la ci lta ba de bzhin du slong ba thams cad la yongasu gtong zhing / slong ba re re la yang
87a4(phal chen): phyi ma'i mithaSh+Ti mu thug par shin du tshim par byed kyang / yongasu skyo bar ma gyur cig/ phyir ldog par ma gyur cig/ de yang 'di ltar rgyu med pa'i sems dang / 'dod cing sred pa med pa'i sems dang / grags
87a5(phal chen): ba 'dod pa med pa'i sems dang / 'gyod pa med pa'i sems dang / mya ngan med pa'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la the tsom// med pa'i sems dang / gtong ba shin tu gtong ba'i
87a6(phal chen): sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems dang / yong su smin par bya ba'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rab tu dgod pa'i sems kyis yong su gtong bar gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
87a7(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa'i mthar gtong ba dang / 'dod pa'i sbyin pa gtong ba'i phyir yong su sngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba
87a8(phal chen): de dag sems can gi khams las sems can gcig kyang ma chud pa med par byas shing / sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongasu sngo ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa glang po cang shes yan lag bdun
87a9(phal chen): shin tu gnas pa/ gser gi rgyal mtshan dang / gsem gi rkyen dang / gsor gi dra bas g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i brgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pas yongasu gang ba'i sbyin pa byed par gyur cig/ 'jig
87b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams blangs med pa rta'i rgyal po sbyin zhes bya ba dang 'dra ba/ rta'i rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa/ rin po che rgyan sdu gu sna tshogs dang / yan lag gi rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pas
87b2(phal chen): yangasu gang ba'i sbyin pa byed par gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa/ bud med dang rol mo rung ba dang / dkyil ba ming du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa dang bcas pa dang / yongasu gang ba'i sbyin pa byed/ 
87b3(phal chen): par gyur cig sa 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bu dang bu mos gang ba/ byang chub kyi sems la gnas shing phyi ma'i mtha'i skal pa'i mur theg par slong ba re re la yongasu gtong bar gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi'os/ 
87b4(phal chen): grangs med pa rang gi lus kyis yongasu gang ste/ byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs shin tu bde ba'i yid kyis yong su gdong bar gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rang gi gros yong su bkang skye/ bag yod/ 
87b5(phal chen): pa'i sems kyis yong su gtung bar gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams gras med pa rang gi lus las/ byung ba'i mig gis yongasu gang ste m-inadagi sbyin par gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams zangs
87b6(phal chen): med pa sha dang rkang gis yongasu gang ste/ sdug bsngal gyis nyams pa med pa'i yid kyis/ dbang pos yongasu gtong bar gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bdag dbang ba'i rgyal srid
87b7(phal chen): dang / skyid pas yongasu bkang ste srid kyi sbyin par byed pa dang / ldan par gyur cig/ 'jig rten gi khams grangs med pa bran dang las bying pa'i mis yongasu bkang ste/ btang ba thams cad yongasu btang ba dang / 
87b8(phal chen): 'dres par gtong ba chen po'i sems lnga gnas pas skyong ba re re la yang yongasu gtong bar gyur cig/ de bzhin du sos can gi khams thos cad ma lus par yongasu bzung ste/ sos can gyi khas thos cad las gcig kyang
87b9(phal chen): bcung bamed pa mang ba cig sa na mang mas padaga' de du ma pa mtshan ma su ga pa mam nga chog sa ni mas ga sa
88a1(phal chen): pa gapa rdzun phying rnam rlung spyad pa skyeng chung sbyin gyi sa btsug tu rdzuzhin du 'ag ter bya marjo kyi nga byings kyis byas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
88a2(phal chen): gtugs pa thams cad du yang / snying rje chen po yongasu rgyas pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse bas/ sems can thos cad la rim gro byed pa'i tshe/ de'i rgyus sos sbyin pa las phyir ldog par ma gyur
88a3(phal chen): citshig/ gtong ba'i sems kyis se gol gtogs pa tsam yang skyo bar ma gyur cig/ de yang 'di ltar chags pa med pa'i sems dang / shin du gtong ba'i sems dang / bdag nyid yangs pa'i sems dang / zab pa'i/ 
88a4(phal chen): sems dang / legs pa yongasu sdud pa'i sems dang / mngon par mazhen pa'i sems dang / chos la srog med pa'i sems dang / yid shin tu thub pa'i sems dang / ma 'jugs pa'i sems dang / g.yo ba med pa'i/ 
88a5(phal chen): sems dang / rin po che'i gling rigs sna tshogs thob pa'i sems dang / las kyinum por smin pa thams cad ma che la med pa'i sems da / srid chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bya ba'i sas
88b1(phal chen): byed ma mo rig mi pa gyims mang du ga sa zung po'i phyi byangs tho'o// nga dganyis can tham bang pobams songs pan par ga gyu pa 'byo ma su byab/ de dgagos sa
88b2(phal chen): na byung chung ring/ zangs byed pa'i rgyas parab tung dang pa'i phyi ma rlo'o/ ldan mong su slo nga/ yong ning seM ga pa bas mangs rgyaste// 'di ltar sa can mams ca 'a banas dang zhe
88b3(phal chen): phyi ma chu b+ha'o// sems can thos par la mnyam pa'i thos laganas ma rdo'o kyi smos kyi ba pa yon pa'i sems sa su rdu ba la gnas te yongs tsu/ sos thanams cad la 'dab ma yang dag par sdus gas
88b4(phal chen): gnas te yongasu sngo'o// sems can thas cad mngon par mgu bar btang ba'i sos la ga nas te yongasu sngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi dbul bzlo/ sgeg pa'i phyir gtong ba'i sems la gnas te yongasu sngo'o// sas
88b5(phal chen): zas cad no bums zlang kyis sdu ba'i phyir ba dang ba'i sems la gnas te slong su spo'o// sems can thams cad nor grangs pa tu tang ba'i sems la gnas te yong su snga'o// seMs can thos cad la gtong ba mtha' las
88b6(phal chen): thams cad yongasu padang bya'i sems la gnas te yongasu snga'o// sos can thams cad la phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mu thug pa rgyun chad pa med par gtong ba'i sems la gnas rgyun chang pa med par gnas te yongasu sngo'o// so sa can
88b7(phal chen): tha la mas cing khyod pa med par rgyun pa nga / mdzod thams cad skyom myed po ga tha ma pas laganas te so y+YA s+t+wa~M'o// sos ca rnas cad mi sa pog kyi khyed sbyin ning gang ba'i sems laganas nyi ma
88b8(phal chen): sa can sum ca tso chu'angs la nas nyim du rdzol bas banams ca pa gan 'das pa'i phyir gang ba sa ma ma gnas nyin ma myo/ songs sa nga pa na kyi kyi
89a1(phal chen): btang ba'i sems la gnas te yong su sngo'o// sems can thos cang rgyun du mas rim gro bya ba'i phyir btang ba'i sems la gnas te yongasu snga'o// sos can thams cad la thogs pa med par btang ba'i phyir
89a2(phal chen): sangs la gnas te yongasu sngo'o// sems can thams cad 'an ba med par btang ba'i semasal gnas te mang su lnga'o// mas can thas cad laskabs na thogani du ba pas darjes btang ba'i sems la gnas te yang su'o ma
89a3(phal chen): semam can rnams da sa ny-i 'i rnams pa'i 'od par gis btang pa'i sems sa gnas tamangasu du'o// sems cad thams cad la sangs rgyas kyis shes sgrub pa'i phyir bdang pa'i sems la gnas te yong su mag// mams can / 
89a4(phal chen): cad la theg pa chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongasu snga'o// sos can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon du gyur pa la gnas te yongasu snga'o// sems can thams cad dang bsam pa/ 
89a5(phal chen): tha dad pa med par yongasu rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongasu sngo'o// sos can thosacad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba shin du rnam par dag par byas pa la gnas te yongasu sngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi the tsom thams cad bsal zhi bdag
89a6(phal chen): pa la gnas de yong su sngo'o// sems can thams cad ye shes dang yon tan mnyam pas rnam par dag par bya ba la gnas te yongasu snga'o// sems can thas cad kyi bsod nams thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
89a7(phal chen): mi 'phrogs pa la gnas te yongasu snga'o// sems can thams cad kyis mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongasu sngo'o// sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ye shes tha dad / 
89a8(phal chen): pa med bra la yangasu bsngo bar bya ba la gnas te yong su snga'o// sems can thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / rnam par 'phrul ba mtha' mas pa yong su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yong su su'o// sems can thams can
89a9(phal chen): pa phe shA da ma da pa gru pa'i nas tam du gyug// sa ngas pa dang / btsun pa 'i 'phru mas cam mas ca rjes sa dran ma
89b1(phal chen): mngasu sngo'o// sams can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par skyes pas rnam par dag par bya ba la gnas te yong su sngo'o// sems can thos cad kyi bdud kyi las dang sgrib pa dang / bar du gcod pa'i chos thos cad nasapa
89b2(phal chen): nang shegs pa nas ya sas // sa pan byung kyi man sa 'gyis pa man sa ni rnam pa dag na yang sa tshugs par byab sa banas rnamangs tham/ sems ca bsas
89b3(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rlabs po ma yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral bar bya ba 'i gnas te mongasu su ga nyimams can thams cad sangs rgyas thas cad kyil mnyes par bya ba la brtson pa'i sems dang mi 'bral bar bya ba la bas
89b4(phal chen): te yong su sngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi go skabs rnyed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba skyon med pa dang / chos dkar po thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rnam par dag pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongasu sngo'o// sems can
89b5(phal chen): thams cad kyis shin tu rgya che shing / mtha' yas pa'i sems dang / bsam brlabs po che mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par dag pa la gnas te yong su sngo'o// // sems rgyud kyis gtong ba'i sems rnam par dag
89b6(phal chen): ning mnyam pa nyid du bya bo gnas te yongasu sngo'o// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dang nan tan mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par dag pa la gnas te yongasu snga'o// sems can thams cad brtson 'grus
89b7(phal chen): chen po brtson 'grus thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i rgyud 'tsho bar byed pa gnas te yongasu 'o// sos can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po rab tu thob par bya ba la gnas te yongasu sngo'o// sems na/ 
89b8(phal chen): sa seM namapa'ams dus rnam par dbya ba'i shes dang / mngon par mas pa ldan pa'i byab ga nas kyi myongs pa'o// sems cin thams cad kyis chos kyi shes rab kyi rob tu sbyin pa song parjon
